[\[23a.3\]]gyis/_/de na 'khor zhing nyon mongs dra ba yis/_/'jig rten dkris te dar gyi srin bu bzhin/_/'jig rten dag na ther zug gnod pa'i gzhi/_/rtag tu 'bras ltar sdug bsngal 'brel pa gang /_/mi gtsang lus dang 'dod pa de dag la/_/phan 'dod sdug bsngal 
[\[23a.4\]]bsal 'dod su zhig dga'/_/mi rtag 'dod pa rnams la chags pa med/_/tshul bzhin rtog pas 'dod chags 'bral bar 'gyur/_/de nas yang dag mthong na 'dod chags 'bral/_/de dag spangs bcad grol ba nyid du 'gyur/_/nga ni srid pa'i chu chen legs 
[\[23a.5\]]par rgal/_/nga ni sdug bsngal rnams 'das bde bar zhugs/_/de phyir ngas ni mtha' yas spros med pa/_/chags pa kun bsal thar pa thob par gyur/_/nga la rga dang na dang 'chi ba med/_/nga la rtag tu tshe yang zad pa med/_/nga ni me ltar 'bar te 'gro 
[\[23a.6\]]'gyur gyis/_/khyod kyis nga ni med 'gyur ma sems shig_/de bzhin gshegs nyid lhun po 'dra bar ltos/_/nga deng yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/bde mchog de ni nga yis chos nyid de/_/rgyal rnams spyod yul yin gyis khyod ma ngu /_/de nas bcom 
[\[23a.7\]]ldan 'das la mgar ba'i bu skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gis kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags na/_sbrang bu dang 'dra ba'i sems can theg pa dman pa 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag deng du byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/_mchod par 'os pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa dang /_zag pa zad pa rnams dang mnyam pa 
[\[23b.2\]]nyid du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_gsar du bsnyen par rdzogs pa gzhon nu yang rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi nyin par nas dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun du bgrang zhing yang dag par 'dus par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bdag kyang de bzhin 
[\[23b.3\]]gshegs pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi grangs su gtogs shing yang dag par 'dus lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/_kha zas tshig pa bzhin du mya ngan las 
[\[23b.4\]]'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lags so/_/de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skul byed khyod 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yun du bzhugs par 'tshal gyi/_kha zas tshig 
[\[23b.5\]]pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par ni mi 'tshal lo zhes de skad ma zer cig_/'du byed kyi rang bzhin blta bar bya mod/_de ltar lta ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_dam pa'i chos 'dod pas ni de ltar bslab 
[\[23b.6\]]par bya'o/_/skul byed kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'jam dpal 'o na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lha mchog tu gyur pa la gal te 'du byed du gyur na lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/_/'du byed rnams ni chu bur bzhin du shes shing shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin 
[\[23b.7\]]du 'khor ba yin no/_/lha rnams ni mchog tu tshe ring zhes grags la/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni lo brgya yang ma thub ste/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/_/dper na mi la la zhig grong dpon byed pa las de mthar gyis dbang 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]phyug chen por gyur nas blon po chen po'i dbang phyug las kyang 'das te/_rang gi dbang phyug gi 'bras bu chos kyis rnyed pa la longs spyod pa las/_de phyir yang bsod nams zad cing dbang phyug las nyams par gyur na/_gzhan gyis 
[\[24a.2\]]bkol zhing brnyas par 'gyur ba de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbul por gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de dang 'dra bar gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur du zin na/_'chi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir lha'i yang lhar 'os pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa 'jam dpal de bas na 
[\[24a.3\]]lha'i yang lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de ltar 'du byed dang 'dra bar ma lta shig_/'jam dpal gzhan yang ci khyod shes bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du rtog par byed dam/_
[\[24a.4\]]'on te ma shes pas rtog par byed/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed dang 'dra na ni 'jig rten gsum po dag na chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pa lha'i yang lha mdzad pa'i 'os ma yin no/_/dper na rgyal po'i dbang po la la zhig la gyad stong gi mchog tu gyur 
[\[24a.5\]]pa'i gyad cig yod la/_de gyad thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i phyir gyad stong thub ces bya ba'i ming thob ste/_de la gyad zla med pa'i phyir bla nas dbang thang chen po 'grub na ci gyad stong thub pa de'i ming de thos na skad grags pa de mi bden pa yin nam/_'on te yon tan 
[\[24a.6\]]yod na ni yon tan can gyi ming thob pa yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /_phung po'i bdud dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud dang /_rang bzhin gyi bdud kyi gyad thams cad bcom pas na gyad stong thub bzhin du yang dag pa'i yon tan 
[\[24a.7\]]gyi sgo nas 'jig rten gsum po dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yin gyis/_btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la 'du byed dang 'dra bar yongs su ma rtog shig_/dper na la la zhig 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]phyug cing nor mang ba'i rigs su skye ba blangs la tshe thung bar 'gyur ba zhig ste/_de skar mkhan dag gis mthong nas khye'u 'di ni tshe thung ngo zhes bstan te/_de'i pha mas de skad thos na 'di ni bdag cag gi khyim du phan par 'gyur ba ma yin no snyam nas/_grangs su 
[\[24b.2\]]yang mi rtsi zhing de la byams par mi byed do/_/de ltar skyes pa 'am/_bud med dam/_lha 'am/_tshangs pa yang rung ste/_gang tshe thung ba de la khyad du gsod par gyur na/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba nyid 'du 
[\[24b.3\]]byed du gyur du zin na 'jig rten thams cad kyis brnyas par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyi nang na ni phyir ltung ba med cing zad pa med pa la thar pa zhes bshad na/_gal te de ltar gyur na don med par gyur gyis/_btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[24b.4\]]'du byed du gyur ces de skad du ma gsung shig_/dper na bud med gzhon nu dbul mo/_bkren ma/_mgon med pa/_nad kyis thebs pa/_bar ma dor sdug bsngal bar gyur pa/_sbrum pas nyen pa zhig mgon med pa khang pa zhig tu song ba las/_bu mo de bu byung 
[\[24b.5\]]nas/_de na snga nas gnas pa gzhan dag gis de de'i nang nas bskrad de/_nyon mongs ma de bu btsas ma thag tu byis pa kha dmar khyer nas lo legs pa'i yul zhig tu chas te song ba las/_lam du sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_rlung dang /_nyi tshan dang /_sdig 
[\[24b.6\]]sbrul gyi gnod pas nyen par gyur te/_gang gA'i klung chen po rgal bar 'dod pa las de rgal bar ma nus so/_/khye'u de khyer bzhin du gang gA'i nang du shi nas/_de bu de la byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 
[\[24b.7\]]'jig rten du skyes te/_byams pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig gis skyes zhe na/_bdag ni shi yang bla'i khye'u 'di nye zho med par thar bar bya'o snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par gyis skyes pa de bzhin du/_btsun pa 'jam dpal skyes bu dam pa dam 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]pa'i chos dbyung bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed du gyur par blta bar mi bya zhing /_'du shes kyang bsgyur bar mi bya'o/_/gal te de lta bu'i mig lus la med na yang /_bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam du yang 
[\[25a.2\]]dag pa'i lta ba can du bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gdams ngag ston pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa yin no zhes bstan par bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos 'byin par byed pas ni ji ltar bud med gzhon nu dbul mos gang gA'i klung las 
[\[25a.3\]]bu bsgral ba'i phyir rang gi srog dang bsdos te 'bad pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos dbyung ba'i thabs bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas par mthong na bdag 
[\[25a.4\]]nyid kyis don du bya ba'i thar pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig lam du 'gro bas dub par gyur te/_khyim gyi nang du nyal ba las/_de'i tshe khyim de thog thag nas me chen po 'bar te/_mi de mes tshig na da ni srog med 
[\[25a.5\]]zin no snyam nas/_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid gos kyis dam du dkris te/_sems dran pa dang ldan bzhin du shi nas/_de ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod par sems pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal 
[\[25a.6\]]srid ni lan brgyad cu byas/_tshangs pa'i rgyal srid ni lan 'bum byas/_mi'i 'jig rten du yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la lan du ma byas te/_ngan song rnams su yang mi skye la lan mang du bde ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'ba' zhig thob pa de bzhin du/_
[\[25a.7\]]'jam dpal khyod skyes bu dam pa dag ltar 'dzem par gyis shig_/ngo tsha shes par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi thabs la 'jug pa spyod du ma gzhug shig_/dge slong tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]byas pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no zhes zer bas ni mu stegs par gyur te shi yang bla'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas yin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas yin no zhes zer ba gang yin pa de dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yin no/_/
[\[25b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas pa yin no zhes zer ba rnams ni rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dus byas dang 'dra bar ma lta zhig_/da phyin chad 'khor bar rgyu ba na mi 
[\[25b.3\]]shes pa la bzlas te bcom ldan 'das ni 'dus ma byas pa'o snyam pa'i shes pa 'ba' zhig rtogs par gyis shig_/de ltar byas pa dang bsgom pa de'i 'bras bus khyod myur ba kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[25b.4\]]ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/tshe ring bar gyur cig_/rigs kyi bus ni de ltar bya ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /_
[\[25b.5\]]ther zug dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang brtan par shes so/_/de ltar khyod kyis 'di kho na ltar 'dus byas khong rlag tu gtang ba'i sgo nas shes pa las na/_khyod kyang ring po mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[25b.6\]]kyis kyang de ltar 'u bu cag gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod do zhes phyis bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos smyur cig_/sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na ni smyur te sbyin pa mchog yin no/_/de la smyur te sbyin 
[\[25b.7\]]zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sa bon las myu gu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma yang rung ste/_don 'ga' zhig gi phyir lam du zhugs nas dub par gyur pa de dag la ci yod 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]pa dang /_de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa dang /_brtags pa'i sbyin pa byed pa de ni smyur te sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/skul byed de bzhin du khyod kyis ci yod pa las zhal zas kyi tha ma mang yang rung nyung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[26a.2\]]dang bcas pa khyed par yod kyang rung khyed par med kyang rung ste 'drim du chug cig_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye'o/_/de nas skul byed kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'jam dpal khyod kha zas la chags sam ci na zhal 
[\[26a.3\]]zas mang yang rung nyung yang rung brims shig ces bdag gi gzhen 'debs par byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa mdzad mdzad na ci da skad cig tsam yang gzhes mi spyod dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin te zhal zas 
[\[26a.4\]]kyi sku ma yin na/_ci bcom ldan 'das zhal zas gsol lam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal skul byed kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no/_/skul byed legs so/_/legs so/_/khyod ni theg pa chen po la shes rab 
[\[26a.5\]]che ba'o/_/khyod ni theg pa chen po la shed byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te de ltar bzhed par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe ring bar shog shig_/skul byed kyis smras pa/_ci bdag 'ba' zhig la bcom 
[\[26a.6\]]ldan 'das mnyes sam/_'on te sems can thams cad la yang mnyes/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das lta khyod dang /_bdag dang /_sems can thams cad la yang mi mnyes sam/_skul byed kyis smras pa/_de skad ma zer cig_/
[\[26a.7\]]gang la mgu ba yod pa de la phyin ci log gi 'du shes yod de/_'u bu cag ni de la spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mnyes pa 'am dgyes pa med do/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni ba be'u la byams pa'i phyir rtswa zos shing zos shing grong nyid du 'ong ba de 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]lta bu'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad la yang sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/_sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyi yul ni de lta bu yin no/_/btsun pa 'jam dpal dper na rta cang shes dang sbyar ba'i shing rta rgyug pa'i zla 
[\[26b.2\]]la bong bu'i shing rta rgyug pa mi srid pa de bzhin du/_'u bu cag bong bu'i shing rta dang 'dra ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang 'dra ba dang /_dgongs pa'i tshig dang mnyam du 'gro bar nus re skan/_dper na nam mkha' lding dpag tshad du mar 'gro 
[\[26b.3\]]ba nam mkha' la gnas pas chu'i nang na nya dang ru sbal 'khod pa rnams me long gi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du gsal bar mthong yang /_byis pa rnams kyis ni mig mi gsal ba'i phyir de'i mig gi rtsal brjod par mi nus pa de bzhin du 
[\[26b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang de rang 'dra'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_skul byed de ni de bzhin te/_bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi che ba nyid gleng ba'i phyir de skad du brgal bar zad do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 
[\[26b.5\]]nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs bkye nas/_de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog go_/de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rtogs nas mgar ba'i bu skul byed la smras pa/_skul byed/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[26b.6\]]'da' bar [{]rings kyis[,]ring gis[}]/_dus su bcom ldan 'das la bshos 'drim du chug shig_/ma thogs shig_/rgyu med par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas skul byed cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[26b.7\]]'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skul byed nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gror nges/_dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus su zas 'drim du chug shig ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to/_/de nas skul byed kyis 'di skad 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]smras so/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs na ni 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag thams cad kyis ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad ces 
[\[27a.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/skul byed ma ngu shig_/de ltar lus la rma ma 'byin cig_/mi'i lus la chu shing bzhin du snying po med par rtogs shig_/smig rgyu ba dang /_dbu ba rdos pa dang /_sgyu ma dang /_rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod dang /_glog lta bur khong du 
[\[27a.3\]]chud par gyis shig_/'dus byas ni nyes pa grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas yin no snyam du shes par gyis shig_/'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la ltos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[27a.4\]]bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su mi gnang na bdag ci'i slad du mi ngu lags/_'jig rten stongs kyis ma mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul byed la 'di skad 
[\[27a.5\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/nga ni khyod la snying brtse ba dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/_'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dang 'dus byas kyi chos nyid do/_/'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya 
[\[27a.6\]]ba'i tshigs su bcad pa khong du chud par gyis shig_/chos thams cad ni 'du byed dang 'dres pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du rtogs shig_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o snyam du dpyod cig_/mi brtan pa/_brnyan ma/_phyin ci log pa'o snyam du soms 
[\[27a.7\]]shig_/lus 'di ni nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o snyam du shes par gyis shig_/'di ni dbu ba dang 'dra bar ltos la ma ngu shig_/yi ma chad cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la skul byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ni de bzhin du mjal lags na ha cang sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa la ni bdag glo ba rangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skul byed 
[\[27b.2\]]legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bus ni nga'i mya ngan las 'das pa thabs de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/skul byed sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni bya bzhad gzas la 'gro ba lta bur shes par gyis shig_/skul byed tshe ring ba dang tshe ring ba ma yin pa'i 
[\[27b.3\]]rtags shes par gyis shig_/skul byed chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i chos can no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la thabs kyi chos can yin la/_de rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[27b.4\]]rang bzhin no/_/skul byed khyod srid pa'i rgya mtsho las nges par rgal bar bya ba'i phyir zhal zas smyur te 'on cig_/lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyis kyang nga la rang rang gi mchod pa byas nas mi g.yo ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig_/khyod kyis kyang snod du 
[\[27b.5\]]gyur pa la dus su sbyin pa gyis shig_/ma thogs shig_/snod du gyur pa dang nga dang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni don tha dad pa ma yin no/_/de nas skul byed kyis kyang sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i phyir mgo smad de mchi ma blags 
[\[27b.6\]]nas gsol pa/_legs lags so/_/legs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag gis bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ji ltar blta ba de ni bdag cag sbrang bu dang 
[\[27b.7\]]'dra ba rnams kyi yul yang ma lags/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ma lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas mya ngan byed cing ngu bzhin du g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te mchod pa chen po'i las byas nas bcom 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal te zhal zas len du song ngo //_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_'khrugs 
[\[28a.2\]]rab tu 'khrugs/_'khor rab tu 'khor/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_shig shig rab tu shig shig_/mer mer rab tu mer mer/_ldem ldem rab tu ldem ldem mo/_/de la sogs pa byas te/_mi mkhris pa'i nad kyis brgyal ba'i gnod pas thebs 
[\[28a.3\]]pa bzhin du sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho dug can pa'i mthas gtugs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad thog thag tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi de dag thams cad mgo rmongs te/_'jigs shing skyi bung zhes byas nas/_ngu bzhin 
[\[28a.4\]]du tshig 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/mgon po khyod la bdag cag rnams/_/mgo bos phyag 'tshal gsol ba 'debs/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog khyod dang ni/_/bral na bdag cag mgon med 'gyur/_/deng khyod mya ngan 'da' 
[\[28a.5\]]'gyur 'di bsams na/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal shin tu gting zab bying /_/thub pa bdag cag snying ni stor bar gyur/_/ba bzhon rkun khyer be'u la chags pa bzhin/_/mgon med dbul po'i mi ni la la zhig_/nad kyis thebs la sman pa med pa dang /_/
[\[28a.6\]]rang dgar byed cing kha zas gnod pa rnams/_/za ba ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/skye bo 'di dag nyon mongs nad kyis thebs/_/khyod med khyod kyi chos kyi gsos med pas/_/lta ba'i nyes pa byed 'drar 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de bas phan phyir 'jig 
[\[28a.7\]]rten ma dor cig_/ji ltar grong khyer rgyal dang bral ba dang /_/dbul po rnams la mu ge byung ba dang /_/ji ltar dgon par skom gyis gdungs pa bzhin/_/khyod 'das 'og tu bdag cag de 'drar 'gyur/_/sems can gces khyod mya ngan 'da' bzhed pas/_/
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]sa gzhi rab tu g.yos shing phyogs kyang 'chol/_/rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs/_/bdag cag kun kyang sdug cing bsngal bar gyur/_/drang srong chen po deng khyod mya ngan las/_/'das na nyi ma'ang sa la ltung yang dag_/rgya mtsho chen 
[\[28b.2\]]po dag kyang skam par 'gyur/_/bdag cag kun kyang deng du 'gum lags grang /_/ji ltar stobs ldan mis ni sgo gseb nas/_/glang chen khyer te nang du 'dzul bgyid na/_/shin tu nyon mongs 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_/bdag cag thams cad rab tu nyon 
[\[28b.3\]]mongs gyur/_/ji ltar bu gcig 'gum par mi 'tshal zhing /_/mya ngan khyod 'da' bdag cag de mi 'tshal/_/gal te khyod ni mya ngan 'da' ba las/_/mi gzhes bdag cag thams cad phongs par 'gyur/_/khyod ni mya ngan 'das lam gshegs mthong 
[\[28b.4\]]bas/_/dud 'gro mang po'ang g.yar ngan cher bgyid na/_/bdag cag ji ltar g.yar ngan mi 'tshal lags/_/bdag cag mchil ma bzhin du ma dor cig_/nyi ma 'char kar rang gi 'od gsal bas/_/mun nag rnam par bcom pa de bzhin du/_/
[\[28b.5\]]'phrul can khyod kyis sdug bsngal mun bsal te/_/dge 'dun dbus su ri rab bzhin du bzhugs/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_rgyal po la la zhig gi bu sdug cing phangs pa zhig mchis la/_des de chos lugs kyi bstan bcos bslabs nas/_
[\[28b.6\]]'di sod cig ces bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras rnams kyang yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed nas bkum gyis ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu ji bzhin du bdag cag mi 'gum par 
[\[28b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/_ji ltar la la zhig gzhung gis rtsod pa'i bstan bcos la bsten pa na skrag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod kyis skrag par ma mdzad cig_/de kho na nyid mkhyen bzhin du bdag cag sems can dmyal 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bar mchi bar ma mdzad cig_/dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/_ji ltar rgyal po'i btson rar gnod pa'i las rnams kyis dang po nyon mongs pa na/_la la 
[\[29a.2\]]zhig gis khyod kyis na tsha ji lta bu zhig myong zhes smras na/_des de la smras pa/_de ni de bzhin te/_gang gi tshe bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba las thar bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ba de 
[\[29a.3\]]bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyang khyod bzhugs na/_rgyal po'i btson ra nas thar ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa lags na/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na sman pa tshe'i rig byed 
[\[29a.4\]]yan lag brgyad la mkhas pas/_bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma slob par bgyid kyi/_slob ma la ni bdag dang mnyam par 'gyur du dogs nas slob par mi bgyid pa de bzhin du/_chos kyi rgyal po sman pa chen po ser sna mi mnga' ba khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i 
[\[29a.5\]]rgyud phyi ma la de ltar mi mdzad par bcom ldan 'das yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/_de bzhin du shing rta pa shing rta'i rig byed la mkhas pas/_bdag gi bu la ni rgyud phyi ma sgra grag par phog pa'i dpyad thams cad slob par bgyid kyi/_slob ma la ni slob 
[\[29a.6\]]par mi bgyid pa dang /_rig pa'i gnas gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na byis pa 'am/_rgan po 'am/_nad pa la la zhig lam bzang po las gol te/_lam ngan par mchis na shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba 
[\[29a.7\]]de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das sems can lam ngan par mchis pa rnams lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das lam ston pa yun ring du bzhugs su gsol/_ya mtshan can 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /_tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyed lha dang mi rnams ltar byis pa'i smre sngags 'don pa dag ma byed par brtson 
[\[29b.2\]]'grus rtsoms shig_/de nas lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung blo gros dang ldan pa dang /_de kho na nyid du 'gro ba thos nas ji ltar bu gcig pa shi nas dur khrod du bor ba bzhin du de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/
[\[29b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_khyed rnams nges par bde gyur cig_/mya ngan ma byed ma ngu shig_/'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/_/thams cad mi smra 'khod par gyis/_/bag med par ni ma 
[\[29b.4\]]gnas par/_/bag yod pa la dga' bar gyis/_/khyed stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa 'am/_rtag pa dang mi rtag pa 'am/_skyabs dang skyabs ma yin pa 'am/_'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'am/_rten dang rten ma yin pa 'am/_ther zug dang ther zug 
[\[29b.5\]]ma yin pa 'am/_brtan pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa 'am/_sems can dang sems can med pa 'am/_yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/_bden pa dang bden pa ma yin pa 'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa 'am/_
[\[29b.6\]]gsang ba dang gsang ba ma yin pa 'am/_gnyis dang gnyis su med pa 'am/_de bzhin du chos rnam pa du ma dag la som nyi 'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za ba ci dang ci yod pa de dang de dag nga la zhus shig dang thams cad gcad par bya'o/_/bdud 
[\[29b.7\]]rtsi'i mchog kyang khyed la bstan par bya ste/_de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/mi'i lus thob pa rnyed par dka'o/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o/_/bzod pa dang 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa ma zhig ma ral ba yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa 'thob pa ni gser gyi phye ma dang /_u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_sa ni 
[\[30a.2\]]thams cad kyi sgo nas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te/_de bzhin du nga'i chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs gsang ba thar pa'i grong khyer gyi bdud rtsi'i zas kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad dang nga'i sras dge slong thams 
[\[30a.3\]]cad la dam pa'i chos mang po brtan por bzhag go_/gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan che ba nyid bsgrags te/_yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i thig le'i gtam yang bzhag nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[30a.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te/_skyi bung zhes byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[30a.5\]]'das la lan mang du bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes ches mchog yin par bstan to zhes 
[\[30a.6\]]gsungs te/_de ltar mi rtag pa'i 'du shes brten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/_
[\[30a.7\]]ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus pa yang dag par chad par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na ston gyi dus su zhing pas rmos cher btab ste rtsa ba 'dzings pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa de 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i 'du shes brten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par 'gyur/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad 
[\[30b.2\]]zad par 'gyur/_ma rig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal thams cad ma lus par yang dag par zad par 'gyur ro/_/zhing las thams cad kyi nang na ni ston gyi zhing las mchog tu bstan to zhes bya ba la sogs pa glang po che'i rjes lta 
[\[30b.3\]]bu'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_rgyal po 'chi ba'i tshe bdag gi btson ra bsal te/_sems can rnams btson ra'i gnod pas snyon smongs pa las thar bar bgyis nas de'i 'og tu 'chi bar 
[\[30b.4\]]bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis kyang sems can mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi btson rar brubs pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i 'ching ba rnams bcad nas/_de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/_bcom 
[\[30b.5\]]ldan 'das gzhan yang dper gsol na/_sems can 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon gyis brlams pa las/_sman pa chen po dang phrad na 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon rnams kyis thebs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_khyod dang mjal na nyan 
[\[30b.6\]]thos kyi tshogs thams cad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'byung po dang sha za'i gdon rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na glang po che'i 'dul 
[\[30b.7\]]sbyong gi mkhan pos spos kyi glang po che zhags pa chen pos bcings pa las glang po che'i zhags pa de bcad de bros pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_dngan 'then dang /_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]ser sna dang /_g.yo'i zhags pa chen po bcad nas glang po che'i 'dul sbyong gi mkhan po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu 'ongs nas/_sems can thams cad las nyon mongs pa'i glang po lnga bcu rtsa bdun yongs su bsal bar 
[\[31a.2\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na grang ba'i rims kyis thebs pa sman pa chen po'i thad du mchis na sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang nyon mongs pa dang /_log par lta ba dang /_log pa'i 
[\[31a.3\]]'tsho ba'i nyes dmigs mtha' yas pa'i grang ba'i rims nad can gyi lus dang ldan pa las sman pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar bar gyur te mi g.yo ba'i bde ba yang thob lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[31a.4\]]'das gzhan yang dper gsol na mi zhig gis 'bras skyems 'tshal te ra ro bar gyur nas bdag nyid kyis kyang bdag nyid ma 'tshal te/_chos kyang ma 'tshal/_chos ma lags pa yang ma 'tshal/_'di ni bdag gi ma'o/_/'di ni bdag gi sring mo'o/_/
[\[31a.5\]]'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du yang ma 'tshal la/_smad cing bla ste phyi sa dang gcin gyis rang gi lus kun bsgos shing mchis pa las/_de'i 'og tu bdag nyid sangs te gzhi ci las gyur pa la mkhas par gyur nas chang ni cir yang mi rung ngo snyam du sems te/_
[\[31a.6\]]bdag ni sdig pa thams cad las thar to snyam nas chang btung ba cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms te spong bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'di ni zlos gar mkhan bzhin du thog ma ma mchis pa na 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 
[\[31a.7\]]yongs su 'khyam pa na 'di ni bdag gi ma'o/_/'di ni bdag gi sring mo'o/_/'di ni bdag gi bu mo'o snyam du ma 'tshal nas/_ma dang sring mo dang bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i 'du shes spyod par bgyid de/_'bras skyems kyis ra ro bar gyur pa de bzhin 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]du sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur la/_de nas ngo tsha shes pa'i mi de dag 'bras skyems kyis ra ro ba las sangs pa bzhin cir yang mi rung bar shas cher bsgoms nas sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang e raN+Da la ni 
[\[31b.2\]]snying po mchis mi srid pa de bzhin du lus 'di la yang bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po mchis mi srid de/_de lta bur bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes 
[\[31b.3\]]bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so/_/dper gsol na phub ma skon pa byed pa snyed bor ba ni cir yang mi gces pa de bzhin du lus 'di la yang bdag ma mchis so/_/dper gsol na kha sral gyi me tog la dri bda' ba ma mchis pa de bzhin du lus 'di la yang 
[\[31b.4\]]bdag ma mchis te/_de ltar bdag cag gis bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang du bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/_de ltar sgoms shig dang /_de ltar bsgoms pa rnams 
[\[31b.5\]]kyis bdag tu 'dzin pa spang bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su spangs na mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms te mang 
[\[31b.6\]]du bgyis lags so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar nam mkha' la bya'i rjes gda' mi srid pa de bzhin du bdag ma mchis pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsgom pa de ltar 
[\[31b.7\]]bsgom pa khyod kyis shes sam/_dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes de ma lags pa bsgoms na ni ji ltar mi ra ro zhing 'khyam pas lha khang dang /_spo dang /_sa gzhi dang /_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_shing dang /_ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du gang dag gis sdug bsngal dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes ma bsgoms pa'i sems can 'jig rten pa de dag ni ra ro ba 
[\[32a.2\]]dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni yang dag par bsgoms lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ni dpe 'di'i don de ngas bshad par bya'o/_/khyed kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i don 
[\[32a.3\]]'di la don ni 'di'o/_/yi ge ni 'di'o zhes gsal bar mi shes te/_ji ltar mi ra ro bas lha khang dang /_spo dang /_sa gzhi dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_shing dang /_ri rnams mi 'khor bzhin du 'khor bar mthong ba de bzhin du 'du shes phyin ci log du mas 
[\[32a.4\]]zin cing kun tu rmongs pa rnams bdag go snyam pa dang /_rtag go snyam pa dang /_bde'o snyam pa dang /_sdug go snyam pa'i 'du shes kun tu spyod do/_/de la bdag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rtag ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[32a.5\]]bde zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sdug ces bya ba ni chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni sdug bsngal dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgoms lags 
[\[32a.6\]]so zhes rgyags pa dang nga rgyal gyis dregs par ma byed cig_/de ltar rnam pa gsum bsgoms par gyur na ni nga'i bstan pa la khyed kyis bsgom pa rnam pa gsum bsgoms pa de bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal shes par bya ba bsgom pa rnam 
[\[32a.7\]]pa gsum po ni khyad par dang khyad par gyi yang khyad par ro/_/sdug bsngal la bde'o snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o/_/bde ba la sdug bsngal lo snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o/_/mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]pa'o/_/rtag pa la mi rtag go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o/_/bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o/_/bdag yod pa la bdag med par 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o/_/mi sdug pa la sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni 
[\[32b.2\]]phyin ci log pa'o/_/sdug pa la mi sdug go snyam du 'du shes pa ni phyin ci log pa ste/_phyin ci log bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par ma shes par khyed kyis bsgom par bya ba bsgoms te mang du byas so/_/khyed kyis bde ba la sdug bsngal bar bsgoms 
[\[32b.3\]]so/_/rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang /_bdag yod pa la bdag med pa dang /_/sdug pa la mi sdug par bsgoms so/_/'jig rten pa rnams la yang bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_rtag pa dang /_sdug pa rnams yod do/_/'jig rten las 'das pa 
[\[32b.4\]]rnams la yang bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_rtag pa dang /_sdug pa rnams yod de/_'di la phan tshun mi 'thun pa yod do/_/yi ge zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go_/don ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes so/_/
[\[32b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du shes bzhi la sogs pa phyin ci log de bzhin gshegs pas lugs su bzhag pa rnams ni bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mthong yang mthong /_
[\[32b.6\]]bsgoms kyang bsgoms lags na/_da ji ltar 'tshal ba bka' stsal du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang bzhugs su gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang ci skad du bka' stsal pa de dang de dag de 
[\[32b.7\]]bzhin du bdag cag gis bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs su mi gnang na/_bdag cag kyang sbrul gdug pa dang khyim gcig gi nang du lhan cig mchis pa mi 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na tshangs par spyod 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]cing mchis pa'i rngo mi thogs kyis/_khyod nyid kyi slad bzhin du bdag cag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag khyed de skad 
[\[33a.2\]]ma zer cig_/dge slong dag ngas 'od srung gi lag tu bstan pa gtad par bya ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dge slong rnams kyi rten lta bur 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams dang sems can rnams kyi skyabs lta bur 'gyur ro/_/dper 
[\[33a.3\]]na rgyal po grong khyer mang po'i mnga' bdag grong khyer gcig tu song ste/_khyim bdag gcig rgyal por dbang bskur ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas 'od srung chen po dbang bskur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis sdug bsngal dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_
[\[33a.4\]]bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i 'du shes ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_dge slong dag dper na so ga'i dus la bab pa na skye bo rnams kyis nags tshal gyi nang du chu bskyil te/_rang rang gi rkyal pa'i yo byad thogs nas chu'i nang du rtse bar byed la/_chu de'i nang du 
[\[33a.5\]]gcig gis nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya rigs dang ldan pa zhig bzhag nas/_bai dUr+ya de 'dod pa'i phyir de dag thams cad kyis rkyal pa rnams bor te/_chu de'i nang du 'dzul nas de'i nang na gyo mo 'am gseg ma ci yod pa dag la nor bu yin snyam ste blangs nas nor bu 
[\[33a.6\]]bdag gis rnyed do/_/bdag gis rnyed do zhes zer zhing so so nas steng du byung ste/_rdzing gi 'gram du 'khod nas 'di ni nor bu ma yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur la/_rdzing bu de'i chu yang nor bu'i 'od kyis zla ba'i 'od bzhin du mdzes par 'dug ste/_de dag 
[\[33a.7\]]gis mdzes pa de mthong nas/_e ma nor bu snyam du yon tan gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi nang nas thabs la mkhas shing yid rno ba gcig gis nor bu de yang dag par rnyed pa de bzhin du/_dge slong dag khyed kyis thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/_/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]thams cad bdag med pa'o/_/thams cad mi rtag pa'o/_/thams cad mi sdug pa'o zhes thams cad kyi mu bzung nas bsgoms shing mang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rdzing gi nang gi gyo mo dang gseg ma bzhin du nor cing don med par gyur ta re/_
[\[33b.2\]]skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa bzhin du gyis shig_/khyed kyis thams cad kyi mu bzung nas gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dang de nyid la bde ba dang /_bdag dang /_rtag pa dang /_sdug pa yod de/_rnam pa bzhi po de dag ni phyin ci ma log pa zhes brjod par 
[\[33b.3\]]bya'o/_/de bas na nor bu dang 'dra bar chos kyi de kho na nyid rtag pa'i 'du shes sgoms shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/_
[\[33b.4\]]de ltar sgoms shig dang /_de ltar bsgom pa rnams kyis ni bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa spangs ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal lags na/_bka' stsal pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom 
[\[33b.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de'i rnam par dbye ba bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/dge slong dag bdag gi the tshom nges par gcod par 'dod pas ni de skad 
[\[33b.6\]]ces dri dgos te legs so/_/dge slong dag dper na grong khyer 'ga' zhig na rgyal po shes rab 'chal pa zhig rgyal po byed de/_rgyal po de la sman pa ngan pa zhig bdog la de yang sman pa 'chal pa zhig ste bla nas dbang thang cher dbang la rgyal pos kyang bkur ba zhig yod pa des 'o ma 'ba' 
[\[33b.7\]]zhig sman yin par 'dzin la/_nad kyi gzhi ni mi shes nas 'o ma'i dpyad log par zin pa de skye bo thams cad kyi rlung nad kyi sna grangs rnams la yang gtong bar byed/_mkhris pa'i nad rnams dang /_bad kan gyi nad rnams la yang gtong bar byed de/_de 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]de ltar byed kyang sman pa gces pa kho nar 'gyur la rgyal po de yang 'chal pa'i bye brag mi phyed pa zhig go/_/de nas sman pa tshe'i rigs byed yan lag brgyad la mkhas pa rgyud phyi ma shes pa gzhan zhig yul gzhan nas gsar du 'ongs nas sman pa 
[\[34a.2\]]de'i thad du rten bcas te smras pa/_khyod kyi ming thos nas slob par 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag mchis kyis/_khyod kyis bdag gi mkhan po mdzad du gsol/_/de nas sman pa 'chal pa des de skad ces thos nas sman pa gsar du 'ongs pa de la smras pa/_
[\[34a.3\]]lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nga la legs par bsgrims te dka' ba spyad pas rim gro gyis la/_de'i 'og tu slobs shig dang khyod sman par 'gyur ro/_/de nas des de bzhin du mnyan te/_de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_des mthar gyis sman pa 
[\[34a.4\]]'chal pa de mgu bar byas te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol te/_rgyal po chen po khyed kyis rtag tu bstan bcos thams cad la brtson par mdzod cig dang /_de ltar mdzad na rgyal po rgyal por 'os par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[34a.5\]]rgyal pos kyang de ni bden te rnar 'ong ngo zhes byas nas/_rgyal po des sman pa 'chal pa de dang sman pa cig shos kyi bye brag phyed par gyur nas/_sman pa ngan pa de yul phyogs nas bskrad de/_sman pa bzang po cig shos bkur bar gyur la/_de nas sman 
[\[34a.6\]]pa des da ni dus la bab bo snyam nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po gal te bdag la mnyes par gyur na gsol ba sna gcig gsol gyis gal te rgyal po chen po yang dgyes pa lta na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos sman pa la 
[\[34a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_nga'i lag pa g.yas pa man cad nor ro cog las gsol cig_/sman pas rgyal po la gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po'i sman pa 'chal pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gang lags pa de ni dug ha la ha la lags na/_des glo bar ma chud kyis rgyal po 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]khyod kyi yul khams thams cad du bkas btags la/_sngon gyi sman pa de'i 'o ma'i dpyad gang yin pa de ni dug ha la ha la yin gyis/_su sman du 'o ma 'thung ba de mgo bo bcad do zhes bka' gdags par gsol/_de ltar ma bgyis na sems 
[\[34b.2\]]can rnams dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_nad ma mchis par 'gyur bar 'tshal te/_lha bdag ni gsol ba de 'tshal lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/_de lta na gsol 
[\[34b.3\]]ba chung ngu zhig gsol te bka' gdags par bya'o zhes byas nas bka' yang btags so/_/de nas bka' btags pa bzhin du thams cad du lugs su chud par gyur to/_/de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la yang 'di skad ces gsol te/_da dung yang 
[\[34b.4\]]lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin du bka' gdags par gsol zhes byas nas sman pa des ro mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa'i ro dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba dang /_kha ba rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nad sos par byas so/_/de nas re zhig 
[\[34b.5\]]na rgyal po nad kyis thebs nas sman pa de bkug ste bsgo ba/_nga ni shi la thug gis rgyal po'i rkyen dang 'tsham pa'i gsol ba ci 'dod pa khyod la sbyin no zhes byas so/_/de nas sman pa des rgyal po de la gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba lags 
[\[34b.6\]]so/_/'o ma ni bdud rtsi lags te/_khyed kyis zhal zas 'o ma dang sbyar ba gsol 'tshal lo/_/de nas rgyal po des sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/_ci khyod mkhris pas myos par byas sam/_'on te nga slu bar byed dam ci na/_sngar ni 'o ma dug yin zer la da 
[\[34b.7\]]ni 'o ma sman gyi mchog yin no zhes zer/_kye ma sman pa snga ma bskrad pas phung ngo /_/des kyang 'o ma'i dpyad bsngags pa las na/_de ni sman pa chen po yin gyis sman pa ngan pa ma yin no/_/khyod kyis 'o ma'i dpyad byas pa ni khyod bdag bskrad pa'i rgyu yin 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]no zhes byas so/_/sman pas gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po de ltar gzhan du mi dgongs par gsol/_dper na shing ngam/_rtsig pa la srin bus brkos te yi ge'i 'bru 'dra bar gyur pa mthong yang mkhas pa rnams kyis srin bus yi ge shes so 
[\[35a.2\]]zhes brjod par mi bgyi/_yi ge sbyar ba lta bur gyur kyang ya mtshan du gzung bar mi bgyi ba de bzhin du/_khyod kyi sman pa snga ma'i 'o ma'i dpyad kyi las kyang srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste/_de ni 'o ma so so'i bye brag kyang ma 'tshal ba 
[\[35a.3\]]lags so/_/rgyal pos sman pa de la smras pa/_kwa'i sman pa ngan pa des 'o ma so so'i bye brag ji ltar mi shes/_sman pas gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po 'o ma ni bdud rtsi yang lags dug kyang lags te/_de la bdud rtsi zhes bgyi ba ni ba gang be'u ha cang 
[\[35a.4\]]stobs dang ldan pa ma lags pa dang /_chang gi snyigs ma mi 'thung ba dang /_nags khung dang /_gshong dang /_chu 'dam rdzab can na mi gnas pa dang /_ba lang rdzis nu ma ma bzhibs pa dang /_rtswa brngas pa ma gsan pa dang /_rang gi khyu na 'dug pa dang /_
[\[35a.5\]]ma he'i khyu dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_de la sogs pa ba'i yon tan rnams dang ldan la/_de'i 'o ma lhag ma zag ma bcad par ran tsam bzhos pa'i 'o ma de ni nad do cog zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/_/de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas 
[\[35a.6\]]sman pa de la bka' stsal pa/_mkhan po da ni ngas khyod kyi 'o ma'i dpyad bzang po yang shes so/_/ngan pa yang shes so/_/de nas rgyal pos bka' btags te 'o ma 'thung shig ces bsgo ba dang /_'bangs thams cad kyis rgyal pos phyir yang 'o ma 'thung 
[\[35a.7\]]shig ces bsgo ba thos nas sems 'khrugs te/_ci rgyal po gdon gyis thebs sam/_'on te bdag cag la mtho 'tsham mam zhes zer zhing de ltar grong khyer gyi mi dang /_'bangs thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags te/_rgyal pos de dag mthong nas smras pa/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]sman pa 'di na re 'o ma de 'dra'o zhes zer na khyed gsher ci yod ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_grong khyer gyi mi dang /_'bangs thams cad mgu bar gyur nas/_sman pa la mi mtshungs pa'i bsnyen bkur byas nas/_'o ma'i dpyad la yang sten par 
[\[35b.2\]]byed pa de bzhin du/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med 
[\[35b.3\]]pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman pa bzang po dang 'dra bar 'jig rten du byung nas/_mu stegs pa sman pa ngan pa dang 'dra ba thams cad kyi thad du gshegs te/_thams cad nges par btul zhing nges par bshig nas rgyal po du ma 
[\[35b.4\]]mgu bar mdzad de/_mu stegs pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag med do/_/sems can med do/_/srog med do/_/gang zag med do zhes gsung ngo /_/mu stegs pa rnams kyis bdag bstan pa ni srin bus brkos pa'i yi ge dang 'dra ste/_de'i 
[\[35b.5\]]phyir ngas sems can thams cad la bdag med do zhes bstan pa ston par mdzad do/_/bdag med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig yin no zhes chos kyi bka' 'dogs par mdzad nas/_yang gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi dbang dang /_sems can rnams la phan pa'i 
[\[35b.6\]]phyir dus mkhyen par mdzad nas/_chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa'i skabs de nyid du sman pa bzang po'i bzhin du bdag yod do zhes yang dag par ston par mdzad de/_'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag mthe bo tsam dang /_khre rgod kyi 'bru tsam zhes bya 
[\[35b.7\]]ba de lta bu ni ma yin no/_/'jig rten pa rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba gang yin pa de lta bu yang ma yin te/_'dir chos thams cad ni bdag med pa zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yang ma yin te/_bdag ni de kho na nyid do/_/bdag ni rtag pa nyid do/_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bdag ni yon tan nyid do/_/bdag ni ther zug pa nyid do/_/bdag ni brtan pa nyid do/_/bdag ni zhi ba nyid do zhes sman pa bzang po'i 'o ma bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ston par mdzad de/_de sgom pa 
[\[36a.2\]]la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis brtson par gyis shig_/dge slong dag gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig dang /_ngas legs par gsungs pas khyed rangs par bya'o/_/
[\[36a.3\]]nga ni bsgom pa thams cad las grol ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ston te/_dge slong khyed de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la rang bzhin gyis stong pa chen po ma bstan to zhes de skad ma zer cig_/dge slong dag gzhan yang tshul khrims 
[\[36a.4\]]kyi gzhi ma gtogs par the tshom dang som nyi ci dang ci yod pa de dag khyed kyis nga la zhus shig_/de nas dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[36a.5\]]rgyas la zhu ba ni bdag cag gi yul ma lags te/_bdag cag gis rngo mi thogs lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_khyod kyi gdams ngag kyang bsam 
[\[36a.6\]]gyis mi khyab pas na/_bdag cag gis zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_mi la la rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/_lo brgya nyi shu rtsa drug lon pa/_nad kyis thebs pa/_mal khri la mchis pa'i 
[\[36a.7\]]nad pa zhig mchis la/_mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te/_kye mi khyod kyis gter 'di long la gang gi tshe bdag lo bcu 'am/_lo nyi shu na byes nas phyir 'ongs pa dang /_de'i tshe 'di bdag la phyir byin cig ces bgyis nas des gtad 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]de mchis la/_rgan po de yang bu ma mchis pa zhig ste/_mi de mchis nas ring po ma lags par mi rgan po de gum na mi de slar mchis te/_de de ltar nor gyi phung po chen po dang bral bar gyur kyang su la yang ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/_
[\[36b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par bdag cag gis zhus pa de yang nyan thos la yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur la/_bdag cag la yang ji skad du zhu ba'i cha ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' 
[\[36b.3\]]stsal pa/_dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir ngas zhu ba'i skabs phye ba yin no/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_mi gzhon nu 
[\[36b.4\]]la la lo nyi shu rtsa drug lon te/_phyug cing 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig mchis la/_mi la la zhig gis de'i sug par gter gtams te/_'di skad du kye bdag ni don gnyer du 'gro'i/_bdag phyir 'ongs pa dang mi khyod kyis 
[\[36b.5\]]gter 'di bdag la phyir byin cig ces bgyis nas mi des gter de legs par sbas shing legs par bsrungs te/_de slar mchis nas slar stsal ba de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyi dbyig legs par gsungs pa dge slong kun 
[\[36b.6\]]dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad la gtad na ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'od srung chen po la sogs pa nyan thos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i slad du'o/_/byang chub sems dpas zhus pa'i dbyig byang chub 
[\[36b.7\]]sems dpa' rnams la gtad na ni lo 'bum phrag mang por gnas par gyur la/_'phel bar yang 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang sman par 'gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni de bzhin 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo thogs la/_bdag cag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs lags so zhes gsol nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 
[\[37a.2\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/dge slong dag khyed zag pa med pas ni de skad bya ba yin no/_/dgra bcom pas ni de skad bya ba yin te legs so/_/dge slong dag ngas kyang khyed kyis bsams pa'i don de snga 
[\[37a.3\]]nas bsams so/_/nga'i theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i lag tu gtad na rgyu gnyis kyis yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring po 
[\[37a.4\]]dag gzhi gsum ma gtogs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi gzhi ma gtogs par khyed kyi yid gnyis dang /_som nyi dang /_the tshom ci yod pa nga la zhus shig ces lan gnyis lan gsum du bka' stsal to/_/de nas 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas byang chub 
[\[37a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdong bu'i grong du skyes pa bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyag 'tshal te lan 
[\[37a.6\]]'bum bskor ba byas nas/_lha'i mchod pa'i las chen po byas te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom 
[\[37a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhus shig dang /_ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod 
[\[37b.2\]]kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 
[\[37b.3\]]dang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus bdag gis zhu bar mi 'tshal na/_bdag ni sbrang bu dang 'dra la de bzhin gshegs pa ni tsan dan lta bu'i 'khor lo chen po dang ldan pa lags/_seng ge lta bu'i 'khor lo chen po dang ldan pa lags/_bai dUr+ya 
[\[37b.4\]]dang rdo rje chen po ltar mi phyed pa'i sku mnga' ba lags/_mi phyed pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa lags/_ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po mnga' ba lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan 
[\[37b.5\]]pa dag kyang mchis te/_de ltar dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis zhu ba'i rngo thogs par gyur na/_'dir bgyi ba mang du mchis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag 
[\[37b.6\]]sbrang bu dang 'dra bas zhu bar 'tshal lo zhes byas nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_thub pa cis na tshe ring 'gyur/_/rdo rje lta bur cis 'gyur lags/_/gang gis mi shigs thob par 'gyur/_/cis na lus brtan stobs chen 'gyur/_/ji ltar 
[\[37b.7\]]bgyis na mdo sde 'di'i/_/pha rol phyin par 'gyur ba lags/_/ji ltar srog chags rnams kyi sems/_/sna tshogs rtogs nas ston par 'gyur/_/thub pa chen po ji ltar na/_/rgya chen thob nas skyabs su 'gyur/_/ji ltar dgra bcom ma lags 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]kyang /_/dgra bcom rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan ji ltar bgegs bgyid pa'i/_/bdud ni 'khor du chud par 'gyur/_/bdud kyi tshig kyang 'tshal ba dang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung yang 'tshal/_/
[\[38a.2\]]'dren pa ji ltar dga' bzhin du/_/'phags pa'i lam yang ston par 'gyur/_/dge dang yang dag ldan gyur nas/_/phyin ci ma log ston par 'gyur/_/thub pa chen po ji ltar na/_/legs byed 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/_/thub pa byang chub 
[\[38a.3\]]sems rnams kyis/_/ji ltar brtag dka' khams mthong 'gyur/_/thub pa ji ltar yi ge yi/_/phyed ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/_/ji ltar bzhad dang zal mo yi/_/spyod pa dag dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar phur bu pa ba sangs/_/
[\[38a.4\]]nyi ma dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/ji ltar sems ni ma skyes par/_/'dir ni 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar ka ta'i 'bras bu 'dra/_/ji ltar rtsod dus skyes pa na/_/gos pa ma mchis bgyid 
[\[38a.5\]]pa dang /_/nyes pa'i dbyings su pad ma ltar/_/nyes pa dag gis mi gos lags/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/yul khams sman pa chen por 'gyur/_/chu 'gram kun tu mnyan par 'gyur/_/de 'dir bdag la lung bstan gsol/_/
[\[38a.6\]]ji ltar sbrul rnams pags pa rnying /_/'dor ba bzhin du 'gyur ba lags/_/rin chen mang po'i 'byung gnas dang /_/'bru dang shing 'dra ji ltar lags/_/brtan po de dag nyan thos dang /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis/_/sku gdung ji ltar 
[\[38a.7\]]ston par bgyid/_/mtha' yas sgo yang ji ltar ston/_/rgyal sras brtul zhugs brtan po rnams/_/ji ltar mi phyed 'khor dang ldan/_/de dag 'jig rten dmus long gi/_/mig dang 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/thub pa chen po ji ltar na/_/mgo mang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]bye ba ston par 'gyur/_/ji ltar zla ba tshes 'dra bar/_/'jig rten rnams la chos kyang ston/_/ji lta bur ni gzha' gsang du/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston/_/ji ltar lha dang bdud 'dra bar/_/brtan por 'gyur zhing dpa' bar 'gyur/_/
[\[38b.2\]]ji ltar chos kyi sgo rtogs nas/_/chos nyid kyang ni 'tshal bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/nad med par yang 'gyur ba lags/_/sems can kun la sman pa'i phyir/_/de dag ji ltar dgongs pa 'chad/_/ji ltar dge ba 
[\[38b.3\]]lhag mar bcas/_/ji ltar the tshom spong bar 'gyur/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na/_/byang chub mchog tu nye bar 'gyur/_/cha phra gzigs pa khyod nyid kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsungs/_/chos rnams du ma'i sgo dag kyang /_/
[\[38b.4\]]'dren pa khyod kyis bka' stsol cig_/sems can kun gyi sman pa po/_/rkang gnyis rnams la sman ston cig_/thub pa'i phung po 'di dag las/_/bdag gis zhu ba'i yul ma mchis/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtan rnams kyi/_/yul ni thams 
[\[38b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa lags/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i bu 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs 
[\[38b.6\]]kyi bu khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nang 'dri bar mdzad pa bzhin du 'dri ba ni legs te/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung mang po grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed kyi pha rol na/_
[\[38b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa rang rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa dag nga dang thabs cig tu byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi phyir rol te/_byang chub tsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i don du byang chub kyi phyir rol pa de bzhin du khyod kyang 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yon tan ming gcig pa'i tshul thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul 'dri zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39a.2\]]bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs mod kyi cung zad cig zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_sbrang bus gnam dang rgya mtsho'i pha mthar mchi ba 'am/_rgya mtsho'i chab 'tshal ba'i rngo thogs pa de ni mi 
[\[39a.3\]]srid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag ni sbrang bu 'dra la bcom ldan 'das ni nam mkha' dang rgya mtsho dang 'dra zhing ye shes zab mo chos dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/_rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor bu dkor 
[\[39a.4\]]bas rang gi spyi bos blang ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos bka' stsal pa yang dag par blang bar 'tshal na/_shes rab rgya bskyed pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshungs pa med pa yongs su bshad 
[\[39a.5\]]du gsol/_bdag zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/las gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe ring bar gyur pa dang /_las gang gis byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba de 
[\[39a.6\]]bzung ba'i sems kyis nyon cig dang /_las kyi 'bras bu des na byang chub kyi rgyu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston cig_/rigs kyi bu ngas kyang las de byas shing gzhan dag la yang bstan pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[39a.7\]]pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu dper na mi la la zhig bu gcig pa thar bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i btson ra'i nang du 'gro ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring bar 'dod pas kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgoms na 'tshe ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur la/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[39b.2\]]chos spyod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bslab pa'i gzhi la 'god par 'gyur/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang 'god par 'gyur ro/_/gal te nus na sems can dmyal ba dang /_lha ma 
[\[39b.3\]]yin dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_dud 'gror skye ba rnams dang /_las mi bzad pa byed pa'i sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing /_grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o snyam nas 
[\[39b.4\]]de la 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur te/_legs par byas pa'i rnam par smin pa dang /_rgyu dang 'thun pa des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mchog tu tshe ring bar 'gyur la/_ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu 
[\[39b.5\]]'gyur zhing 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[39b.6\]]dpa' chen pos ci las bsams te sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad 
[\[39b.7\]]la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi 'tshal na tshig de ni mi 'dod par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di la sems can kha cig tshul khrims 'chal pa/_mtshams ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /_dam 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]pa'i chos sun 'byin pa dag kyang mchis na ci lags/_sems can de lta bu dag la yang bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bgyi lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa 
[\[40a.2\]]de lta los kyang mod/_nga ni sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du lta'o/_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i 'khor dag pa rnams kyis [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i gso sbyong la bab pa'i tshe/_
[\[40a.3\]]gzhon nu ma drangs pa/_lus ma sbyangs pa/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhig rtsig pa'i grwa zhig tu yib ste nyan pa na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes rdul zhib mo bzhin phye mar rlags lags/_
[\[40a.4\]]kye ma des de bkum pa ni lag na rdo rjes ha cang drags lags so/_/de lta na ci ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang 'dra bar gzigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer 
[\[40a.5\]]cig_/gzhon nu de ni sprul pa yin te/_dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang /_bskrad par bya ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de ltar bstan par zad kyi/_dam pa'i chos sun phyung yang rung 'dod chen pa yang rung ste 
[\[40a.6\]]gsad du mi rung ngo /_/rgyu sogs pa'i srog gcod pa ni byed mi phod do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar rgyal po 'am/_blon po chen po dag dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rlag par byed pa de bzhin du nga ni brlag par bya zhes mi zer mod kyi/_de dag 
[\[40a.7\]]nyid kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du smin par zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni de rnams kyi don du mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing 'od zer gcig gam gnyis gtong bar mdzad de/_gal te 'od zer des de dag la ma phog na ni 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]'chi bar 'gyur te/_der de bzhin gshegs pas ci byar yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gal te khyod kyis brtag dka' ba blta bar nus pa lta na/_ngas khyod la rgyu gzhan yang bstan par bya ste/_yul so so na tshul khrims dang 
[\[40b.2\]]cho ga dang yon tan rnams tha dad pa yod la/_der de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dag dam pa'i chos khol du 'byin par 'dod pa la rgyal pos ston pa med pa'i phyir gnod pa byed pa las/_rgyal po de rgyal po 
[\[40b.3\]]gzhan gyis bzlog ste/_des mthu chung bar byas nas/_rgyal po de chos la gnas par gyur na/_rgyal po cig shos de la bsod nams chen por 'gyur zhes nga smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po cig shos kyi nyes pa chen po'i gzhi zhi bar byed pa'i 
[\[40b.4\]]phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na zhing ngam khyim du dug shing ngam snye long skyes na rtsa nas dbyung dgos pa de bzhin du tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar gcad par ngas gnang ngo /_/
[\[40b.5\]]gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par mi byed pa de dag ni nga'i bstan pa las shin tu ring ba yin no/_/gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par byed pa de dag ni nga'i slob ma dang /_nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_gal te de 
[\[40b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa de skad gsung na ni sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa'ang ma lags/_ste'u dang tsan dan lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang rlag par 'gyur na/_dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams ji ltar tshar gcad pa'i rigs lags/_
[\[40b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i mi rigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa dper na khyim bdag gam/_tshong dpon nam/_sde dpon nam/_blon po'am/_rgyal po yang rung 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ba zhig gis rang gi bu sdug cing phangs la mchog tu mdzes shing byad gzugs phun sum tshogs pa rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtad nas slob dpon de la 'di skad smras te/_bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dul ba dang /_cho ga dang /_
[\[41a.2\]]spyod yul dang /_rig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyis/_'di rnams khyod kyis 'dul ba dang /_cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_rig pa rnams slobs shig_/chos shig_/gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las gsum ni brdegs pa dang /_
[\[41a.3\]]bsdigs pa dang /_tshar bcad pa rnams kyis shi bar gyur la/_gcig ni gson por 'dug ste/_gcig lobs par gyur na gsum ni shi yang bla ste/_gsum ni shi_/gcig ni lobs pa de la ci slob dpon gyis ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas 
[\[41a.4\]]zhes bya 'am/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de la ni gnyi ga la yang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de la ni 'khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te/_de ltar bgyis na bsod nams mang po 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[41a.5\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs te/_bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod pa bzhin du 
[\[41a.6\]]rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g.yel ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na/_ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 
[\[41a.7\]]'gyur zhes bya'am/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dge bsnyen rnams la yang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa mi mnga' ba lta la gos par ga la 'gyur te/_de dag nyid kyi 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]yon tan dang spyod pa bsrung ba'i slad du mi 'dod bzhin du tshar gcod par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar na bu gcig pa'i 'du shes sgom pa yin te/_gang dag de ltar sgom pa de dag gis ni bu gcig pa'i 'du shes 
[\[41b.2\]]bsgoms par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41b.3\]]des na mchog tu 'tshe ba med pa dag par 'gyur te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring ba dang /_mchog tu tshe ring ba dang /_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[41b.4\]]bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta los kyang mod/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[41b.5\]]ldan 'das dper gsol na gtam rgyud mkhan zhig gis ltad mo pa'i 'khor gyi nang du ma la phu dud bya ba'i rigs pa'i gtam sna tshogs bgyis la/_rang gi khyim du mchis nas mchog tu dka' ba bgyid bgyid pa'i ma la dbyug pa dang /_phag dum dang /_
[\[41b.6\]]bong ba dang /_rdo dag gis gnod pa bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring ba dang /_mchog tu tshe ring 
[\[41b.7\]]ba dang /_tshe rabs dran pa dang /_mi 'chi ba dang /_ther zug pa dang /_brtan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid sku tshe thung lags/_ci slu ba mdzad dam/_'on te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sgra 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pas/_ma gzigs sam/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dka' ba mdzad mdzad do/_/mi'i ltar brtsis na lo brgya yang mi thub ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba lags na/_
[\[42a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe de snyed kyi srog cig bcad lags/_'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba las na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mchog tu mi bzad pa'i las mdzad lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[42a.3\]]stsal pa/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di kho na ltar ma rgya shig ma rgya shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu 
[\[42a.4\]]sku tshe ring ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu brtan pa'o/_/mchog tu zhi ba'o/_/mchog tu ther zug pa'o/_/mchog tu rtag pa'o/_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[42a.5\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa dper na chu klung gang gA dang /_ya mu na dang /_sa ra yu dang /_hing gu la la sogs pa chu klung chen po rnams 
[\[42a.6\]]dang /_chu bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho chen po kho na'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa lha yul dang sa'i steng gi tshe'i chu klung yod do cog thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho kho nar 'bab ste/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[42a.7\]]mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo /_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa gzhan yang 'di ltar chu klung chen po bzhi ma dros pa'i nang nas 'byung ba de bzhin du tshe ring ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung ngo /_/'di ltar rtag pa thams cad kyi nang na ni nam 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]mkha'i mchog tu rtag pa yin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang nam mkha' bzhin du rtag go/_/'di ltar zhi bar byed pa thams cad kyi nang na ni mar 'ba' zhig mchog tu zhi bar byed pa yin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba dang bsil bar gyur pa 
[\[42b.2\]]yang mar dang 'dra ba'i chos ston to/_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ba lags na/_sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bskal pa 
[\[42b.3\]]'am bskal pa las lhag par yang yun ring du bzhugs shing sprin chen po bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi char yang rab tu dbab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[42b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa 'di na dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma 'am/_'di las phyi rol 
[\[42b.5\]]yang rung ste/_mngon par shes pa lnga la dbang thob pa de yang bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par gnas shing nam mkha' la 'chag par yang byed/_nyal bar yang byed la/_mchan g.yon logs nas me dang 'dra bar 'bar bar byed pa dang /_
[\[42b.6\]]de bzhin du chos gzhan du dud pa 'thul ba lta bur yang ston/_tshe'i tshad kyang ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du snur bar byed do/_/mdor na ji tsam du 'dod pa dang /_ji tsam du dga' ba de tsam du ston par byed de/_'di dag ni mngon par shes pa lnga la dbang thob 
[\[42b.7\]]pa'i yon tan yin no/_/gal te mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa yang de ltar bdag nyid 'tsho ba'i dbang phyug la dbang byed na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du ma brnyes pa lta ci ste de lta bu la mnga' mi mdzad/_de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]lhag par ci ste mi bzhugs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug pa yin par khong du chud par gyis shig_/'jig rten 'di na sprul pa'i lus ni sha'i lus ma yin te/_deng de bzhin gshegs pa dug 
[\[43a.2\]]sman la rton pa'i sku yongs su 'dor bar mdzad do snyam du yang khong du chud par gyis shig_/rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug ces bya ba'i bstan pa mchog la yang brtson par gyis shig_/'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/_gal te de 
[\[43a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa lags na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das par khyad par ci mchis lags/_'jig rten pa yang bdag cag gi tshangs pa ni rtag pa ste thog ma'i dus nas byung ba yin no zhes mchi ba dang khyad par ci mchis/_gal te de bzhin 
[\[43a.4\]]gshegs pa rtag pa lags na khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur lags so//_//bam po bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dper na tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag gcig la ba lang sna tshogs spu 
[\[43a.5\]]mdog du ma rigs dang rgyud mang po khyu gcig cing lhas gcig pa du ma bye ba snyed yod la/_des ba lang de dag ba lang rdzi'i lag tu gtad de mar zhim po za la/_ba lang rdzi rnams kyang lhas skyong zhing zho dang 'o ma bsrubs pa las phyi zhig na ba lang gi bdag po de 
[\[43a.6\]]rang gi tshe zad nas shi ste/_shi ba'i 'og tu nags na rgyu ba'i chom shod kyis ba lang de dag phrogs nas de dag chung ma med pas rang rang gis 'o ma bsrubs te/_de dag gis bsrubs pa las 'o ma yin pa'i phyir 'o ma de dag las mar gyi dri yang mi bro la zhor yang ma 
[\[43a.7\]]rung /_dar bar yang ma rung /_pris mar yang ma rung na mar du lta ga la 'gyur te/_'o ma'i rang bzhin las kyang nyams nas de dag gis de chus bslad de bdag gis mar longs spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gis mar longs spyad par bya'o snyam du sems pa bzhin du 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]'jig rten pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba nor dang chos rgyas pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ba lang gi lhas kyi bdag po bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa chom 
[\[43b.2\]]shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang tshul khrims dang /_cho ga dang /_'dul ba dang /_spyod yul rnams dang /_sems can gyi khams rnams gud du bsgyur nas sems can yod do/_/srog yod do/_/gang zag yod do snyam du sems shing thar pa ni 'di lta bu zhig go_/
[\[43b.3\]]spyod pa ni 'di lta bu zhig go snyam nas spyod pa dang /_sems can dang /_thar pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_de kho na nyid ma shes te/_don gzhan la brtson pas thar pa yang mi thob la/_tshul khrims dang /_cho ga dang /_spyod yul dang /_'dul ba dang /_rtag pa 
[\[43b.4\]]dang /_de kho na nyid kyang mi rnyed de/_mi rgod kyi mar bzhin du 'jig rten pa rnams kyis chos kyi de kho na nyid mi 'thob la/_de dag sems can tshangs pas sprul pa ni rtag go snyam du 'dzin cing bdag gi ni thar pa yin no snyam du yang 'dzin la/_chom shod pa rnams 
[\[43b.5\]]kyi 'o ma bzhin du de kho na nyid ni mi shes so/_/de dag tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang /_gzhan gyi chung ma spangs pa'i rgyu dang /_pha ma la phu dud byas pa'i rgyus na/_chom shod pa rnams kyi 'o ma ma rung ba'i lhag ma tsam zhig yod pa bzhin du mtho ris kyi bde ba 
[\[43b.6\]]cha shas tsam zhig thob ste longs spyod par byed la/_de dag gis pha ma la phu dud bya ba ji lta bu yin pa yang mi shes so/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ji lta bu yin pa yang mi shes/_gzhan gyi chung ma spang ba ji lta bu yin pa yang mi shes/_rtag pa ji lta bu yin 
[\[43b.7\]]pa yang mi shes so/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni mi rtag pa yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yin te/_des na 'jig rten pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag go/_/mi brtan no snyam du 'dzin te/_de bas na mi rtag pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go zhes 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]bya ba la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de nas ba lang gi lhas de'i skal ba can gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung la/_chom shod pa de dag gis kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus de ba lang gcig 
[\[44a.2\]]kyang med par mi byed do/_/de nas nags na rgyu ba'i chom shod pa de dag gis ba lang gi lhas de bor te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim bdag rin po ches ba lang gi lhas de nyams su len par 'gyur te/_khyim bdag rin po 
[\[44a.3\]]che des rang gi blos ba lang gi lhas de'i 'o ma'i de kho na nyid kyi thabs shes par 'gyur la/_ba rnams kyi 'o ma yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyis nyis 'gyur du bzhor yod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[44a.4\]]'jig rten du byung nas/_ba lang gi lhas dang 'dra ba'i 'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pas na rtag pa'i sgra ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi rjes su 'thun gyi/_'jig rten pa chom shod dang 'dra ba rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[44a.5\]]sgra dang rtags kyis gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni khyim bdag rin po che bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi ba lang gi lhas nyams su len par byed de/_sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du chos 
[\[44a.6\]]kyi 'o ma 'jo bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu rgyu des na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug pa yin la/_'jig rten pa rnams la ni rtag pa'i chos med de/_rtag pa'i sgra de ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rnams 'ba' zhig la 
[\[44a.7\]]yod ces nga zer ro/_/de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ther zug pa'o zhes de ltar shes par gyis shig_/sems can gang dag rtag ces bya ba'i yi ge 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gnyis sgom pa de dag ni ring po mi thogs pa kho nar nga'i go 'phang dang lhag chad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe rtag go zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis sgom pa nub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[44b.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ces bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos glengs pa 'di rtogs par 'tshal na/_bcom 
[\[44b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di ji lta bu lags pa rgyas par bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos nyid ces bya ba ni lus yongs su 'dor ba ste/_lus yongs su 'dor ba zhes bya ba de ni smad pa'i tshig yin par shes par gyis shig_/
[\[44b.4\]]gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas sku bor nas slar yang sku len tam mi len pa bdag zhu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig_/'di ni chos nyid dpyod pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu dper na 'du 
[\[44b.5\]]shes med pa rnams la gzugs kyi phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po gnyis med na sems can de dag ji ltar gnas/_ji ltar gda'/_ji ltar snang /_de dag gi 'du shes ji ltar 'jug ces 'dri ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[44b.6\]]'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs dang /_gnas dang /_spyod lam dang /_bde ba rnams ji ltar bstan par bya zhes phyin chad de skad ma 'dri shig_/'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin te/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yin no/_/
[\[44b.7\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gi yul yin gyi/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang na gnas pa dang /_gang na snang ba ni khyod kyi yul yang ma yin gyis/_sangs 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku yin no snyam du khyed kyis gnas par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes yang dang yang du bsgom par gyis shig_/gzhi 
[\[45a.2\]]gsum la tha dad par ma byed cig_/mi rtag pa 'am/_mi brtan pa 'am/_ther zug pa ma yin pa 'am/_zhi ba ma yin pa 'am/_thar pa ma yin pa'i rnam par yang ma sgom shig_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gzhi gsum gyi 
[\[45a.3\]]bdag nyid chen po la de ltar mi sgom pa de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba ni dag pa yin no zhes nga zer ro/_/de ltar na rtag pa bsgom pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_rigs kyi bu dper na shing yod na grib ma yod kyi/_shing med na grib ma med pa de bzhin du de 
[\[45a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang skyabs su 'gyur gyi/_gal te mi rtag na lha dang mi rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na shing ljon pa'i grib ma snang zhes bgyi 'am mi snang zhes 
[\[45a.5\]]bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung chen po dang rus gcig pa shing ljon pa yod pa'i grib ma ci'i phyir med ces brjod par bya'o/_/de lta mod kyi sha'i mig gis ni mi mthong ste/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther 
[\[45a.6\]]zug pa yin te/_ther zug pa yin gyis kyang mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na shing ljon pa'i grib ma sha'i mig gis mi mthong ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pas rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug pa yin bzhin du 
[\[45a.7\]]mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na shing ljon pa'i grib ma bltar mi snang ba ltar sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag go snyam du yongs su rtog go/_/gal te nga dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rtag pa'i 'du shes khyod kyi pha ma la med na gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]ma dag go zhes nga zer ro/_/pha ma gnyis la gzhi gsum rtag par bstan na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsum la skyabs su song ba'i dge bsnyen ces bya ba'i ming khyod kyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_deng slan chad bdun rgyud kyi 
[\[45b.2\]]rigs tshun chad dang /_pha ma gnyis la bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rtag go zhes bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes kyang bslab par 'tshal lo/_/gzhan dag la yang bstan 
[\[45b.3\]]par 'tshal lo/_/gang dag bdag gis bstan pa ltar mi 'dzin cing mi rtag par smra ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag la ni bdag gis ser ba bzhin du bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/dam pa'i chos 
[\[45b.4\]]srung ba'i rigs kyi bus ni de ltar bya dgos te/_rigs kyi bu khyod legs so/_/de ltar na 'tshe ba med pa la zhugs pa yin te/_'tshe ba med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu chen po des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe yang ring bar 'gyur la/_
[\[45b.5\]]tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro/_/'tshe ba med pa'i phung po'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//rigs kyi bu da ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku dang /_mi shigs pa'i sku dang /_rdo rje'i sku dang /_sha'i sku ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi skur ltos
