[\[207b.7\]]khrims dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_grol thar dang /_shes mthong ba las kyang grol thar to/_/shA ri'i bu khe tshol ba'i dge slong ni sangs rgyas kyi phyir khyim nas tshul khrims kyi le'u bshig na chos bshad pa ci dgos/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu nga'i chos kyi yi ge'i nang na bshad 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa mi la la zhig bdag dge bar ma zhi la bdag gi bag bya mi nus par mi gzhan dge bar zhi ba dang bdag gi bya nus zhe na/_bden pa yang med do/_/dper na mi zhig bdag rang 'dam rdzab tu nub la/_mi gzhan dbyung bar bya ba dang mtshungs te/_bden pa yang med do/_/
[\[208a.2\]]mi la la zhig bdag gi dge bar zhi bar nus shing 'dam rdzab na phyin nus pas mi gzhan dbyung bar bya ba ni bden pa yod do/_/de lta bas na shA ri'i bu ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bsgo'o/_/yang dag par gshegs pa la 'phya zhing skur na de'i sdig mi yang ngo /_/bden par smra ba'i 
[\[208a.3\]]dge slong ni chos 'chad du gnang ba'i rigs so/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi zer ba'i tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong gis ni chos kyi sbyin pa nus so/_/shA ri'i bu khri stan mthon po las chos 'chad cing yang dag par nges par the tsom gcod pa ni nang gi bla ma'i don yin no/_/la la zhig tshul khrims 
[\[208a.4\]]'dzin pa mi gtsang la/_mur 'dug gi gzhung la chags pa ni ngas ma gnang ngo /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba dang 'jig rten gyi skyid pa rin cher 'dzin pa dang /_yon gyi khe tshol ba dang /_'thab rtsod pa la sred pa ni ngas kyang ma gnang ngo /_/ngas gtsang gdang bar tshul khrims 'dzin pa dang /_sems drang 
[\[208a.5\]]dkan pa dang /_chos so cog gi bden pa'i mtshan ma khong du chud pa ni khri stan mthon por chos 'chad du gnang ngo /_/shA ri'i bu tshul khrims zhig pa'i dge slong nyis na khrims gtang sla'i/_'phags pa'i mtshan ma dang chos gos su sdig gi dri ma sbas bcabs la gsang ste/_ngan pa mang po bya 
[\[208a.6\]]zhing mi gzhan gyi yid ches pa'i sbyin pa la ma chags shig_/shA ri'i bu rgyu rkyen chung ngu'i phyir yun ring du sems can dmyal ba'i lus mnos par 'gyur ro/_/le'u bcu ste thabs bcol ba'i le'u'o//_//de'i tshe dga' bos sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[208a.7\]]de tsam gyi dus na dge slong rnams kyi dge ba'i chos la ji lta bur brtson 'grus dang /_sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_re zhig zhog la ma 'dri shig_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyis dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi chos yig bshad do cog de tsam gyi tshe'i dge 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]slong gis yid ches par mi nus na 'grus par spyod mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dga' bo yang dag par gshegs pa'i bya ba yod pa'i chos kyi shes rab yod do cog rang sangs rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa thams cad la sogs pa go zhing shes par mi nus so/_/dga' bo yang dag 
[\[208b.2\]]par gshegs pas mkhyen to cog gi chos khyod la bshad du zin na khyod bslad cing rmongs su rung na yid ches par mi rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_yang dag par gshegs pas de ltar de lta bu'i chos yig bshad pa ni/_de'i tshe mi gti mug gis yid kyang mi ches na yid ches shing gti mug gi lan 
[\[208b.3\]]bshad mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dga' bo chos kyis de bzhin pa'i rigs te/_bdag gi lus dang ba yin na gzhan la yang ngan ces zer ro/_/da ltar gyi bar du le lo'i dge slong la de tsam gyi tshe rabs kyi bar du brtson 'grus pa'i dge slong gis thub par mi nus so/_/tshul khrims 
[\[208b.4\]]'dzin to cog dang /_shes rab bskrun du mi rung ngo /_/yang dag par gshegs pas mi de nyes pa ngan pa byas so cog bshad du zin na lus gyur cing mnos so cog mi des yid mi ches te/_sdig lci ba g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod la sogs yang 'jigs skrag ste/_des ngan pa mnos so cog ni 
[\[208b.5\]]dpag tu mi nus so/_/dga' bo yang dag par gshegs pas zab mo'i chos nod pa ni dka'o/_/khyod kyi yid la ji snyam/_khri stan bzang po la phag gu sred dam mi sred/_bcom ldan 'das mi sred legs so/_/dga' bo nga'i bla na med pa g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos 'di zab mo dam pa ste/_
[\[208b.6\]]shes rab can sred pa ni mi des yid ches shing shes la khong du chub pa ma nus pas/_khyim nas byung zin pa dang /_rang na re dge sbyong zhes zer te/_bden pa bzhin du bstan bslabs pa mnod ma nus so/_/chos 'di la sems bcos ma nus so/_/zhim po'i ro ma thob ste/_lag pa brdabs nas song ste/_
[\[208b.7\]]lam ngan par lhung zhing 'dug pa ni dper phag gus khri stan bzang po btang ba dang mtshungs so/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_dga' bo nga'i bla na med pa g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin tu gtsang gdang ba bstan dka' bas yid ches shing shes par nus pa ma yin te/_gdul ba gdab dka' ba dang /_shes rab 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]med pa dang /_dgang bar dka' ba dang /_gso bar dka' ba dang /_tshul khrims zhig pa dang /_gdams dka' ba dang /_yon po'i chos la chags pa dang /_yon po'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_nor gyi khe ched cher 'dzin pa dang /_gos dang zas rab po snyam du 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[209a.2\]]cho ga zhig pa dang /_tshul khrims zhig pa dang /_skye bo'i chos su ltung ba dang /_ngan pa zhig pa dang /_le lo can dang /_'dod rgyu chung ngu dang /_khrel med pa ngo tsha ba'i kha na brjod pa dang /_mtshon nam las kyi don las 'brel ba dang /_dge sbyong gi nang na gos skya bo can dang /_dge sbyong gi nang na 
[\[209a.3\]]sun byung ba dang /_dge sbyong gi nang na yon po'i lam spyod pa dang /_dge sbyong ma yin par rang na re dge sbyong yin zhes zer ba dang /_bdud kyis bslus pa dang /_mur 'dug gi gzhung dang 'thun pa dang /_bshad pa bzhin du mi spyod pa dang /_mang po 'dzin pa la sred pa dang /_tshig cal col la sred 
[\[209a.4\]]pa dang /_bdud kyi don dang ldan par spyod pa dang /_bdud kyi rgyud dkrugs pa dang /_mya ngan 'khrug pa mdo ral ba dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_phyin ci log can gyis nga'i chos 'di la yid ches shing shes la khong du chud par nus zhe na/_bden pa yong 
[\[209a.5\]]med do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_dga' bo nga'i bla na med pa g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub gtsang gdang ba snying tshim par rgya che bas mi ngan pa 'di dang 'tshab par mi rung ngo /_/dga' bo dper na brgya stong 'bum gyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams bar yangs shing ring ba dang mtshungs so/_/ngan bzhin 
[\[209a.6\]]pa'i mi 'dis dge slong gi chos bsrings pa yang de bzhin no/_/mi 'gal ba'i bzod pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa mi thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dga' bo de lta bu'i don 'di ni bshad kyis mi zad do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dge sbyong ngan bzhin pa tha ma shin tu 'jung brkam srel to/_/shin 
[\[209a.7\]]tu zhe sdang srel to/_/shin tu yid mi ches pa srel to/_/gdug pa gsum bdo bar sems la spyod pa rtsing zhing zhe gnag pas bcos gdul dka' ste/_dga' bo dper na zhing gshin pa legs par smin pa la rang gi mes bsregs pa dang mtshungs/_kha zas zhim dkar la rang gis dug blugs 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]pa dang mtshungs/_khang khyim ci yang yod pa la rang gis mes bsregs na/_de lta bur rigs sam mi rigs/_bcom ldan 'das mi rigs lags so/_/dga' bo de lta bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi mi gti mug nga'i chos kyi zhar gyis yon len pa thob na yang dag par gshegs pa legs pa'i 
[\[209b.2\]]don la yid mi ches mi shes pa'i steng du 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge yid ches par mi nus so/_/bden pa bzhin du bshad pa'i nyes par bzod par mnags mi nus so/_/rma'i shu ba dang shus na nga'i tshig la bzlog ste/_de lta bu'i mi gti mug ni sangs rgyas la rten cing rang 
[\[209b.3\]]'tshol chos de zlog go/_/dga' bo de tsam gyi tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang na de lta bu'i mi gti mug gis de na ltag por gang ngo /_/dga' bo re zhig zhog_/de lta bu'i mi gti mug can ngan pa skye bar 'dod pa dang /_rga bar 'dod pa dang /_ngan pa'i don spyod pa btsal ba ci dgos/_de 
[\[209b.4\]]nas dga' bos sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi yi ge 'di ming ci zhes bgyi/_ji lta bu gus pas gzungs su gzung /_sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming sangs rgyas kyi mdzod ces bya'o/_/ming brtson 'grus g.yo ba 
[\[209b.5\]]spyod ces kyang bya'o/_/ming tshul khrims nyams zhig pa'i khrims thul ces kyang bya'o/_/chos so cog la gtams stsal ces kyang bya'o/_/gus par gzungs su zung shig_/dga' bo mi la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di kha ton dang /_gzungs su bzung na legs pa'i don thob pa ni 
[\[209b.6\]]dpag tu med/_mu med/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims zhig pa'i dge slong gis yid ches shing kha ton dang /_bklags la mi la bstan pa yang mi nus na/_de la sems dga' gzha' ba mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_dga' bo dper rkun po ngan pa rgyal po dang /_
[\[209b.7\]]rgyal po chen po'i thad du rang 'byung du mi spobs pa dang mtshungs so/_/gzhan gyi rdzas brkus na bdag rkun po yin zhes mi zer ro/_/de lta ste/_dga' bo tshul khrims zhig pa'i dge slong gis dge sbyong gi chos ma yin par 'byor grub na/_'on kyang bdag ngan pa zhes mi zer na/_mi 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gzhan la rang na re sdig gis zhes 'chad mi phod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dga' bo 'di lta bu'i chos kyi yi ge ni tshul khrims zhig pa'i dge slong rang thul 'khrugs par nus na/_khrel drin yod pa dang /_tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong gis rang skye zhing 
[\[210a.2\]]'phel ba 'thob bo/_/chos kyi yi ge 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_lha dgu khri kun gyis chos so cog la chos kyi mig gtsang ma thob nas bdud ngan pa dang gnyen bshes rnams kun mya ngan chen po 'khrugs pa ni dper khung chen po rnam pa bcu drug tu lhung ba dang mtshungs te/_skad cher ngus te 
[\[210a.3\]]smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta mI ngas shes so/_/ngas tshor ro/_/ngas rtag par nyin mtshan du smon pa/_sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na tshul khrims 'dzin pa bshig ste/_tshul khrims bshig pa yang bstangs/_dge slong ngan pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos mi shes shing kha ton dang /_klog pa 
[\[210a.4\]]'ba' zhig shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos la bden pa'i sems bshig la tshig gis 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin te phyogs bzhi'i gzhung med do zhes bya'o/_/gau ta mI nga ltar lha dang mi dang phal mang po kun tshogs pa'i nang na chos 'di la bsrungs bran te nga'i smon lam bkag go/_/
[\[210a.5\]]bdud kyis bshad zin nas mi dga' ba'i mya ngan 'khrug pa srel te phyod ces mi gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_ngas su chos rnams bshad do cog_/mchog gi gzhung bzhin mi 'gal te/_/bya ba yod pa mi sra ba/_/
[\[210a.6\]]dpe ru rmi lam mthong dang mtshungs/_/ngas da chos yig 'di bshad pa/_/ma 'ongs don ni spyod cing bskrad/_/mchog gi gzhung bzhin mi 'gal te/_/mi ngan rnams kyi nan tur byas/_/de yi tshe dus ngan pa la/_/dge slong sems ni 'khrug cing g.yo/_/'thab cing rtsod cing yid mi ches/_/mya ngan 
[\[210a.7\]]'das pa thob mi nus/_/dge slong dang ni gos skya can/_/'chad do cog la mi mtshungs med/_/de tshe nga yi chos 'di ni/_/tha mal chos dang tha dad med/_/bshad ni khyim na 'dug phyir bshad/_/khyod kyis nga yi yod dkon zhes/_/nga yi sangs rgyas chos las su/_/thog ma lam gyi mchog 'bras thob/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]de nas dge slong zhig na re/_/ngas bshad lam dang mi 'thun na/_/mi de nga dang 'thun pa yin/_/nga ni yang dag chos mthong ba'o/_/chos mthong dang ni ma mthong ba/_/gos skya can gyis spyad pas su/_/so so rang gi chos nang gi/_/de yi 'gro zhing brjod pa skyes/_/la la na re thams cad yod/_/
[\[210b.2\]]la la na re thams cad stong /_/drang po lam la mi gnas pas/_/rang bzhin ngan pas nga'i chos bshig_/khyod mi de la ma nye shig_/nga la 'ongs te bsnyen par rung /_/khyod la yang dag chos bshad na/_/rang bzhin smyur te lam thob bo/_/de lta bu yi sgra skad rnams/_/nye ring kun du khyab par gram/_/
[\[210b.3\]]sems 'thun zhing ni grogs ldog pas/_/dus su bstan pa'i chos kun bshig_/dpe ru rkun po ngan pa rnams/_/ngan pa 'thun pa grogs su byas/_/log cing 'gal ba yul sa dang /_/mkhar yul dang ni grong khyim bshig_/de yi tshe yi dge slong rnams/_/dbye zhing bstan pa rung thob kyang /_/dbang po 
[\[210b.4\]]rtul ba'i zam chags pas/_/shes rab nyung zhing mi rten pa/_/yang dag gshegs pa spyod pa bzhin/_/chos bshad pa yang mi shes te/_/zag pa yod pa gar skye bshad/_/yang na de ni lam thob yin/_/mang po tshogs pa'i nang du 'dug_/dge slong rnams ni mang du yod/_/kun na re ni 
[\[210b.5\]]shes rab yod/_/shes rab tshol ba mi gcig med/_/mang po tshogs pa de nang na/_/dge slong la la gcig 'ga' zhig_/yang dag bden pa shes pa yod/_/kun gyis spyod de shes rab med/_/lha dang lha ma srin gyis mthong /_/chos kyi rgyal po'i lam khye shig_/thams cad mya ngan 
[\[210b.6\]]'khrug pa srel/_/gcig la gcig phyogs mchi mas ngu /_/de nang shing lha yod pa kun/_/shing gi kha las sa la babs/_/kun kyang shAkya seng ge yi/_/dam pa'i chos ni mtha' kun med/_/sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum/_/'jig rten yun ring ma lon par/_/ji lta 
[\[210b.7\]]bur ni de ring kun/_/zad pa thams cad gyes shing zhig_/yang dag gshegs pa chos bshad pa/_/nga la sogs pa slar mi thos/_/blun rmongs med pas shes pas su/_/bla ma la ni med snyam ste/_/de tshe sa yi lha rnams dang /_/sgra skad chen po phyung nas su/_/yang dag gshegs 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]kyi chos sgron chen/_/de ni mi de zad ces zer/_/lha dang lha ma srin gyi rnams/_/ma mthong ma thos rjes su 'dzer/_/phyin cad 'gyod pa ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas lam ni med zin pa/_/sangs rgyas bskal pa grangs med du/_/bdag kyang gsod la gzhan yang gsod/_/
[\[211a.2\]]sdug bsngal thams cad bzod par mnos/_/sangs rgyas grub pas smon lam bskyed/_/shAkya seng ge 'phrul can gyis/_/sems can thams cad kun bsgral ba/_/gtsang gdang chos med zad du byed/_/gti mug ngan pa'i dgra rnams kun/_/de ni de yi mthu thob ste/_/byams shing snying 
[\[211a.3\]]rje'i sems med pas/_/gcig gis gcig la skur cing dkrugs/_/bdud kyis bkol ba'i bdud mi rnams/_/dbang po rtul bas dbye chos dka'/_/gcam sgyu mi dran le lo'i sems/_/zhe sdang sangs rgyas chos kyang bshig_/tshal nags stong pa 'ba' zhig la/_/bsam gtan thub 
[\[211a.4\]]ste gsum lon na/_/rang na re ni dgra bcom yin/_/bsam gtan thub ste gsum med na/_/lam thob pa lta smos ci dgos/_/lam mthong thob ces bya ba ni/_/shi na mya ngan 'das zhes zer/_/mi kun yid ches mchod rten brtsigs/_/sems can dmyal bar song zhes zer/_/de lta'i gti mug 
[\[211a.5\]]stong pa 'gas/_/gcig la gcig ni brnyas shing khro/_/ngas su bskal pa grangs med du/_/thob bo cog ni da zad kyi/_/da ltar nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis/_/shAkya'i rigs kyi seng ge mthong /_/dam pa'i chos ni nyams shing zhig_/sgra bskyod kun gyis mchi mas ngu //ngos bzhi lha rjes de thos na/_/
[\[211a.6\]]kun kyang mya ngan 'khrug pa srel/_/de tshe lha dang lha ma srin/_/thams cad kyang ni 'ongs te babs/_/yang dag pa na mkhar gnas su/_/'bar ba'i lha srin kun 'ongs te/_/kun gyis mchi mas cher ngus te/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sgra skad phyung /_/rin chen bdun gyi mkhar rnams yod/_/byi dor brgyan pa shin 
[\[211a.7\]]tu bzang /_/kha dog stor te sa dang mtshungs/_/lha rnams 'khor bar ma dad nas/_/mi dga' cho nge che ru ngus/_/rang gi gnas nas kun 'ongs 'dus/_/so so mya ngan 'khrug pa srel/_/gcig gis gcig mthong smra mi phod/_/kun gyi gnas kyi steng nas 'ongs/_/lhan cig nga skyes gnas su phyin/_/'gro ldog 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]sa la nyal 'dug ga gnas/_/'di skad kyi ni sgra dbyangs bskyod/_/lhan cig 'dzam bu'i gling du dong /_/de lta'i 'jigs skrag chen po mthong /_/sangs rgyas bu rnams 'thab cing rtsod/_/chos bshig sde ni so sor gyes/_/lha srin dang ni rin chen mkhar/_/zhag bdun bar du 'od mdangs med/_/
[\[211b.2\]]so so lhan cig 'khod cing ngu /_/zhag bdun bar du ma langs so/_/ji lta bu ni brtson 'grus che/_/dpa' zhing rtul la 'jig rten btsun/_/bdag cag da ltar 'di na 'khod/_/da phyin chad ni mi mthong ngo /_/kun 'grogs te ni gyi hwan dong /_/gcig la gcig phyogs mchi mas ngu /_/sangs 
[\[211b.3\]]rgyas 'di ru bden bzhin bshad/_/bdag cag rnams ni de nang na/_/'jig rten mun pa'i long ba rnams/_/gcig la gcig ni brnyas khro lhong /_/ngan pa'i las rnams 'ba' zhig bskyod/_/slar yang lam ngan pa ru lhung /_/lha rnams pho brang bzang po kun/_/'phags pa de ni stobs su byed/_/
[\[211b.4\]]bdag cag lha dang lha ma srin/_/bskal pa'i ra mda' yang med do/_/de yi tshe ni 'dzam bu'i gling /_/nyams shing zhig la brjid mdangs med/_/bgrod pa'i mdangs dang shing drung dang /_/ri dang phug na dge mi byed/_/'jig rten thams cad zad par na/_/kun kyang shin tu dkrugs cing g.yo/_/lha dang lha 
[\[211b.5\]]min dbang po rnams/_/sgra skad 'jigs shing skrag tu rung /_/de tshe sum cu rtsa gsum lha/_/lag bsgreng bzhin du mi dga' ngu /_/so so'i pho brang nang na yang /_/skad phyung bskyod de ngu zhing 'bod/_/lha rnams kyi ni pho brang na/_/bdag cag brjod cing bshad pa de/_/gzha' ru 'phrul chen rje dang bral/_/
[\[211b.6\]]bdag cag phyi ru chos bshad pa/_/rtsa gsum lha khams zla drug tu/_/rtse'u de'i kha zas mi za zhing /_/sil gyi dbyangs ni mi snyan te/_/mi dga' mi ngan shi ba bzhin/_/lha ma yin pa thams cad kyis/_/de lta bu yi gtam thos nas/_/gcig gis gcig bran kun sogs te/_/rtsa gsum lha la rgol du 
[\[211b.7\]]chas/_/de tshe 'dzam gling rgyal po dag_/phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod par 'gyur/_/lha rnams dang ni lha min kyang /_/de bzhin phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod/_/de'i tshe dge slong dge slong ma/_/las su lam ngan lhung ba mang /_/de las thar par nyung ngu yod/_/tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems can rnams/_/dge slong ngan pa 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bzhin du 'brang /_/de yi rgyu rkyen spyad pas na/_/kun kyang lam ngan pa la phyogs/_/dge bsnyen ngan pa rnams kun kyang /_/mkhan po ngan pa'i phyir 'brangs pas/_/de yang lam ngan pa ru song /_/'jig rten thams cad 'khrugs g.yos pas/_/la la mkhar dang grong du zhugs/_/
[\[212a.2\]]la la ri dang tshal du phyin/_/shar nub tu ni mya ngan srel/_/de yi tshe dang srog la gnod/_/de yi tshe ni dgra dag dang /_/bag tsha'i lam ni rnam mang yod/_/khre nas rnam lnga bskyed mi 'khrung /_/'khrungs su zin kyang srin gyis zos/_/de yi tshe ni 'jig rten rnams/_/bkres pas ltogs te shi ba mang /_/yi 
[\[212a.3\]]dgas ngan du lhung ba rnams/_/yun du sdug bsngal nyon yang mongs/_/de yi tshe na mi rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mchod rten dang /_/phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun sbyin pa'i nor/_/thugs thub tu ni kun bgos zos/_/da ni dge 'dun de bzhin no/_/dga' bo khyod la sogs pa rnams/_/mugs te 
[\[212a.4\]]byung la brtson 'grus spyod/_/phyi ma'i tshe dus zad pa na/_/de lta bu yi chos ngan rnams/_/mthong bar bya ba mi rigs so/_/tha mal pa ni thams cad kun/_/gti mug blun po shes rab med/_/tha mal pa yi las rnams spyod/_/smyur te lam ngan nang du lhung /_/khyed rnams 'khrug par kha ton lhogs/_/de 
[\[212a.5\]]yi mig ni shes rab rgyu/_/shes rab kyi ni yon gyis su/_/smyur te rgyal ba'i gnas su phyin/_/ngas su 'jig rten drug po mthong bslabs pa/_/khyed rnams kyang ni de bzhin bslabs/_/'jig rten bsgribs bags don bcad na/_/smyur te rgyal ba'i gnas su phyin/_/'phags pa'i lam brgyad 'grus spyad na/_/
[\[212a.6\]]smyur te mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/chos btsal bdag gis bsod nams btsal/_/ngas bshad cog ni de bzhin no/_/bskal pa 'di ni 'das phyi na/_/bskal pa drug cur sangs rgyas med/_/sangs rgyas sgra dang skad kyang med/_/lam thob med pa smos ci dgos/_/de tshe dus kyi mi rnams kun/_/bkres ltogs bru bas 
[\[212a.7\]]nyen pas su/_/sri zhu byams pa sems med de/_/ma dang bu yi sha yang za/_/de tshe khyim gyi byis pa rnams/_/gzhan gyis zos dogs rim gro rtag_/de lta bu yi dus ngan thos/_/su zhig skye shi las kyang bskyed/_/sdug bsngal phyi mo gti mug yin/_/lnga phung phyi mo 'dod chags yin/_/'dod chags lnga la ma dad na/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]'dod cing chags pa rnams kun chod/_/dpal gyi 'bras bu lam thob ste/_/'dod cing chags pa'i sems zab skyes/_/'dod chags kyi ni rgyu rkyen gyis/_/ngan pa g.yos pas lam ngan lhung /_/zag med chos ni stong pa zhi/_/'jig rten sra mkhrang med par 'gyur/_/de lta bu ni shes rig na/_/khyed la sogs 
[\[212b.2\]]pas smyur spyod rigs/_/sems med sems kyi 'du shes skyes/_/bdag nyid shin tu 'jigs shing skrag_/bdag gis byams bsams ma byas pa/_/de yi don ni ji lta bu/_/de lta bu yi tha mal rnams/_/bsams shing mnos te 'gros dpags na/_/bdag gis ji lta bu ru byas/_/de bzhin rtag par mchi mas 
[\[212b.3\]]ngu /_/phung med phung po'i 'du shes skyes/_/nga med nga yi 'du shes skyes/_/nyid kyi mtshan ma'i stong chos thos/_/de lta bus kyang bslab cing rmongs/_/sangs rgyas kyis su bden bshad pa/_/phung po rnams kyi gzhung ma rig_/thos na mi 'gyur snyam du 'dzin/_/'jigs pa'i gnas 'jigs sems pa med/_/ngas 
[\[212b.4\]]'das ma 'ongs da ltar bshad/_/phung po rnams ni kun stong zhing /_/dus gsum zad par mnyam snyoms te/_/dpe ru nam mkha' stong pa bzhin/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas yod do cog_/des kyang nyin mtshan stong par bshad/_/ma 'ongs dus kyi sangs rgyas rnams/_/des kyang nyin mtshan stong par bshad/_/
[\[212b.5\]]nga 'dra 'jig rten mngon par 'byung /_/chos rnams thams cad kun bshad kyang /_/ngo bo nyid dang mtshan nyid stong /_/dus gsum la ni mi mtshungs pa/_/sangs rgyas bden gzhungs bshad do cog_/ma 'ongs mis ni mi shes te/_/nga dang sems can la chags pas/_/mtha' ru ngan pa'i lam du lhung /_/ma 
[\[212b.6\]]'ongs dus ni de bzhin te/_/ngan chen shin tu 'jigs skrag rung /_/khyod la sogs pa brtson 'grus spyod/_/de lta'i dus ngan ma mthong byos/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi yi ge 'di bshad zin nas/_rgan zhing btsun pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi lha dang /_mi 
[\[212b.7\]]mang po thams cad kyis/_sangs rgyas kyis bshad do cog thos nas/_kun shin tu dga' gzha' ste/_sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa la yid ches par mnos so/_/sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzod rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[(]sha [,]sho [)]lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhir byas so//_//
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]{D124}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+nA ka ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[213a.2\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul gnas bcas na nag po'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[213a.3\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa grangs med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg 
[\[213a.4\]]pa mtshungs pa med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa gzhal du med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa brjod du med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag 
[\[213a.5\]]par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par 
[\[213a.6\]]zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_
[\[213a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa bshad du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[213b.2\]]pa/_theg pa dpag tu ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa grangs ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa gzhal du ma mchis 
[\[213b.3\]]pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa brjod du ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa/_yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma 
[\[213b.4\]]mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs 
[\[213b.5\]]pa ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[213b.6\]]brjod du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag mchis pa de dag bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa thos na/_'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 
[\[213b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang 
[\[214a.2\]]dag par 'jug pa'i slad du brtson 'grus rgya cher rtsom zhing de dag go cha sra bar 'gyur/_go cha stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_go cha rdo rje lta bur 'gyur/_go cha mi shigs par 'gyur/_go cha mi ldog par 'gyur/_go cha mi zlogs par 'gyur/_yi dam brtan par 'gyur/_yi 
[\[214a.3\]]dam stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_yi dam mi 'khrugs par 'gyur/_yi dam mi ldog par 'gyur/_yi dam mi zlogs par 'gyur/_stobs bskyed pa thob par 'gyur/_bgyid pa thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rab tu bstod par 'gyur/_de dag 'chi 
[\[214a.4\]]ba'i phyogs su mun pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla na med pa spyod pa na zhum pa ma mchis/_rgod pa ma mchis/_sgyid lug pa ma mchis/_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug pa la de dag gi byang chub thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_sems can 
[\[214a.5\]]rnams kyi bsam pa'i sgrub pa 'tshal bas 'thun par chos ston par 'gyur/_sems can rnams kyi gan du mchi ba'i dus 'tshal pa la gnas par 'gyur/_sems can 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa la sems can rnams 'dzud pa'i thabs 
[\[214a.6\]]la mkhas par 'gyur/_brjod pa thams cad la ma chags par 'gyur/_mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas pa la mkhas pas nye ba dang /_ring bar 'du shes pa ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[214a.7\]]gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med brjod du med pa la yang 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med brjod du med pa'i 
[\[214b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_snying brtse ba don 'dod pa snying rje can 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa 
[\[214b.3\]]ste/_/'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas spobs so/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[214b.4\]]legs so legs so/_/zhes gsol te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 
[\[214b.5\]]snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag 
[\[214b.6\]]tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa 
[\[214b.7\]]yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos na/_de thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu 
[\[215a.2\]]med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ngas 
[\[215a.3\]]gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mar me can gyi tshong 'dus kyi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos pa de'i tshe mi skye 
[\[215a.4\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/gang gi tshe ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad des nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa 
[\[215a.5\]]grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[215a.6\]]mtshungs pa med gzhal du med brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de las ngas rang gi lung bstan pa thos nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis ta la bdun srid kyi 
[\[215a.7\]]nam mkha' la 'phags te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston pa de ngas mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]bar snang la 'dug bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/ye shes gzigs pa dpag med thogs pa med/_/bde gshegs ma smad 'jig rten mig tu gyur/_/khyod kyi ye shes thogs pa med par 'jug_/bde 
[\[215b.2\]]gshegs khyod kyis 'jig rten ma gzigs med/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi 'od ni zil mi non/_/sangs rgyas zhing bye bsam mi khyab par 'gro/_/ri dang brag gi rtse mo thal byung ste/_/rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib par byed pa med/_/'bras bu ji ltar lag mthil gzhag pa 
[\[215b.3\]]bzhin/_/bde bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams sna tshogs rnam mang la/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/phung med byang chub rab zhi reg 'gyur zhes/_/
[\[215b.4\]]rgyal sras bsod nams byas la lung ston pa/_/bar snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag_/nam mkha'i ngos la 'dug cing sems dang bas/_/nyon mongs rgyal ba rgyal ba yab la bstod/_/bar 
[\[215b.5\]]snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag_/dga' ldan gnas nas dpag med shi 'phos nas/_/phra ba'i blo rnams tha ma'i mngal 'jug pa/_/bar snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong /_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[215b.6\]]'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag_/ma yi g.yas logs rum na gnas gyur te/_/lha yis rab tu mchod cing byung ba dag_/bar snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag_/bdud kyi sde dang dpung rnams 
[\[215b.7\]]pham byas nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' bla med byang chub sems/_/bar snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong /_/'jig rten mgon po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/me la chu btab zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/yang byung rab zhi mya ngan yongs 'da' ba/_/bar 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong /_/stobs bcu mi dbang khyod kyi gzi brjid kyis/_/'jig rten na ni sgrib pa gang yang med/_/rgyal ba tshad med zhing yang de bzhin te/_/thogs pa med par nam mkha' 'di nas mthong /_/ji ltar mi dag 
[\[216a.2\]]rmi lam 'dod spyod dang /_/sos ka ji ltar smig rgyu 'byung ba dang /_/la las chu nang zla ba mthong ba bzhin/_/zhing dang sangs rgyas de dag bdag gis mthong /_/gang tshe bdag gis sangs rgyas zhing yongs dag_/de tshe sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob/_/sgrib pa med pa'i 
[\[216a.3\]]ye shes skyes pa'i tshe/_/de ni mi dbang byang chub bdag lung bstan/_/'gro ba thams cad brag ca 'dra ba ste/_/skye bo mkhas pa dag la mi slus so/_/de ring mgon po khyod kyi gsung thos nas/_/chos kyi ming dang yang dag nyid kyang rtogs/_/nga ni sgrib med rnam grol spyod 
[\[216a.4\]]pa na/_/mtshungs med bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing yang dag_/rgyal ba tshad med de bzhin zhing rnams na/_/mi dbang gzigs shing bzhugs par ngas mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa 
[\[216a.5\]]la bslab par bya'o/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par thar par yang mi 'dzin/_'di na rnam par thar pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_sgrib par yang mi 'dzin/_'di na sgrib pa med ces kyang mi 'dzin/_byang 
[\[216a.6\]]chub sems dpa' med par yang mi 'dzin/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di na med par yang mi 'dzin/_spyod pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_spyod pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing med par yang mi 'dzin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_
[\[216a.7\]]dpag tu med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_dpag tu med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_grangs med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_grangs med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di na'o zhes kyang 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]mi 'dzin/_mtshungs pa med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_mtshungs pa med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_gzhal du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_gzhal du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa 'di na'o 
[\[216b.2\]]zhes kyang mi 'dzin to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la kun tu spyod pa rmis la mi de yang byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin/_blun pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin gyi mkhas pa rtogs pa shes rab dang ldan 
[\[216b.3\]]pa'i rang bzhin can te/_nyal ba sad nas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par yang mi 'dzin/_'dod pa'i yon tan 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_'dod pa'i dga' ba med par yang mi 'dzin/_'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal 
[\[216b.4\]]sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par thar pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_rnam par thar pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_brjod du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa 
[\[216b.5\]]'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa'i bar du'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sgyu ma sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i tshogs sam/_rta'i tshogs sam/_shing rta'i tshogs sam/_dpung bu chung gi 
[\[216b.6\]]tshogs bstan la/_de la mi byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa/_blun pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa mkhas pa rtogs pa/_bye brag phyed pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can de dag gis de mthong na/_glang po che'i tshogs med par yang mi 'dzin/_glang po che'i tshogs 
[\[216b.7\]]'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_rta'i tshogs med par yang mi 'dzin/_rta'i tshogs 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_shing rta'i tshogs med par yang mi 'dzin/_shing rta'i tshogs 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_dpung bu chung gi tshogs med par yang mi 'dzin/_dpung bu 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]chung gi tshogs 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_sgyu ma med par yang mi 'dzin/_sgyu ma 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par thar par yang 
[\[217a.2\]]mi 'dzin/_rnam par thar pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_brjod du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa'i bar du'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam thang zhing sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las 
[\[217a.3\]]mtsho'i chu shin tu dang ba'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de la mi gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa/_blun pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa/_mkhas pa bye brag phyed pa/_rtogs pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can de dag 
[\[217a.4\]]gis de mthong na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor med par yang mi 'dzin/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_gzugs brnyan med par yang mi 'dzin/_gzugs brnyan 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar 
[\[217a.5\]]pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par thar pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_rnam par thar pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_brjod du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_yang 
[\[217a.6\]]dag par 'grub pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_yang dag par 'grub pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa'i bar du'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'i tshe nam thang zhing sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la smig rgyu rgyu zhing g.yo ba de la mi gang dag byis pa'i rang 
[\[217a.7\]]bzhin can ma yin pa/_blun pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa/_mkhas pa/_rtogs pa/_bye brag phyed pa/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin can de dag gis de mthong na/_smig rgyu ba med par yang mi 'dzin/_smig rgyu ba 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_g.yo ba med par yang mi 'dzin/_
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]g.yo ba 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang spyod pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_spyod pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing med par yang mi 'dzin/_
[\[217b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin dpag tu med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_dpag tu med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_grangs med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_grangs med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_
[\[217b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_mtshungs pa med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_mtshungs pa med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_gzhal du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_gzhal du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa med par yang mi 
[\[217b.4\]]'dzin/_brjod du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_yongs su dag pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_yongs su dag pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_yang dag par 'grub pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_yang dag par 'grub pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta 
[\[217b.5\]]ste/_dper na sprin med cing sprin dang bral te nam thang ba'i nam mkha'i dkyil nas sprin byung bas nam mkha' thams cad yog pa de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mis mthong na/_sprin gyi dkyil 'khor med par yang mi 'dzin/_sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_kun 
[\[217b.6\]]khebs pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_kun khebs pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par thar pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_rnam par thar pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 
[\[217b.7\]]'dzin/_sgrib pa med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_sgrib pa med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_byang chub sems dpa' med par yang mi 'dzin/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_spyod pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_spyod pa med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_sangs 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing med par yang mi 'dzin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_dpag tu med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_dpag tu med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_grangs med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_grangs med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_bsam 
[\[218a.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_mtshungs pa med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_mtshungs pa med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_gzhal du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_gzhal du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_
[\[218a.3\]]brjod du med pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_brjod du med pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_yongs su dag pa med par yang mi 'dzin/_yongs su dag pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin/_yang dag par 'grub pa med pa yang mi 'dzin/_yang dag par 'grub pa 'di na'o zhes kyang mi 'dzin to/_/
[\[218a.4\]]'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram zhes sems la mi bya ste/_'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[218a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa bsgrim mi dgos par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram/_de bzhin 
[\[218a.6\]]du sbyar te/_ci sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram snyam du sems la mi bya ste/_'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bsgrim mi dgos par yongs su dag par 
[\[218a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam langs pa'i dus kyi tshe/_ci nyi ma 'char ram snyam du sems la mi bya ste/_'on kyang nam langs pa'i dus kyi tshe/_bsgrim mi dgos par nyi ma 'char ba de bzhin du/_'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam du sems la mi bya ste/_'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa 
[\[218b.2\]]nas brjod du med pa'i bar du bsgrim mi dgos par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dang /_
[\[218b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_brjod du med pa yongs su dag go/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[218b.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji tsam du rgya cher yongs su dag lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal 
[\[218b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji tsam du rgya cher yongs su dag pa ni tshig gi go bar sla ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyir rung lags sam/_
[\[218b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer gcig tu gyur pa la 'di lta ste/_phye'am phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba 
[\[218b.7\]]bzhin du yungs kar gyis gang bar gyur te/_mi la la zhig gis yungs kar de rdul phra rab tu btags nas yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul du byas la/_des rdul phra rab de dag phrag pa la thogs nas shar phyogs su song ste/_gom pa gcig bor bas 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' la/_gom pa 'dor ba 'di 'dra ba dang ldan zhing /_'di lta ste/_sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan te/_gom pa 'dor ba de lta bu dang ldan pas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[219a.2\]]snyed du song zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bor la de lta bu'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de thams cad bor te de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor zhing de bzhin du steng dang /_'og gi phyogs su 
[\[219a.3\]]yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul de snyed bor na/_'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_yungs kar gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gang du bor ba dang ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang mang /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni nyung lags 
[\[219a.4\]]kyi ma bor ba de ni ches mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang /_gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur la/_'di lta ste/_phye'am phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba bzhin 
[\[219a.5\]]du yungs kar gyis gang ba de la mi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru de dag btags te/_yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul du byas te/_des rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad phrag pa la thogs nas shar phyogs su song ste/_gom pa gcig 
[\[219a.6\]]bor bas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing /_'di lta ste/_sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pa de lta bu'i gom pa 'dor zhing de lta bu'i mgyogs pas/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song ste rdul phra rab kyi rdul 
[\[219a.7\]]gcig bor zhing de lta bu'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad bor la/_de bzhin du lho phyogs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de snyed 'dor zhing /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi mtshams dang /_steng dang /_'og gi phyogs 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dang /_phyogs mtshams su rdul phra rab de snyed bor na/_'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_gang du rdul phra rab de dag bor ba dang /_gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang mang /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang du rdul phra rab de dag bor ba ni nyung lags kyi ma 
[\[219b.2\]]bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ches mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab bor ba dang gang du ma bor ba de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur la/_'di lta ste/_phye'am phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba bzhin du yungs 
[\[219b.3\]]kar gyis gang la/_mi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru de dag btags nas/_yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul du byas te/_des rdul phra rab de thams cad phrag pa la thogs nas shar phyogs su song ste/_gom pa gcig bor bas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[219b.4\]]khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing 'di lta ste/_sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan te/_gom pa de lta bur 'dor ba dang /_de lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song ste rdul phra rab gcig bor la/_de lta bu'i 
[\[219b.5\]]tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad bor la de bzhin du lho phyogs su rdul phra rab de snyed bor zhing /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi mtshams dang /_steng dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams re rer yang rdul phra rab 
[\[219b.6\]]de snyed bor na 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_gang rdul phra rab de bor ba dang gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gang mang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang du rdul phra rab bor ba ni nyung lags kyi ma bor ba de ni ches mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'jig 
[\[219b.7\]]rten gyi khams gang du rdul phra rab ma bor ba dang gang du bor ba de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur nas yungs kar gyis gang ba ni ji lta ba sngar dpe bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par byas te stong phrag sum cur bsgyur ba/_'jam dpal de thams cad kyi tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi phung po bzhag pa de 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam gyi rgya ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgya yang de tsam mo/_/byang chub kyi shing de ni rin po che sna bdun te/_'bras bu ni yid bzhin gyi 
[\[220a.2\]]nor bu'o/_/byang chub kyi shing de'i yal ga ni tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed yod do/_/yal ga gcig cing yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yal ga phre'u yod de/_yal ga phre'u gcig cing yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'bras bu yod do/_/'bras bu re re la yang cha shas ni 
[\[220a.3\]]dpag tu med do/_/'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de ni de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bur grub pa ste/_de ni mig yongs su ma sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na bar snang 
[\[220a.4\]]gi gnod sbyin rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag mi rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi shing de yang mig yongs su ma sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams mi thogs par 
[\[220a.5\]]'gro ste/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na bar snang gi gnod sbyin dag gi gzhal med khang rnams la mi thogs par 'gro ba de bzhin du 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams mi thogs par 'gro ste/_byang chub kyi shing de yang yongs su dag pa'i las dang ldan pa'i sems 
[\[220a.6\]]can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni shar phyogs su yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed yongs su dag go/_/lhor yang de snyed/_nub tu yang de snyed/_byang 
[\[220a.7\]]du yang de snyed/_shar lhor yang de snyed/_lho nub tu yang de snyed/_nub byang du yang de snyed/_byang shar du yang de snyed/_steng dang 'og gi phyogs su yang de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de de tsam du rgya cher yongs su dag go/_/sgrib pa med pa'i 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]rnam par thar pa la brten na de'i brgyar bgrangs pa de snyed du rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag go/_/'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_'gas pa rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med de/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[220b.2\]]na byis pa lnga brgya tsam rtse na kha cig 'greng /_kha cig 'dug pa'i rgyun mi chad cing bar skabs med pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_smin pa dang /_'gas pa yang rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta 
[\[220b.3\]]ste/_dper na char gyi 'bru rags pa 'bab pa'i tshe/_chu la chu'i chu bur kha cig 'byung /_kha cig 'jig pa rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med pa de bzhin du 'bras bu de dag 'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_'gas pa yang rgyun mi 'chad cing bar skabs med de/_'bras 
[\[220b.4\]]bu 'gas pa de'i cha shas gcig las kyang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ste/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_lus dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/_sred med kyi bu ltar lus mkhregs pa/_srid pa tha ma par gyur pa'i sems can 'jig 
[\[220b.5\]]rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i bar du ste/_de dag thams cad kyis kyang de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sbyangs te/_de dag de nas byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[220b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[220b.7\]]yongs su dag pa 'chad de/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang ston to/_/de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nyan cing kun 'dzin te/_thos ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/_/mngon par shes pa thob ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong ngo /_/de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[221a.2\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te rab tu goms par byas/_lam du byas/_rten du byas/_rus shing bzhin du byas/_rab tu 
[\[221a.3\]]rtogs par byas shing legs par brtsams so/_/ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shugs ldan zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi gnas zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la 
[\[221a.4\]]dbang byed pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung 
[\[221a.5\]]ste/_me tog gi tshogs kyi bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[221a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de la nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu yod de/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[221a.7\]]zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur yod de/_thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[221b.2\]]smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_
[\[221b.3\]]brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/_/yang nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos khrag khrig yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur yod do/_/nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa la ni 
[\[221b.4\]]nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgya yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'i bar du'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur yod do/_/nyin re zhing chos 
[\[221b.5\]]ston pa thams cad la nyan thos 'dus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du de bzhin gshegs pa des chos bstan pa kun shes so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni rtsis mkhan nam rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas 
[\[221b.6\]]pas bskal pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa stong phrag brgya'am/_bskal pa bye ba'am/_bskal pa khrag khrig gam/_bskal pa gtams sam/_bskal pa dkrigs sam/_bskal pa 'gyur yas kyi bar du yang nyan thos 'dus pa 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan 
[\[221b.7\]]thos 'dus pa brgya phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa bye ba phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa gtams phrag 'di snyed ce 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa khyad phyin phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_nyan thos 'dus pa 'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces brtsi bar mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[222a.2\]]rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs la skar ma'i gzugs 'di snyed ce'am/_skar ma'i gzugs brgya phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_skar ma'i gzugs stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_skar ma'i gzugs brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_bye ba phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed 
[\[222a.3\]]ce'am/_gtams phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce'am/_'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces rtsis mkhan nam/_rtsis mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas kyang bgrang bar mi nus te/_'on kyang skar ma'i gzugs dpag tu med pa'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du 'jam dpal 
[\[222a.4\]]nyan thos 'dus pa de rnams kyi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po zhig yod pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad la dbang zhing bdag po byed de/_las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[222a.5\]]thob pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i bar du ro sna brgya pa'i zhal zas sbyar te rim gro byas so/_/yul ka shi pa'i na bza' 
[\[222a.6\]]gsol zhing yo byad thams cad kyang sbyar te/_'di ltar chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyis rtsa ba'i rim gro byas so/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la ro sna brgya pa'i zas kyis rim gro byas pas 
[\[222a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa bskyed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]zhing grangs med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs med pa bskyed par gyur to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mngon 
[\[222b.2\]]par 'dus byas nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa bskyed par gyur to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya 
[\[222b.3\]]chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu med pa rgya chen po bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_tshul 
[\[222b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med cing rgya cher mngon par 'dus byas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nas brjod du med cing rgya che ba'i bar 
[\[222b.5\]]du mngon par 'dus byas nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa bskyed do/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs med/_
[\[222b.6\]]dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rgyas par bya'o/_/
[\[222b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu med pa mngon par 'dus byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]dpag tu med pa bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che ba grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa mngon par 'dus byas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[223a.2\]]phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du med pa'i bar du mngon par 'dus byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa bskyed do/_/'jam dpal rgyal po bde 
[\[223a.3\]]gnas blo gros kyis de lta bur pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas/_dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba mang bas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la pha rol 
[\[223a.4\]]tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas pa/_/chu bo bzhi rgal mi'i seng ge_/khyod la phul ba dpag med 'gyur/_/sbyin pa de yang zil mi non/_/ba tshwa med pa'i zhing dag la/_/rdo dang bong ba gyo mo med/_/
[\[223a.5\]]kun sbyangs rab tu rmos pas na/_/mi mnyam med phyogs rtswa med par/_/ji ltar sa bon btab nas su/_/rmed pa'i mi de bder nyal yang /_/dus su rtsa ba brtan par zug_/myu gu sngon por 'byung bar byed/_gru yis sa la chus btab pas/_/lo ma sdong bu rnams kyang 'byung /_/dus 
[\[223a.6\]]tshigs dus kyi rim bzhin du/_/nges par 'bras bu smin par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom/_/gti mug bral ba nges pa'i blos/_/ma smad yon tan zhing khyod la/_/shes rab gshol gyis rmos pa ni/_/sa bon nyung ngu btab na yang /_/de bzhin sbyin bdag mi brtson 
[\[223a.7\]]yang /_/pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs shing /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i myu gu skye/_/mgon po khyod la sbyin phul na/_/byams pa snying rje nyon mongs med/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_/tha mar 'bras bu mya ngan 'da'/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/_/sa la dong ka men rgyas 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bzhin/_/bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa bsags pas/_/ji ltar bde gshegs de bzhin shog_/ji ltar bsod nams mtshan mnga' ba/_/legs spyad bsags pa thub pa'i tog_/ji ltar mi mchog dam pa bzhin/_/bdag kyang bde gshegs de bzhin gyur/_/ji ltar dpe med blo 
[\[223b.2\]]can khyod/_/shes rab gnas la khyod gnas nas/_/lta bar rab tu bying ba yi/_/skye bo ma log 'god par mdzad/_/bdag kyang byang chub reg nas ni/_/de bzhin bde la rab gnas te/_/log pa'i lam song skye bo rnams/_/bden pa bzhi yi lam du 'god/_/ji 
[\[223b.3\]]ltar khyod ni phung po med/_/bla med phung po zad par zhugs/_/byis pa phung pos bcings pa rnams/_/thams cad phung po 'dor du btsud/_/bdag kyang phung po med pa dang /_/phung med byang chub mchog thob nas/_/phung pos bcings pa'i skye bo rnams/_/phung po 'dor bar 
[\[223b.4\]]rab tu 'god/_/ji ltar khyod kyis nyon mongs spangs/_/chu yis me rnams zhi ba bzhin/_/nyon mongs me yis 'bar ba yi/_/skye bo sdug bsngal thar bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang byang chub rab reg ste/_/khro glen 'dod me ma zhi zhes/_/nye bar zhi ba'i lam stor ba'i/_/skye bo rab tu 
[\[223b.5\]]zhi bar 'god/_/ser sna'i zhags pas bcings pa dang /_/phrag dog kun sbyor mun pas bsgribs/_/srid par chags pa mgon med rnams/_/yan lag brgyad kyi lam la dgod/_/ji ltar rang byung khyod nyid ni/_/stobs bcu ye shes rab gnas te/_/srid skom sems can khrag 
[\[223b.6\]]khrig la/_/stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par mdzad/_/bdag kyang byang chub rab reg cing /_/bla med ye shes thob nas su/_/srid skom sems can khrag khrig la/_/stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par bgyi/_/'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po bde gnas blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[223b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i bar du zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar cing /_yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol te bar snang la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs tshad med/_grangs med/_
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa bskyed nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs des bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang sems can dmyal bar ma skyes/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[224a.2\]]ris su yang ma skyes/_mi khom pa rnams su ma skyes/_rigs dma' bar ma skyes/_dbul po'i rigs su ma skyes so/_/bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang lus la rlung las gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/_bad kan las gyur pa'i nad ma byung ngo /_/nam yang dbang 
[\[224a.3\]]po ma tshang bar ma gyur/_nam yang mig ser ba dang /_'jigs pa'i mig dang /_mig yo ba dang /_bzhin yo bar ma gyur to/_/nam yang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus ma brgyan par ma gyur/_nam yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang bral bar ma gyur/_lha'i 
[\[224a.4\]]nang du lhar gyur tam/_mi'i nang du mir gyur na/_nam yang dbang po dang phyug po ma byas par ma gyur/_nam yang smon lam phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_nam yang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma skyes/_nam yang nad med pa dang /_gzugs dang longs spyod 
[\[224a.5\]]dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_phyug pas de sngon dregs par ma gyur/_nam yang bud med kyi dregs pa dang gos kyi dregs pa ma skyes/_nam yang sbyin bdag ma byas par ma gyur/_de nam yang tshul khrims kyi dregs pa ma skyes/_nam yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin par ma gyur/_de nam 
[\[224a.6\]]yang thos pas dregs pa ma skyes/_nam yang mang du thos pa ma yin par ma gyur/_nam yang 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes/_nam yang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ma bskor bar ma gyur/_nam yang tshangs par mi spyod par ma gyur te/_bsams ma thag tu bu rnyed par gyur to/_/nam yang 
[\[224a.7\]]gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma skyes/_nam yang rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma skyes te/_de ltar rgyal po des shugs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bskyed nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di rnams dang gzhan yang rab tu bsgrubs so/_/'di ji snyam du sems/_'jam 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bde gnas blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bde 
[\[224b.2\]]gnas blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs btsal bar bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/'jam dpal theg pa chen po la yang 
[\[224b.3\]]dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[224b.4\]]shugs rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med/_dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa na rgyal po'i drang srong tshangs pa'i 
[\[224b.5\]]lha zhes bya ba dang /_mes byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/_de gnyis gnas shig na 'khod de/_de dag dgon pa nas dgon par/_nags tshal nas nags tshal du/_gshong nas gshong du/_nags thibs po nas thibs por 'gro zhing bdag cag bud med dang lhan cig gnas par 
[\[224b.6\]]gyur na bdag cag 'dod chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/_yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu 'grogs na yang bdag cag gnod sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur/_yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa'am yongs su bzung ba la 
[\[224b.7\]]nyes par mi lta ba dang lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na yang /_bdag cag gti mug gi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i nyes pa rnams mthong nas/_dgon pa nas dgon par/_nags tshal nas nags tshal/_gshong nas gshong /_nags thibs 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]po nas thibs por rgyu'o/_/'jam dpal de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams rtswa dang /_shing dang chu la ci bder spyod du gnang ste/_rjes su yi rang ngo zhes 
[\[225a.2\]]tshig de skad ces smras pas/_drang srong de gnyis kyang rgyal po sde mi pham pa'i yul khams na gnas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po sde mi pham pa la chom rkun nor 'phrog pas gnod pa'i las byas te bros pa dang /_drang srong de dag gis chom rkun bros pa mthong ngo /_/chom rkun de 
[\[225a.3\]]dag gis kyang drang srong nags kyi nang na gnas par mthong nas chom rkun de dag gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong khyed la bdag cag mthong ngam zhes la la zhig gis dris na khyed kyis ma ston cig_/de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lhas drang srong mes byin la smras 
[\[225a.4\]]pa/_kye ma'o mes byin byung ba 'di ni shin tu dka' na ji ltar bya/_gal te 'di ma mthong ngo zhes smras na ni gzhan bslus par 'gyur/_ji ste bstan na ni gnod pa byas par yang 'gyur na/_'di ji ltar bya khyod smros shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_drang srong mes byin gyis drang 
[\[225a.5\]]srong tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye tshangs pa'i lha 'di la gnod par 'gyur bar ma 'dzin cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa'i lha gang la la dag lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems zin 
[\[225a.6\]]nas 'dug go/_/tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste/_dper na gos snum can la rdul reg na chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin nas 'dug go/_/
[\[225a.7\]]tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la mi lta ba de dag la ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste/_dper na gos yongs su dag pa la rdul gyis reg kyang sprugs ma thag tu de med par 'gyur 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ba de bzhin du tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la mi lta ba de dag ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na tshangs pa'i lha bdag cag kyang lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i lha gal te bdag 
[\[225b.2\]]cag lus dang srog la ma bltas na bdag cag yongs su zag pa 'byung ba des sems zin nas gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye tshangs pa'i lha lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa'i brtul zhugs 'grub bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' ma stsal to/_/de 
[\[225b.3\]]nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la drang srong mes byin gyis lus dang srog la mi lta ba bstan pas lus dang srog la mi lta ba rnyed do/_/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas chom rkun de dag tshol zhing nags stug po der phyin te/_rgyal po sde mi pham pas nags stug po'i nang na drang srong de dag gnas 
[\[225b.4\]]pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas drang srong de dag ga la ba der song ste/_mi kha cig nags stug po der chom rkun tshol du bkye'o/_/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal 
[\[225b.5\]]po sde mi pham pas drang srong de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong khyed gnyis kyis chom rkun nags stug po 'di'i nang du 'ongs pa'am phyir byung ba lta mthong ngam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_drang srong de gnyis kyis rgyal po sde mi pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[225b.6\]]rgyal po bdag cag gis bdag nyid kyang mi mthong na chom rkun lta ga la mthong /_rgyal po sde mi pham pa dang drang srong de dag gtam 'di byas pa dang /_rgyal po'i mi de dag gis chom rkun de dag zin te/_de dag gis de dag zin nas rgyal po sde mi pham pa ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin 
[\[225b.7\]]nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/chom rkun de dag bzung ste mchis pa 'di lags zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas drang srong de gnyis kyis smras pa'i don khong du ma chud nas drang srong de gnyis la smras pa/_khyed ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba yin te/_drang srong ma yin no zhes de 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa gcod du bcug go/_/'on kyang drang srong de dag gis gzhan la gnod pa ma byas so/_/de nas yang drang srong mes byin rkang lag bcad pa dang /_rgyal po sde mi pham pa la 'di skad smras so/_/kye rgyal po khyod nyid la bdag kun du 
[\[226a.2\]]btsal na rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po gang yin ci mig rgyal po sde mi pham pa'am/_'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa mig las gzhan nam/_ci rgyal po sde mi pham pa de rna ba'am/_sna'am/_lce'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_'on te rgyal po sde mi pham pa de rna ba dang /_
[\[226a.3\]]sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa las gzhan nam zhes drang srong des bdag mi dmigs par bstan pa dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtog go/_/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na bdag nyid ma dmigs 
[\[226a.4\]]so/_/don dam par bdag nyid ma dmigs pas 'gyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_nyes pa med pa'i drang srong gis bshad pa'i don ma shes pas 'phral du sdig pa'i las byas pa des chos nyid de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 
[\[226a.5\]]'gyod nas sa'i phyogs de na 'gre zhing ldog go/_/de nas drang srong mes byin des rgyal po sde mi pham pa 'gyod par rig nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ji ltar bdag nyid mi dmigs pa de bzhin du su'i rkang lag bcad pa de yang mi dmigs so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[226a.6\]]po sde mi pham pa la drang srong mes byin gyis stong pa nyid bstan pas kun nas dkris pa de myur du bsal te/_chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid myur du rtogs nas des de gnyis la ston par 'du shes bskyed do/_/drang srong de dag gis de la tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod 
[\[226a.7\]]de/_rgyal po chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems la smon pa 'grub ste/_rgyal po chen po tshul khrims su yongs su dag pa'i mthu la gzigs/_rgyal po chen po bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]yang sems ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[226b.2\]]bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par lus kyi las ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_de gnyis kyi 
[\[226b.3\]]lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du med par 'tsho ba ma rung bar byas par mi dran pa lta na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi rkang pa snga ma bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_
[\[226b.4\]]'di ltar drang srong mes byin de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_drang srong de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa snga ma bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas de gnyis kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas spu zing zhes byed par gyur to/_/de nas drang 
[\[226b.5\]]srong mes byin gyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs thos pas lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de de na 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par gyur to/_/des de nyid 
[\[226b.6\]]nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste/_la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_la la ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor/_la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du 
[\[226b.7\]]mas sems can rnams la 'doms/_la la ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/_la la ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na drang srong mes byin rim gro dang bsnyen bkur 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]byed pa mthong ngo /_/des drang srong mes byin de rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa sems can rnams la ston cing bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo /_/de nas rgyal 
[\[227a.2\]]po sde mi pham pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang sems can bye ba khrag khrig du ma mthong ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i shugs rnams kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags te bar snang la 'dug nas/_drang srong mes byin de 
[\[227a.3\]]dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do/_/ji ltar dri med me long dkyil 'khor la/_/lus la mchis pa'i nyes dang 
[\[227a.4\]]yon tan gda'/_/de bzhin tshul khrims yang dag dge ba la/_/sems la mchis pa'i nyes dang yon tan gda'/_/'dod bzhin 'bras bu 'byung ba'i shing chen ltar/_/bsams pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin/_/de bzhin tshul khrims phung po gtsang dag 
[\[227a.5\]]pas/_/bsams pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin/_/ji ltar sa la rab tu las byas te/_/bsams pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam par gyur/_/de bzhin tshul khrims phung po yongs sbyangs pas/_/bsams pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad sbyin/_/ji ltar yid bzhin 
[\[227a.6\]]nor bu byi dor bgyis/_/bsams pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin/_/de bzhin tshul khrims phung po byi dor bgyis/_/bsams pa bzhin du yon tan thams cad sbyin/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis thog mar spyad gsungs pa/_/tshul khrims yongs dag thog ma'i 
[\[227a.7\]]rkang pa ste/_/rgyal ba rnams ni dri med rkang pa des/_/byang chub zhi ba mchog rnams yang dag grub/_/ji ltar shing rgyal n+ya gro gzhon nu 'dir/_/sa gzhi mnyam par btsugs shing rab bskyed na/_/yal ga byung zhing mngon par rab tu skye/_/me tog 'bras bur ldan zhing 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]khyad par 'dzin/_/de bzhin tshul khrims phung por su gnas pa/_/rgyal ba'i sras de yon tan rnams kyis skye/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dir reg nas/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar byed 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ldan pas dpal dang gzi brjid rnyed/_/
[\[227b.2\]]tshul khrims ldan pa gzugs rab mdzes par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims dag la rgyal sras rtag dga' ba/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i chos kyang rab tu skyed/_/spyod pa yongs dag tshul khrims kun spyod pa/_/dri med khrims ldan drang srong mes byin 'di/_/sangs rgyas yon tan 
[\[227b.3\]]mnga' ba brgya dag gis/_/kun tu bstod pa mdzad par bdag gis mthong /_/tshul khrims yongs dag kun du spyod pa la/_/sangs rgyas brgyas ni mngon par bstod gyur dang /_/ji ltar bdag gi slob dpon mes byin la/_/sangs rgyas brgya yis mngon par bstod 
[\[227b.4\]]pa ltar/_/de bzhin tshul khrims gzi brjid ldan pa bdag_/legs par spyad pa brgya yis mngon par bstod/_/skyes nas bdag gi khrims stobs gdung med de/_/rims nad btab pa gso ba byas pa bzhin/_/dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang /_/
[\[227b.5\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs/_/bye ba khrag khrig mang po rgyu ba dang /_/tshul khrims bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa mthong /_/dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang /_/bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/_/bla 
[\[227b.6\]]med byang chub rim par sangs rgyas te/_/bdud rnams bye ba khrag khrig btul ba mthong /_/dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang /_/bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/_/dgra bcom bstod cing mtshungs med 'khor lo mchog_/'gro la phan
