[\[227b.7\]]phyir rgyal bas bskor ba mthong /_/dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang /_/bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag_/skye bo mun pas bsgribs shing mi mkhas pa/_/bde gshegs sdug bsngal brgya las 'grel ba mthong /_/dri med tshul khrims gnas 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pas bdag gis kyang /_/bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/_/sems can khrag khrig btul te mdzad pa mdzad/_/bde gshegs dad pas bsgral phyir bzhugs pa mthong /_/dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang /_/bde 
[\[228a.2\]]gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/_/'gro ba'i don chen mdzad pa mdzad nas su/_/yang 'byung med par mya ngan 'da' ba mthong /_/dri med tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang /_/bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams/_/mya ngan 'das nas ring bsrel 
[\[228a.3\]]rab rgyas shing /_/skye bo bde bas mngon du tshim mdzad mthong /_/de ring slob dpon khyod kyi gsung thos nas/_/bdag gi mig kyang bsam mi khyab par dag_/de phyir phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba rnams/_/sgrib pa med pa'i mig gi stobs kyis mthong /_/bdag gi 
[\[228a.4\]]mtshungs med tshul khrims yongs dag pas/_/de las bdag gi sgrib med mig 'di skyes/_/tshul khrims phung po yongs su sbyangs pa las/_/sgrib pa med pa'i mig ni bdag gis thob/_/'di ltar thal sbyar slob dpon mchog khyod la/_/gang gi mthu che ba ni de 'dra 
[\[228a.5\]]ba/_/de la thal mo mngon sbyar phyag 'tshal cing /_/mtshungs med rdul bral byang chub reg par bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po sde mi pham pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs de rnyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rab tu 
[\[228a.6\]]bsngags par gyur to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed pas phyogs bcu mun pa med par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan 
[\[228a.7\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang len cing 'dzin to/_/de tshun chad nams kyang dran pa nyams par ma gyur te/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du dus thams cad du'ang thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/_/de la chos kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa mngon du gyur to/_/'di 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ltar sgrib pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud cing sems la kun nas dkris pa med pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ste/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[228b.2\]]ldan 'das de dag dang lhan cig tu smra zhing gtam zer te/_'di ltar mun pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bod cing yang dag par mgu bar byas pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mes 
[\[228b.3\]]byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan de de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mes byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[228b.4\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam 
[\[228b.5\]]dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya ba gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa thos ma thag tu kun nas dkris pa bsal bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[228b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sde mi pham pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims ma nyams par bya'o/_/tshul khrims la skyon med pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[228b.7\]]shin tu bsdams pa dang /_tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_tshul khrims rdzogs par bya ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la chags par mi bya/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa la mchog tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du gyur pas ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su 
[\[229a.2\]]dag par 'gyur snyam sems la mi bya ste/_'on kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du gyur na bsgrim mi dgos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/_
[\[229a.3\]]gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag na/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin pa med na de'i 
[\[229a.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_de ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa gang gis kyang tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzin pa med do/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 
[\[229a.5\]]na mi 'chi ba kun du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_'jam dpal mi 'chi ba kun du 'phags pa'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[229a.6\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir drang srong 
[\[229a.7\]]de mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya zhe na/_'jam dpal sngon byung ba bskal pa mi 'chi ba kun du 'phags pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na bskal pa grangs med brjod du med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i tshe'i tshad dpag tu med 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med cing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan no/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na blo gros 'bar ba zhes bya ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la 
[\[229b.2\]]chen po lta bu sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig yod de/_blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu de la mi phyed pa'i g.yog sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bram ze khrag khrig phrag brgyad 
[\[229b.3\]]cu yod do/_/yang 'jam dpal blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa de la lo bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcur mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'khrugs 
[\[229b.4\]]pa'i dbyings mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes gsungs na bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de gang lags/_ci'i slad du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pas blo 
[\[229b.5\]]gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros 'bar ba mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/blo gros 'bar ba ci'i phyir dbyings de mi 'khrugs 
[\[229b.6\]]pa'i dbyings zhes bya zhe na/_blo gros 'bar ba 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yang med/_'bri ba yang med/_len pa yang med/_'god pa yang med/_zad pa yang med/_'gog pa yang med/_'grib pa yang med/_'phel ba yang med/_rigs kyang ma yin/_
[\[229b.7\]]rigs med pa yang ma yin/_'gyur ba yang ma yin/_'dzin pa yang ma yin/_'dor ba yang ma yin/_gzung ba yang ma yin/_gtong ba yang ma yin/_phra ba yang ma yin/_zab pa yang ma yin/_mun pa yang ma yin/_snang ba yang ma yin/_nyin par yang ma yin/_
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]mtshan mo yang ma yin/_ring po yang ma yin/_thung ngu yang ma yin/_nye ba yang ma yin/_ring ba yang ma yin/_yangs pa yang ma yin/_dog pa yang ma yin/_gcig pu yang ma yin/_thun mong yang ma yin/_gzugs kyang ma yin/_
[\[230a.2\]]snga ba yang ma yin/_'phyi ba yang ma yin/_'gro ba yang ma yin/_'ong ba yang ma yin/_'pho ba yang ma yin/_mi 'pho ba yang ma yin/_'chi 'pho ba yang ma yin/_skye ba yang ma yin te/_de ltar 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings de ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[230a.3\]]phyir de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de la yang mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings kun dris so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[230a.4\]]sangs rgyas des lo bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bar du mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de bstan pa bshad de/_des mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings thos ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed de/_de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags 
[\[230a.5\]]nas drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros de bar snang la 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ngo /_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[230a.6\]]dpag tu med pa yang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa 
[\[230a.7\]]dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos bstan pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa'i pha 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /_nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa la zhugs pa dang /_nges pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[230b.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bde gshegs chos tshul ji bzhin thos nas su/_/mi mchog bdag gis bzod pa zhi ba rnyed/_/bgyid po gang 
[\[230b.3\]]yang ma mchis bgyid ma mchis/_/chos nyid dag la gnas par the tshom bral/_/bdag gis 'jig rten rig khyod gsung thos nas/_/chos 'di thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings 'drar 'tshal/_/bdag gis ring nas stor rnyed 'thun bgyis te/_/gter chen ji ltar 
[\[230b.4\]]yun ring ston pa bzhin/_/deng bdag bzod pa'i shugs ni rgya chen skyes/_/chos kyi tshul ni yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal/_/de ring bdag gis the tshom dogs kun spangs/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag khrig mtha' yas mthong /_/ji ltar bya rnams sgo nga 'phrugs nas ni/_/sgo 
[\[230b.5\]]nga'i steng ngam zhabs su mchus brtol te/_/rang gi sgo nga bcag nas byung ba bzhin/_/bde gshegs khyod gsung thos nas bdag kyang byung /_/bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i sa kun bor/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa khrag khrig mtha' yas mthong /_/rgyal ba bye ba mtha' yas bzod 
[\[230b.6\]]stobs gnas/_/bde gshegs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung bstan/_/bde gshegs mtha' yas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/rgyal sras lung bstan de dag de bzhin ston/_/bzod stobs rnyed pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa/_/nam mkha'i bya lam 'dir mchis 
[\[230b.7\]]bdag gis mthong /_/nam mkha' 'di la mchis nas bdag gis kyang /_/rgyal ba bde bar gshegs pa mtha' yas kyis/_/bzod thob sras la bde gshegs rang byung 'gyur/_/skye bo bdud zhags 'grol zhes lung ston mthong /_/nam mkha'i bya lam 'dir 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mchis bdag gis kyang /_/bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas rnams/_/dgra yi tshogs bcom kun mkhyen legs 'chang sras/_/'gro mgon zil mi non 'gyur lung ston mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal sras spyad pa spyod pa dag_/'gro 
[\[231a.2\]]phan byang chub rdul med btsal slad du/_/rgyal srid rin chen mgo mig gtong ba dang /_/mthu rnyed brtan pa thub pa'i khur khyer mthong /_/rgyal sras dga' ldan gnas nas shi 'phos te/_/lha yi bu mo brgya yis glu blangs shing /_/bkra shis bcas pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon 
[\[231a.3\]]bstod nas/_/rgyal rigs drang srong bram ze'i rigs skye mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal sras zla bcu mngal gnas pa/_/lha yi gnas na lha yi bu bzhin du/_/snying rjes chos ston lha rnams rab tu 'dul/_/mngal na gnas pa mi yis mngon mchod mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal 
[\[231a.4\]]sras yum gyi lhums nas su/_/lha rnams kyis kyang mngon par mchod cing byung /_/sems dge bas na mi gtsang rdul mi chags/_/rin chen nyes pas mi gos bzhin du mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal sras rgyal srid rin chen bdun/_/brgya phrag bcu po bu yi tshogs rnams dang /_/
[\[231a.5\]]rta dang glang pos gang ba'i sa spangs te/_/bdud kyi zhags bcad mngon par byung ba mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal sras 'gro la sman slad du/_/khrag khrig bdud rnams zil mnan byang chub reg_/nyon mongs ring bsags rnam mang dpa' bos spangs/_/bde gshegs nyi ma bzhin 
[\[231a.6\]]du lhan pa mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal sras rang gis nyon mongs btul/_/mtshungs med dam pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/lha mi sems can khrag khrig rnams btul zhing /_/zad mthar 'gro ba lan gsum skor ba mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas 
[\[231a.7\]]pa/_/rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rgyu zhing sems can 'dul/_/'gro la sman slad 'gro ba stong par mdzad/_/pad ma nyi bzhin sems cad sad mdzad mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa/_/sems can btul nas sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad/_/lce steng 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]byung ba'i mchil ma mis bor bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs tshogs gnas su 'dor ba mthong /_/bdag gis sangs rgyas stong phrag mtha' yas pa/_/zhi bar 'gro ba me la chus btab bzhin/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal khur skyo mya ngan bzlas/_/stobs bcu nyon mongs kun spangs 
[\[231b.2\]]'das pa mthong /_/bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa/_/'gro la sman don mdzad cing sku gdung bral/_/mya ngan 'das kyang skye bo mya ngan zlo/_/mya ngan 'das kyang bstan pa rjod pa mthong /_/de ltar 'gro la sman slad skyabs su mchi/_/dge ba bsags pa 'di 
[\[231b.3\]]yis sangs rgyas gyur/_/bdag nyid grol nas sems can khrag khrig dgrol/_/mgon med bdud zhags bcings pa zhi bar bgyi/_/de nas drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[231b.4\]]rnam par snang mdzad de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang gti mug par ma gyur/_nam yang 'dod pa ma spyad/_nam 
[\[231b.5\]]yang bud med kyi dbang du ma gyur/_nam yang bdud kyi spyod yul la ma spyad/_nam yang mngal gyi gnas su ma zhugs/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rdzus te skyes/_nam yang bdud kyi las kyis ma bsgribs/_nam yang bdud kyi las kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur/_nam 
[\[231b.6\]]yang byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar ma gyur/_nam yang 'khor bas skyo ba'i sems ma bskyed/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa nam yang phan pa med pa'i sems ma bskyed do/_/bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang sangs rgyas dang bral ba'i yid 
[\[231b.7\]]la byed pa ma bskyed/_nam yang chags pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/_bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang skye ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/_nam yang 'byung ba ma btsal/_nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar ma gyur/_
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]nam yang dman pa'i sems dang ldan par ma gyur/_nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_nam yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur/_nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs par ma gyur/_nam yang 
[\[232a.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi ldan par ma gyur/_nam yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dngos por ma dmigs/_de nam yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams tha dad par ma bsams/_des nam yang dus gsum mnyam pa las lam log par ma bsten/_
[\[232a.3\]]des nam yang dus gsum dmigs par ma gyur to/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[232a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong mi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/_de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyad pas ji ltar ngas brjod pa bzhin du de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas so/_/'jam dpal de 
[\[232a.5\]]lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su spyod par 'dod pas sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyir rtsom pa mi 'dor ro/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la mos par bya'o/_/yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don 
[\[232a.6\]]thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu med cing rgya 
[\[232a.7\]]chen po bskyed de/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs bsam gyis mi 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa rgya chen po bskyed do/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa na rin chen byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal 
[\[232b.2\]]pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzang po'i lha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam 
[\[232b.3\]]dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cur gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i gsung rab la dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_shin du rtogs pa dang ldan 
[\[232b.4\]]pa/_shin du blo gros dang ldan pa/_shin du dran pa dang ldan pa/_shin du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_shin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pa rnyed pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ste/_gzugs 
[\[232b.5\]]bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mos pa'i blo gros ji tsam du mdzes pa de tsam gyis mdzes pa'i sems can su yang med de/_de blta bas chog mi shes pa sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu 
[\[232b.6\]]med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/_tshad med pa'i chos nyid las nges par byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi rnyed de/_'dod pa bzhin rnyed cing nyon mongs pa med par rnyed/_tshegs med par rnyed nas 'dris par byas te/_re 
[\[232b.7\]]zhig ni de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sems mi 'jug go/_/stobs bcu'i pha rol tu son pas 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams su 'gro'o/_/de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de de bzhin gshegs 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[233a.2\]]gcig tu 'dug nas kyang dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzings chen po bca' bar 'tshal ba dang zam pa chen po gdags par 'tshal ba dang /_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'tshal ba dang /_
[\[233a.3\]]sems can thams cad bsgral bar 'tshal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa ma mchis/_gzhal du ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang 
[\[233a.4\]]bar 'tshal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa yongs su dag pa bsgrub par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la brtson par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lhas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la 'di 
[\[233a.5\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong de dag dang yon tan tshad med pa gzhan yang bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam mo/_/mtshan mor 'du shes yid la mi byed pa 
[\[233a.6\]]dang /_nyin par 'du shes dang /_grang bar 'du shes dang /_dro bar 'du shes dang /_bkres par 'du shes dang /_zas su 'du shes dang /_skom du 'du shes dang /_btung bar 'du shes dang /_gos su 'du shes pa yid la mi byed pa dang /_stobs su 'du shes pa 
[\[233a.7\]]yid la mi byed cing 'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed par sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du byas te brtson 'grus brtsam mo/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams te/_des brtson 'grus brtsams na sgrib pa med 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]pa'i rnam par thar pa mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bar du 
[\[233b.2\]]yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des de bzhin du bstan cing gdams nas des 'du shes thams cad yid la ma byas te/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa khrag khrig phrag 
[\[233b.3\]]brgyad kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsams nas spyod do/_/de nas bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad 'das pa dang /_/de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcus nges par byung ste/_des sprul pa khrag khrig tshad med pa mngon 
[\[233b.4\]]par sprul nas lha la dad pa rnams la lhar mngon par sprul/_klu la dad pa rnams la klur/_gnod sbyin la dad pa rnams la gnod sbyin du/_dri za la dad pa rnams la dri zar/_grul bum la dad pa rnams la grul bum du/_lha ma yin la dad pa rnams la lha ma yin du/_nam mkha' lding la dad 
[\[233b.5\]]pa rnams la nam mkha' lding du/_mi'am ci la dad pa rnams la mi'am cir/_lto 'phye chen po la dad pa rnams la lto 'phye chen por mngon par sprul to/_/de ltar dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can sprul pa ji lta bu la dad pa bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon 
[\[233b.6\]]par sprul te/_des der sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor bas myur du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha des dge slong mos pa'i blo 
[\[233b.7\]]gros de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mkhyen nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas/_de'i brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsngags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis de yang dag par dga' bar byas/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang 
[\[234a.2\]]dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs 'di lta bu rnyed de/_de lta bu'i dge ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te 'dug go/_/'jam dpal de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros bar snang la 
[\[234a.3\]]'dug nas 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes rnyed de/_gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa shes/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po 
[\[234a.4\]]mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes/_sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes so/_/des ye shes de rnyed nas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la the tshom med cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa la'ang the tshom med de/_de bzhin 
[\[234a.5\]]gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do/_/stobs bcu stobs 'chang stobs rab stobs ldan pa/_/nor mang bged cing sras rnams nor ldan mdzad/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi sras rnams 
[\[234a.6\]]nor mang rnyed/_/'gro 'di shin du sdug bsngal nor ldan mdzad/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi nor rnams gtor cing gos/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi sras mchog nor rnyed nas/_/dga' zhing 'gro la sman pa'i spyod mchog spyod/_/rgyal mchog rgyal ba dag dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/thub mchog 
[\[234a.7\]]khyod sras yon tan brgyas ldan pa/_/spyod pa'i nges pa mchog 'di rnam spyod la/_/skye bar nub cing rga shis gtses pa dang /_/'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya ldan gzir ba rnams/_/sdug bsngal bdag med stong par rtogs pas na/_/shi 'phos 'gror mchis 'khor ba'i 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'gror chags pa/_/mthong nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal bder 'god cing /_/de dag snying rje rlabs chen rnyed par 'gyur/_/'gro la sman sems snying rje bskyed nas su/_/'khor ba'i sred pa bcom yang skye ba 'dzin/_/dge ba tshad med rnams kyang dran sogs shing /_/'gro ba rnams la 
[\[234b.2\]]sman bde zhi bar bgyid/_/log pa'i lam mchis sems can stong rnams ni/_/stobs bcus bstan pa'i lam mchog rnams su ste/_/zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi bde dge ba ni/_/gang nas sngon gyi rang byung gshegs par dgod/_/de dag stong pa tshad med gtong ba ni/_/mgo lag mig bzang 
[\[234b.3\]]bu sdug de bzhin du/_/tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin/_/thos dran mkhas shing mos dang stobs la gnas/_/shing dbang drung du bdud sde bcas par btul/_/dpe med ye shes go 'phang mchog der rnyed/_/rang 'byung sems can stong rnams khrid nas su/_/mi 
[\[234b.4\]]'chi byung zhi bde ba zhi bar gshegs/_/nam mkha' 'di la de ring bdag mchis nas/_/phyogs bcu'i stobs bcu ma nor de bzhin gsung /_/rgyal sras rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod spyad nas/_/shin du lung ston pa ni du ma mthong /_/de dag rang gi spyod thos dga' mgu ste/_/rab 
[\[234b.5\]]tu 'dzum dmul yid gnyis the tshom bral/_/thal mo sbyar te mngon par lus btud nas/_/stobs bcu yon tan mnga' ba mkha' las bstod/_/de ring nam mkha' 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong /_/'khor ba brgyar ni rgyal sras dge spyad nas/_/dga' ldan lha yi gnas nas 
[\[234b.6\]]shi 'phos te/_/dri bral dpe med glang chen mchog gyur nas/_/lha yi gnas nas rab tu babs nas su/_/yum bde nyal ba'i lhums su zhugs pa la/_/lha rnams stong gis shin du rab mchod cing /_/lha mi lha mo rnams kyis gtsor bgyis bstod/_/de dag yum gyi 
[\[234b.7\]]lhums su zhugs pa na/_/lha yi gnas 'dra rab tu mdzes par gyur/_/mngal gyis mi gos chu las pad ma ltar/_/yum la bde zhing yang bar gnas nas su/_/lha rnams brgya la rab tu chos bshad de/_/lha mchog 'khor rnams dge ba'i lam du btsud/_/de dag chos tshig 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]rgya chen thos nas su/_/skom pas chu la sa bzhin bdud rtsi 'thung /_/nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/_/rgyal sras dri med blo gros dran mkhas pa/_/yum gyi phyag gis shing gi yal ga gzung /_/mchan khung nas ni byung ba rab tu mthong /_/
[\[235a.2\]]lha dang mi yi dbang pos rab mchod cing /_/sa yi steng na 'jigs med gom pa 'dor/_/de yis thams cad phyogs su bltas nas su/_/'dzum dmul tshig smras nga 'dra khams gsum med/_/nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/_/rgyal sras mang po 'gro la sman 
[\[235a.3\]]dga' ba/_/grong dang grong khyer rin chen bltams pa yi/_/rab tu 'byor cing ldan pa'i sa bor te/_bal glang rmig pas bcings pa bcad pa ltar/_/blo gros mchog gis khyim chags bsal bcom ste/_/'gro la sman slad dpa' bo mngon par byung /_/sdug bsngal zhi zhing srid zad 
[\[235a.4\]]bdud rtsi tshol/_/nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/_/rgyal sras brtul zhugs dka' thub drag spyad de/_/skyil mo krung bcas byang chub shing dbang drung /_/g.yo can bdud btul byang chub dam pa reg_/rgyal ba thams cad dang ni mnyam rnyed nas/_/zhi dga' bde 
[\[235a.5\]]gnas zhing mchog lta bzhin du/_/smon lam rgya chen bdag gis 'dir rdzogs te/_/'khor brgyar legs spyad brtul zhugs 'di grub bo/_/nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni/_/phyogs bcu'i stobs bcu shin tu mang po dag_/'khor lo rgya chen rab tu bskor ba ni/_/
[\[235a.6\]]pha rol rgol 'dul 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zhi/_/skal yod 'gro ba rnams kyi nyon mongs bcom/_/mun pa'i rdul bsal 'gro rnams bde ba byin/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyis de thos nas/_/'khor ba'i rgyud bsal ma song phyogs su song /_/de ring nam mkha' 'di la 
[\[235a.7\]]bdag mchis nas/_/rgyal ba brgya dag lha mi 'khor 'dul zhing /_/lha mi gnas nas 'gro la snying brtse yid/_/'jig rten dag na rab tu zhugs pa mthong /_/rgyal ba brgya phrag du ma gzhan dag kyang /_/'khor ba zad song zhi bar rdul med gnas/_/lha mi brgya rnams yid dgar 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]gyur nas su/_/ring bsrel dam pa de la mchod pa mthong /_/'jig rten gtso bo rkang gnyis mchog khyod la/_/lha dang mi dang khyim bdag khyod drung mchis/_/zhal nas zhi rab chos kyi rang bzhin thos/_/khyod kyi spyod ldan myur du skyabs su 'gro/_/mi dbang khyod kyi yon tan yang 
[\[235b.2\]]dag bstod/_/khyu mchog phan byed stobs bcu yon tan 'chang /_/zhi bar ldan zhing dul ba zhi ba rnyed/_/'khor ba'i rgyud bral 'jigs med phyogs su song /_/bde gshegs mi yi seng ge khyod kyi mthus/_/blo mchog khyod kyang steng gi mkhar gnas pa/_/mngon shes lnga las nyams 
[\[235b.3\]]pa med rnyed nas/_/phyogs bcur 'khor rgyud rab 'byams rnam mang ba/_/mtshungs med du ma de ring mthong ba ni/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan sna tshogs dri med spyod/_/yang dag yon tan gyis ni de dag bstod/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi yon tan mtha' mi rnyed/_/de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo 
[\[235b.4\]]gros des de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med par nams kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar ma gyur te/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pas sangs 
[\[235b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten stongs par byas/_lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad yongs su chad cing mi khom pa thams cad chad par gyur to/_/de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang dang 
[\[235b.6\]]yang skyes pa na sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas thog mar byung ba bzhin du shin tu ngo mtshar du shes te/_gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der gang de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba de na ltas 'byung ba de dag de skye ba'i ltas su byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs 
[\[235b.7\]]par 'tshang rgya ba na ltas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na ltas gang byung ba de dag des mngon par shes pa lnga bshad pa'i tshe 'ang ltas de dag byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]ltas gang byung ba de tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba'i tshe yang ltas de dag byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe ltas gang byung ba de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang ltas de dag byung ngo /_/des tshe rabs re re la yang sems can bye ba khrag 
[\[236a.2\]]khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa theg pa chen po la btul/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la btul to/_/re zhig ni byang chub sems dpa' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_sangs 
[\[236a.3\]]rgyas kyi bya ba de lta bu dag sems can rnams la bstan to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du yid gnyis dang the tshom za na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[236a.4\]]'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[236a.5\]]dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de brtson 'grus kyi stobs gang dang ldan par gyur pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshegs chung ngus sems mnyam par gzhog par 
[\[236a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po'i don las sems slar sdud de/_dbang po'i don la yang dbang po'i don mi dmigs shing dbang po'i don ni dbang po'i don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis 
[\[236a.7\]]stong par mthong /_dbang po'i don dang dbang po'i mtshan ma yang mi dmigs/_gang gis dbang po'i mtshan mar dmigs pa de yang mi dmigs so//_//bam po gsum pa/_'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med/_
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na bdud rtsi snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_'jam dpal bdud rtsi'i snying po'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[236b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya 
[\[236b.3\]]ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de byung ba'i tshe/_thams cad kyi thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bral ba'i sgra ma byung ngo /_/gang sems can thams cad kyi sgra de yang sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba 
[\[236b.4\]]dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_don shes/_chos shes/_dus shes/_tshod shes/_bdag shes/_
[\[236b.5\]]'khor shes/_gang zag rab dang tha ma shes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa la bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/_yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/_/des bshad pa rnams kyang bzung ste/_bdag 
[\[236b.6\]]gi don yang mi gtong ngo /_/des bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gi bar du 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed/_gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma bskyed/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed/_srog dang ldan pa dang /_gang zag dang ldan pa'i rtog pa ma bskyed/_
[\[236b.7\]]dngos po dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang ma bskyed/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa yang ma yin/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa yang ma yin/_nye du 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]la rtog pa yang ma yin/_nye du ma yin pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/_shes pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/_mi shes pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/_ljongs la rtog pa yang ma yin/_mi dga' bar rtog pa yang ma bskyed/_sems can dang ldan 
[\[237a.2\]]pa'i rtog pa yang ma bskyed/_srog dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_gang zag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_dngos po dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtshan ma dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtshan ma 
[\[237a.3\]]med pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_smon lam dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_smon lam ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_'khor ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_ye shes dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_ye shes ma 
[\[237a.4\]]yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_nyan thos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_nyan 
[\[237a.5\]]thos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma bskyed de/_'du shes thams cad 
[\[237a.6\]]dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms/_rtog pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la nams kyang bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur te/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa la bsnyen bkur byas/_sangs 
[\[237a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la des g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byas pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsnyen cing bsgoms te/_mang du byas pas de phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing du nam yang ma skyes/_nam yang 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]zhing du 'du shes dang sangs rgyas su 'du shes kyang ma skyes/_nam yang byang chub kyi sems rgyun du mi 'byung bar ma gyur/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur dang g.yog byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sprul pas sems can 
[\[237b.2\]]rnams yongs su smin par byas/_gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang de na sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung ba snyam du shes te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can de dag la ston to/_/gang dang gang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang der sems can ji lta bu la mos pa 
[\[237b.3\]]de lta bur sprul pa sprul te 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud dang sbyar te rnam par 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sprul pa rnam pa du mar sprul to/_/sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhan yang sprul te bstan to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa mngon 
[\[237b.4\]]par sprul te/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa de dag gis kyang sprul pa gzhan mngon par sprul pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis kyang sprul pa mngon par sprul te/_sprul pa de dag gis kyang gzhan mngon par sprul to/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du 
[\[237b.5\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong snyan pa'i 
[\[237b.6\]]sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsten par bya/_bsgom par bya/_mang du bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[237b.7\]]dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na bskal pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_bskal pa'i snying po'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[238a.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med 
[\[238a.3\]]pa'i gzi brjid 'od de'i 'od kyis shar phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/_lho phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/_nub phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang 
[\[238a.4\]]bar gyur/_byang phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur/_de bzhin du shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_byang shar dang /_steng dang /_'og dang phyogs bcu kun du phyogs re rer yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[238a.5\]]gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur to/_/sems can gang de'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs 
[\[238a.6\]]pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[238a.7\]]phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can brjod du med pa rnams theg pa gsum gyis rab tu 'god do/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi mchog byed de/_des byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos dus dang po dang /_bar ma 
[\[238b.2\]]dang /_tha ma gsum du gzung ngo zhes de ltar smon lam btab bo/_/'jam dpal de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du so so'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems 
[\[238b.3\]]can dpag tu med cing brjod du med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po des dus thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma gsum 
[\[238b.4\]]du bzung ngo /_/de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten du snyigs ma lnga byung ste/_sems can skal ba med par gyur nas dam pa'i chos nub pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' de phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur te/_de bstan bcos gang 'jig rten 
[\[238b.5\]]gyi don du 'gyur ba chos dang ldan pa de khong du chud nas rab tu ston pa 'di lta ste/_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_sgra'i bstan bcos rnams dang /_gtan tshigs kyi bstan bcos rnams dang /_gso 
[\[238b.6\]]ba'i bstan bcos rnams dang /_nor sbyar dang dug dang sngags dang sman gyi rgyud dang /_dus 'khor ba dang /_dus dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar shes pa yang rab tu ston to/_/sems can rnams la phan pa dang ldan pa'i bzo'i gnas thams cad kyang ston to/_/nam sangs rgyas byung 
[\[238b.7\]]ba de na de'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_rgyal po'i srid bor nas 'khor dang bcas te/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa yang kun 'dzin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi ring bsrel la 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]yang mchod pa rnam pa mang pos rab tu sbyor bar gyur to/_/skye bo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas la mchod pa byed du 'jug par gyur/_dam pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas mchod pa dang ldan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin 
[\[239a.2\]]par byed pa dang ldan pa dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir yang yongs su bsngos so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[239a.3\]]sprin gyi rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa la de lta bu'i tshul du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/_bzhugs pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa gzhan gyi 
[\[239a.4\]]yang dam pa'i chos dus thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma gsum du bzung ste/_'on kyang de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 
[\[239a.5\]]'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de yang de'i tshe mya ngan las ma 'das te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[239a.6\]]zhing du smon lam gyi dbang gis yang dang yang skyes nas/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i stobs des de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ma thag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byas te/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[239a.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang la brten pas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ce na/_'di lta ste/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /_dus gsum gyi chos thams cad mnyam par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams tha dad par mi mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral bar mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi 
[\[239b.2\]]rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad ma skyes ma 'gags par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad 'ong ba yang ma yin 'gro ba yang ma yin par mthong bas dge slong 
[\[239b.3\]]sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po 
[\[239b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad brjod du med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad la bdag med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[239b.5\]]pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad la sems can med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad la srog med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/
[\[239b.6\]]chos thams cad la gang zag med par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/chos thams cad 
[\[239b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings las byung bar mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag go/_/de ltar chos kyi dbyings las chos thams cad byung bar mthong bas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ste/_de ltar de shes rab 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed de/_de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rnyed pas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/_de bar snang la 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa 
[\[240a.2\]]na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_la la ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor/_la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/_la la ni tshe'i 
[\[240a.3\]]'du byed 'dor/_la la ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ste/_mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de la shes 
[\[240a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por 'khor ba na/_/sbyin pa mtha' yas pa dag rgya cher stsal/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rab 'dri zhing /_/sbyin gnas mang po dag la bdag gis bsnyen/_/
[\[240a.5\]]'jig rten rig pa 'jig rten mngon grags pa/_/spyan ldan dri med ces bgyi mkhyen pa de/_/ri rab brtsegs 'dra bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/_/byang chub 'tshal slad de la rim gro bgyis/_/bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mtha' yas pa/_/de yi dge 'dun bde gshegs 
[\[240a.6\]]sras la yang /_/lo bye khrag khrig bdun cu'i bar du ni/_/rgyal ba nyan thos bcas la bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/dga' zhing mos pa mngon par bskyed nas su/_/zas skom rnam mang yid du 'ong ba dag_/bde bar gshegs la bdag gis dbul ba phul/_/'on kyang bde 
[\[240a.7\]]gshegs des bdag lung ma bstan/_/'das pa'i dus tshe sangs rgyas byung ba ni/_/mkhyen pa 'jig rten mgon po mya ngan sel/_/me rtse sprin ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs/_/nyan thos bcas pa rgyal de bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/'dren pa de la lo bye drug cu bzhir/_/
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]bdag gis 'khor dang bcas la bkur sti bgyis/_/bdag gis ye shes yangs pa ma sbyangs pas/_/'on kyang bde gshegs des bdag lung ma bstan/_/'das pa'i dus na 'dren pa byung ba ni/_/ye shes rgya mtsho zhes kyang phyogs su grags/_/chos rgyal de yi 'khor 
[\[240b.2\]]du gyur pa ni/_/bye ba khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba lags/_/bdag gis rgyal mchog nyan thos bcas de la/_/lo bye dgu bcu'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/byang chub dam pa 'tshal ba'i slad du 'dir/_/bdag gis sbyin pa mtha' yas rgya cher stsal/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[240b.3\]]par gyur nas lo lnga nas/_/bde gshegs nyan thos dag la bkur sti bgyis/_/bshos dang skyems kyi rnam par rab tu sbyar/_/'on kyang bde gshegs des bdag lung ma bstan/_/'das pa'i dus na kha lo sgyur byung ba/_/mkhas pa ye shes ri bo de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[240b.4\]]de yi zhing rnams mtshungs med bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten khams rnams khrag khrig thams cad nas/_/skyob pa bde gshegs de yi 'dus pa ni/_/yang dag mthong ba'i nyan thos rnams su gyur/_/khrag khrig bdun du sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni/_/la las btags 
[\[240b.5\]]nas phra rab rdul bgyis la/_/de ni mi gang la las byung ba yis/_/phra rab rdul du bgyis pa'i rdul de thogs/_/mi des shin tu rdul phran de thogs te/_/shar gyi phyogs su mgyogs ldan de mchis pa/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing /_/de yi gom pa 
[\[240b.6\]]gcig gis de dag rgal/_/de bzhin mi de bskal pa brgyar mchis nas/_/mtha' mar shin tu phra ba'i rdul gcig bor/_/de bzhin shin tu phra ba'i rdul de kun/_/shar gyi phyogs su mchis nas thams cad bor/_/de bzhin ma lus phyogs bcu thams cad du/_/ji snyed 
[\[240b.7\]]kyi ni rdul phran kun bor te/_/de dag zhing rnams gang du bor ba dang /_/gang du rdul phran ma bor de dag rnams/_/grong khyer gcig tu de kun bgyis nas su/_/de ni yungs kar dag gis gang bar bgyis/_/gal te 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyang /_/
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]yungs 'brus gang ba la la su spro bas/_/btags nas shin tu phra ba'i rdul du bgyis/_/thams cad kyang ni ji ltar snga ma bzhin/_/de bzhin thams cad phyogs kyi zhing rnams kyang /_/stong du bsgyur cing bsgre ba bgyis pa yang /_/de yi tha ma 'tshal 
[\[241a.2\]]bar nus kyang gda'/_/skyob pa de yi zhing ni tshad ma mchis/_/bde gshegs de la dgra bcom mnga' ba ni/_/nyan thos khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab rnams/_/rgyal ba de yang nyan thos bcas par mchod/_/de bzhin gshegs des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/'das 
[\[241a.3\]]pa'i dus na 'dren pa byung ba ni/_/'jig rten mchod rten zhes ni phyogs su grags/_/gang zag mchog de bdag gis mchod na yang /_/de bzhin gshegs des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/ma smad pa yi bde gshegs sangs rgyas brgyad/_/rgyal ba grags 'chang 'jigs 
[\[241a.4\]]mdzad des pa dang /_/sA la'i rgyal po nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od chen dang /_/tog gi rgyal po bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/_/bdag gis 'dren pa de dag nyan thos bcas/_/byang chub mchog rab 'tshal slad bkur sti bgyis/_/'on kyang shes rab mthar phyin ma sbyangs pas/_/
[\[241a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/bskal pa gcig la mthu chen bde bar gshegs/_/thams cad gzigs pa stong phrag drug byung ste/_/bdag gis gang zag mchog de kun mchod kyang /_/bde gshegs de dag gis kyang lung ma bstan/_/'das pa'i 
[\[241a.6\]]dus na 'dren pa byung ba ni/_/zlas byin zhes kyang phyogs bcur grags pa ste/_/rgyal ba nyan thos bcas la bkur sti bgyis/_/de bzhin gshegs des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/'das pa'i dus na 'dren pa byung ba ni/_/tsan dan dam pa bde gshegs 'phrul chen 
[\[241a.7\]]te/_/mi yi dam pa de la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/gang zag mchog des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/'dren pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa sngon byung ba/_/glog sprin zhes bgyi phyogs su grags pa ste/_/rgyal ba de yang nyan thos bcas par mchod/_/de bzhin 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gshegs des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog byung ba/_/the tsom kun gyi bcings pa gcod mdzad pa/_/sprin sbyin rnam 'dren bde bar gshegs pa ste/_/de la rim gro bgyis kyang lung ma bstan/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnam 
[\[241b.2\]]'dren sdig mi mnga'/_/dgra bcom zhes kyang phyogs su grags pa ste/_/'jig rten mkhas pa de la mchod bgyis kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs des bdag la lung ma bstan/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/_/'jig rten mgon po mtshungs 
[\[241b.3\]]med nyan thos bcas/_/byang chub mchog 'tshal bkur sti rab bgyis kyang /_/bde gshegs de dag gis kyang lung ma bstan/_/mtshungs med 'dren pa rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/shes rab dam pa mchog ni bdag gis sbyangs/_/chos kyi tshul dang mtshan 
[\[241b.4\]]nyid de rtogs nas/_/des na dri med tog gis bdag lung bstan/_/'di ltar bdag gis de ring chos nyid mthong /_/the tsom ma lus par ni thams cad bcad/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba ru/_/chos rnams thams cad skye ba bdag gis mthong /_/ji ltar mi 
[\[241b.5\]]rnams ri yi bar na yang /_/yid du 'ong ba'i glu dbyangs skad 'byin te/_/skad cig tu ni brag ca gzhan yang 'byung /_/de yi sgra la byed pa po ma mchis/_/ri yi bar ni ji ltar brag ca bzhin/_/de bzhin bdag gis chos rnams yang dag mthong /_/de la bdag ni 
[\[241b.6\]]the tshom ma mchis te/_/des na gang zag mchog des bdag lung bstan/_/nam mkha' bar snang ji ltar bya yi rjes/_/de dag ma mchis ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/_/rgyal bas bstan pa de bzhin mthong bas na/_/des na gang zag mchog gis bdag lung bstan/_/
[\[241b.7\]]chos 'di thams cad bar snang nam mkha' bzhin/_/de rnams gang la'ang mngon par chags ma mchis/_/phyogs nas mchis shing gang du'ang mchis ma mchis/_/des na gang zag mchog gis bdag lung bstan/_/ji ltar rmi lam na ni skom pa'i mis/_/chu 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]grang dang ba de yis 'tshal na yang /_/skom pa chad cing zhi bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin bdag gis 'dod pa'i yon tan rtogs/_/rnga brdungs de las sgra rnams rab 'byung ste/_/skye bo byis pa rnams ni dga' bar gyur/_/de yang ko ba dang ni 
[\[242a.2\]]shing las kyang /_/sgra de mi rnyed de bzhin chos nyid do/_/ji ltar pi wang len pa sbrengs pa yi/_/rgyud las snyan pa'i sgra yang shin tu gtong /_/shing dang rgyud rnams las kyang ma lags te/_/sgra de mi rnyed de bzhin chos nyid do/_/gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri 
[\[242a.3\]]reg kyang /_/pi wang dag gi sgra 'drar mthong bas na/_/the tshom dogs pa thams cad kun du bcom/_/de bas 'jig rten 'dren pas bdag lung bstan/_/sa dang shing dang mun dza bal ba dza/_/de bzhin 'od ma rtswa dang chur brten te/_/bar snang la ni de dag 
[\[242a.4\]]kun bskor nas/_/'jig rten kun rdzob khyim du gyur ces brjod/_/de bzhin rus pa sen mo rgyus pa rnams/_/spu dang skra dang khrag rnag pags pa yis/_/nam mkha' dag kyang kun nas bskor nas ni/_/de bzhin kun rdzob lus su gyur ces brjod/_/gzugs 
[\[242a.5\]]ni dbu ba 'dra ste snying po med/_/tshor ba rnams ni chu yi chu bur 'dra/_/'du shes rnams ni smig rgyu 'dra ba mthong /_/de la byis pa'i rang bzhin skye bos nor/_/sems pa dag ni chu shing snying po 'dra/_/rnam shes rnam pa kun du sgyu ma bzhin/_/gang gis 'gro ba 
[\[242a.6\]]lhar bcas 'khyam byas pa/_/de ltar mthong bas rgyal bas lung yang bstan/_/de nas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid 'od de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon 
[\[242a.7\]]par bstod nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par nams kyang chos la rmongs par ma gyur/_nams kyang tshul khrims la snying por 'du shes par ma gyur/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la snying por 'du shes par ma gyur te/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shes 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhol bar gyur to/_/nam yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dngos por ma dmigs te/_'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig gzings las rgya mtsho chen po rgal nas gzings bor te gar dga' bar 'gro ba de bzhin du dge slong sprin gyi 
[\[242b.2\]]rgyal po de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par byed mod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/'di lta ste dper na mi zhig me 'dod pa des mes dgos pa byed mod kyi tshig pa'i nyes pa'ang srung ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems 
[\[242b.3\]]dpa' sprin gyi rgyal po de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams mthong mod kyi/_mngon par zhen pa'i nyes pa'ang bsrung ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la'ang ston mod kyi/_mngon par zhen pa'i nyes pa las kyang zlog par byed do/_/shes rab kyi 
[\[242b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed mod kyi/_des sems can de dag dang /_sangs rgyas de dag tu 'dzin pa'ang med do/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur pa de 
[\[242b.5\]]gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na thabs mkhas pa gang 
[\[242b.6\]]dang ldan pas dge slong sprin gyi rgyal po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[242b.7\]]dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa yongs su sbyong ngo /_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba zhes bya ba bsgoms te/_rab tu goms par byas/_lam du byas/_rten du byas/_nan tan 
[\[243a.2\]]du byas/_rab tu 'dris par byas/_legs par brtsams shing rab tu rdzogs par byas te/_des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba dang rab tu zhi bar rtogs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[243a.3\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang zhi ba dang rab tu zhi bar rtogs so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang zhi ba dang rab tu zhi bar rtogs so/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[243a.4\]]dper na 'dus ma byas kyi khams mi skye mi 'gag pa de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang mi skye mi 'gag go/_/'di lta ste/_dper na bdag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dmigs te/_pha rol tu 
[\[243a.5\]]phyin pa drug ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mi skye mi 'gag go/_/chos thams cad ni zhi ba ste zhi ba de yang mi dmigs/_gang gi zhi ba de yang mi dmigs so/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_
[\[243a.6\]]gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_nyi ma snang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[243a.7\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]yod de/_des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la lo bye ba phrag brgyad cur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas te/_yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/_/de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[243b.2\]]thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la brtson par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[243b.3\]]pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pas dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/dge slong ji ltar 
[\[243b.4\]]spyad pas bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par bya'i sbyin pa mi sbyin par ni mi bya'o/_/sbyin gnas kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par bya'i sbyin gnas mi 'tshal bar ni mi bya'o/_/
[\[243b.5\]]sbyin bdag gi ngo bo nyid dmigs par mi bya'i sbyin bdag tu mi 'gyur bar ni mi bya'o/_/des las kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs par bya'i las bdag gir bya ba dang 'gal bar ni mi bya'o/_/bslab pa'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par bya'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi bslab par ni mi 
[\[243b.6\]]bya'o/_/sbyin pa de yang byang chub tu bsngo bar bya ste/_byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs par mi bya/_bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyang dmigs par mi bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi bsngo bar yang mi bya'o/_/dge slong 'di lta ste/_dper na chu'i nang na zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 
[\[243b.7\]]snang ba de zla bar yang shes par mi bya/_de zla ba ma yin par yang shes par mi bya ba de bzhin du bya ba thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/_/bya ba de lta bus sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pas sbyin pa de lta bus sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas sbyin pa yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes dpag tu med pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[244a.2\]]pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa des sbyin pa bsngo ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnyed par bya ba'i phyir gdams pa dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[244a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de yang de phyin chad bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_byang chub mngon par 
[\[244a.4\]]rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gzhan tshad med pa dang ma bral bar gyur to/_/de nyid de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su dag pa 
[\[244a.5\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yongs su dag pa'i rgyur gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa dang /_
[\[244a.6\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[244a.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dpag tu 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]med ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med kyi gsung rab la dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig byung ste/_de nas dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo 
[\[244b.2\]]gros de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros des 
[\[244b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi phyir spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[244b.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med kyis dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i 
[\[244b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khong du chud par bya/_sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_len pa'i ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_sbyin bdag ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_
[\[244b.6\]]sbyin gnas ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_sbyin gnas mchod pa ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_bsngo ba ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_gang bsngo ba de yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya/_gang du bsngo ba dang gang gis bsngo ba de yang ngo bo nyid 
[\[244b.7\]]med par khong du chud par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/len pa ni len pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/sbyin gnas kyang sbyin gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]kyis stong ngo /_/bsngo ba yang bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/byang chub kyang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de ltar stong pa nyid la mos pa ni bya ba tshad med pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_
[\[245a.2\]]sbyin pa'i yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob cing 'bags pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bud med rin po che mngon par sprul na/_de yang bud med rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/_de la bud med rin po 
[\[245a.3\]]che'i ming ma dmigs pa de bzhin du/_rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros sbyin pa la sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs mod kyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro/_len pa ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs mod kyi len pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro/_sbyin 
[\[245a.4\]]bdag ngo bo nyid kyang mi dmigs mod kyi sbyin bdag ces bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs mod kyi/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro/_byang chub kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs mod kyi/_byang chub 
[\[245a.5\]]ces bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro/_byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro'o/_/rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bya ba'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs mod kyi bya ba yang chud 
[\[245a.6\]]mi gson te/_de tsam gyis de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med kyis de lta bu'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin du bcug nas zhi ba'i sa yongs su 
[\[245a.7\]]'dzin pa thob ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ma zhi ba'i sa la mi spyod do/_/gang mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhi ba de sbyin pa'i zhi ba'o zhes de ltar mthong bas zhi ba'i chos rnams mngon du gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis dang the tshom za na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[245b.2\]]'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid du gyur par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar na de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[245b.3\]]pa la bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang tshul khrims mtshungs so/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag 
[\[245b.4\]]tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_'jam dpal rin po che dag pa'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[245b.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus dpe 
[\[245b.6\]]med ces bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyab 'jug gis byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rigs chen por skyes pa/_bram 
[\[245b.7\]]ze'i gsang tshig kha ton du 'don cing bzung ba rig byed gsum gyi pha rol du son pa/_sgra nges par sbyor ba dang /_shes gsal dang bcas pa dang /_yi ge rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang /_sngon byung ba'i gtam lnga po rnams dang /_brda sprod pa dang /_'jig rten rgyang pa na pa dang /_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]mchod sbyin gyi rgyud dang /_bud med dang /_skyes pa'i mtshan la mchog tu mkhas par gyur pa/_rang gi rigs kyi 'dul ba la rjes su gnang ba/_yongs su grags pa/_rab tu byung ba'i slob dpon du gyur pa zhig yod de/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[246a.2\]]khyab 'jug gis byin des sangs rgyas brtson 'grus dpe med ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gi gsang tshig las byung ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur te/_gsum du 
[\[246a.3\]]'gyur ba med do/_/gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi las ches rnam par rgyal zhing chos can chos kyi rgyal po ste rin po che bdun dang ldan no/_/de la rin po che 'di bdun 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che 
[\[246a.4\]]dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang /_rin po che de bdun no/_/de la bu stong tshang ba yod de/_dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms 
[\[246a.5\]]pa rnams so/_/des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten chad pa dang /_mtshon gyis ma yin par chos kyis phab ste rab tu gnas so/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[246a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te 
[\[246a.7\]]'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu chen po dag 'jig rten na mthong ba rnyed par dka' ste/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus dpe med ga la ba der 'gro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nam 'on te mi ldan pa'i bar du shes par bya'o/_/de ste ldan na ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gdon mi za bar rig par bya'o/_/ji ste mi ldan na yang de lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa dag mthong ba'ang legs so snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[246b.2\]]bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyab 'jug gis byin bram ze'i bu stong phrag drug cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 
[\[246b.3\]]dpe med de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyab 'jug gis byin des de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[246b.4\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa dpag tu ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa grangs ma mchis/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa ma mchis/_gzhal du ma mchis/_
[\[246b.5\]]brjod du ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar bgyid/_
[\[246b.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci yongs su sbyangs pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med des khyab 'jug gis byin bram ze'i rigs shing sA la 
[\[246b.7\]]chen po lta bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bram ze tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos srog gcod pa spang bar bya ste/_
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]des srog gcod pa mi dmigs par bya'o/_/des ma byin par len pa'ang spang bar bya ste/_ma byin par len pa mi dmigs par bya'o/_/'dod pa la log par g.yem pa yang spang bar bya ste/_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa mi dmigs par bya'o/_/
[\[247a.2\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yang spang bar bya ste/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba mi dmigs par bya'o/_/phra ma'i tshig kyang spang bar bya ste/_phra ma'i tshig kyang mi dmigs par bya'o/_/ngag rtsub po yang spang bar bya ste/_ngag rtsub po yang mi dmigs par bya'o/_/tshig kyal pa yang spang bar 
[\[247a.3\]]bya ste/_tshig kyal pa yang mi dmigs par bya'o/_/brnab sems kyang spang bar bya ste/_brnab sems kyang mi dmigs par bya'o/_/gnod sems kyang spang bar bya ste/_gnod sems kyang mi dmigs par bya'o/_/yang dag par lta ba can du yang bya ste yang 
[\[247a.4\]]dag par lta ba mi dmigs par bya'o/_/chos ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang shes par bya ste/_de dag mi dmigs par bya zhing mngon par mi zhen par bya ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de 
[\[247a.5\]]ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sa la snang ba thob par 'gyur te/_chos gang yang mi 'dzin cing chos gang la yang mngon par mi zhen to/_/chos gang la yang dmigs pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/gang 
[\[247a.6\]]de ltar mthong ba des ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ngo /_/gang gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des ni chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/gang gis chos gang yang mi mthong ba de ci yang mi shes so/_/gang ci yang mi shes pa de byang chub kyi phyir spyod do/_/
[\[247a.7\]]gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de ci la'ang mi spyod do/_/gang ci la'ang mi spyod pa de/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ci'ang 'tshang mi rgya ste/_gang ci'ang 'tshang mi rgya ba de ni tshul khrims yongs su 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang de ltar nges pa med pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa des ni chos nyid mthong ngo /_/gang gis chos nyid mthong ba de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[247b.2\]]rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa zhes bya'o/_/zhi gnas dam pa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med des rab tu zhi ba'i sa bstan pa khyab 'jug gis byin bram ze'i 
[\[247b.3\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med de la zhi ba dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/khyod kyis 'dod chags de bzhin zhe sdang zhi/_/khyod ni gti mug bral zhing zag pa'ang 
[\[247b.4\]]bas/_/rnam par 'dren pa zhi ba'i sa la bzhugs/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nga rgyal zhi zhing dregs dang rnam par bral/_/dri med nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad de/_/rtag par rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams ston/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod 
[\[247b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang na nyon mongs rab tu mi skye ba/_/zhi ba'i sa la bcom ldan rab bsten cing /_/zhi ba'i sa la sras rnams gnas su btsud/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzugs rnams zhi bar bcom ldan rab tu gsung /_/de bzhin 
[\[247b.6\]]tshor ba 'du shes sems pa rnams/_/rnam par shes pa'i rgyud kyang zhi bar gsungs/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dus byas 'di zhi 'dus ma byas pa'ang zhi/_/khyod kyi spyod yul cho ga de bzhin zhi/_/brtson 'grus zhi zhing spyod pa'ang de bzhin 
[\[247b.7\]]te/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zhi ba'i yul rnams rab tu mkhyen/_/de ni srog chags tha ma'i sa ma lags/_/'gro ba der ni nyan thos mkhas mi mchi/_/rang rgyal dag gis de ni yongs mi rtogs/_/gang zag mchog khyod 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]'gro ba gang mkhyen pa/_/de nas sa dang chu dang rlung ma mchis/_/der 'byung rnams kyi 'gro ba ma mchis bshad/_/de na nyi zla rnams kyang 'gro ma mchis/_/de mkha' ma lags bar dang sa ma lags/_/thams cad dngos po ma mchis 'di 
[\[248a.2\]]yang bshad/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul de bzhin te/_/bde bar gshegs pas rab tu zhi ba bshad/_/zhi ba thob mdzad zhi 'gro bla na med/_/rab zhi dri ma thams cad 'khru ba ste/_/gang 'drir 'khrus bgyid mya ngan yong 'da' zhing /_/rgyal ba skyob pa kun gyi 
[\[248a.3\]]spyod yul mchi/_/'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa kun mkhyen cing /_/de dag spyod pa bde gshegs rab mkhyen te/_/chos 'di rnams ni rang bzhin zhi bar mkhyen/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi la dgyes shing yid zhi de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[248a.4\]]zhugs la chab bzhin du ni bsil bar gyur/_/zhi ba'i sa la 'gro ba rab 'dzud pa/_/sems zhi bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par 'dren pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin cing /_/thub pa khyod ni 'khor ba'i bcings kun pas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba khyod 
[\[248a.5\]]mkhyen te/_/mya ngan 'das khyod bde gshegs khyod la 'dud/_/zhi gnas thugs su chud rtogs mgon bstod pa'i/_/bsod nams mi nyung bdag gis gang bsags pa/_/dpe med shin tu bsgrubs pa'i lam de yis/_/zhi ba sangs rgyas sa de thob par shog_/
[\[248a.6\]]mgon la zhi bar 'thun pa'i sgra dag gis/_/bde gshegs ston pa zhi dgyes bstod pas su/_/zhi ba'i sa de shin tu thob par shog_/rgal nas skye bo mi mkhas bsgral bar bgyi/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyab 'jug gis byin des de bzhin 
[\[248a.7\]]gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpe med de la zhi ba dang 'thun par tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyin chad sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su sbyangs/_sems 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]can khrag khrig dpag tu med pa du ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su smin par byas te/_yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba yang dag par 'dzin du btsud do/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyab 'jug 
[\[248b.2\]]gis byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu khyab 'jug gis byin zhes bya bar
