[\[248b.3\]]gyur to/_/'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug zhi bar rab tu brtag par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i lam kun du bsten par bya'o/_/rgod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi gnas bsnyen par bya'o/_/
[\[248b.4\]]bsten par bya'o/_/bsgom par bya'o/_/mang du bya'o/_/'jam dpal zhi bar spyod pa la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/_ma zhi bar spyod pa la ni 'khor ba'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod 
[\[248b.5\]]pa ni yun ring por bzod pa la bsten cing bsnyen te bsgoms nas mang du byas so//_//bam po bzhi pa/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du 
[\[248b.6\]]med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de'i tshe de'i dus na pad ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_'jam dpal bskal pa pad ma'i 'byung gnas de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[248b.7\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]pa blo gros mtha' yas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa bshad du mi nus pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[249a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtha' yas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gzhan rnams mi skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de theg pa chen po la brtsams nas chos ston te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che ba dang /_
[\[249a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'ang 'chad do/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtha' yas de'i gsung rab la dge slong rtag tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan zhing bsdu ba'i 
[\[249a.4\]]dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud do/_/'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la rab tu gnas par gyur/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnyed par gyur/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur te/_byams pa chen po la gnas pa dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /_
[\[249a.5\]]dga' ba chen po la gnas pa dang /_btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang bral bar yang ma gyur to/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtha' yas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[249a.6\]]ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rnam par lta ba ni mchog ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rnam par lta ba de de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtha' yas de'i bstan pa kun 'dzin par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtha' yas de 
[\[249a.7\]]la ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa rnams kyi bstan pa kun bzung ngo /_/de 'di ltar bzod pa la rab tu gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]pa'i byang chub la yang dag par btsud de/_/de bzod pa la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lar sangs rgyas su ston/_la lar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston/_la lar dang por sems bskyed pa ston te/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rnam par lta ba de lta bu'i 
[\[249b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rnam par lta bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de 
[\[249b.3\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[249b.4\]]chos 'di myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba la nan tan bya'o/_/'jam dpal de sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir slob ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa de yongs su gzung ba la zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[249b.5\]]'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mi yi seng ge mi mchog 'jig rten mkhas/_/'das pa kun gyis bzod pa rab tu bsngags/_/'jig rten phan 'dod gang dag ma byung ba/_/mi mchog kun kyang bzod pa bsngags par 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i stobs 
[\[249b.6\]]dang ldan par gyur pa ni/_/dgra med byang chub la yang gzhol ba ste/_/bla na med pa'i bzod pa bsten pas na/_/'dren pa myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/mi yi seng ge de dag mi 'jigs bzod/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol ba'i tshe/_/mgo dang lag dang rkang pa rnams 
[\[249b.7\]]kyang byin/_/mkhas pa rnams ni skyo bar 'gyur ba med/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis dgra rnams kun kyang thul/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs rnams las rgyal/_/bzod pa rab tu bsten pas rang 'byung 'gyur/_/bzod pas mi 'chi go 'phang rnyed par 'ong /_/bzod pa bsten pas rab tu 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]gzugs bzang 'gyur/_/bzod pa bsten pas mi yi dbang por 'ong /_/bzod la bsten pas mtshan bzang 'chang ba yi/_/'jig rten rang byung de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis nyes las rgyal bar byed/_/bzod pa'i stobs ni de dag stobs kyi mchog_/
[\[250a.2\]]bzod pa bsten pas de dag dgrar rgol med/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa 'gro la phan 'dod pa/_/rang byung gang rnams 'das par gyur pa dag_/bzod la gnas te bdud rnams rab btul nas/_/'jig rten phan sems byang chub rab rnyed de/_/bla na med pa'i stobs ni bzod pa'o/_/
[\[250a.3\]]bzod pa'i stobs dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/stobs can de ni bzod pa bsten pas na/_/chos rnams gang yang ci lta bzhin du bzod/_/de la phan sems stobs dang ldan zhes gsung /_/bzod la gnas pas the tshom rnams kyang gcod/_/bzod la gnas pas ye shes 
[\[250a.4\]]dag par 'gyur/_/bzod la gnas pas the tshom med pa ste/_/rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs mchog bsnyen par gyis/_/bzod pa 'di ni rgyal bas rab tu bsngags/_/bzod pa des kyang bsams pa kun 'grub ste/_/de bas mtshungs med bzod la bsten gyis dang /_/ring 
[\[250a.5\]]por mi thogs 'jig rten mkhyen par 'gyur/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas bzod pa gnyis la bsten par bya ste/_gzhan las 'gyur ba med par bzod pa dang /_chos rnams la rjes su 'thun par bzod pa'o/_/'jam dpal yang bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[250a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs par gyur te/_brtson 'grus ji lta bar le lo yang de bzhin/_le lo ji lta bar brtson 'grus kyang de bzhin no/_/chos de gnyi ga la yang mtshan 
[\[250a.7\]]nyid gcig ste/_rab tu zhi ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa/_g.yo ba dang rlom sems med pa/_skyod pa med pa/_'gyur ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_sems pa med pa/_sems pa dang bral ba/_phan tshun du mi sems pa ste/_ji ltar bdag mi sems pa 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]lta bu ste/_de ni mtshan nyid med pa/_btags pa med pa/_brjod du med pa/_gzung du med pa/_'du shes med pa/_'du shes dang bral ba/_sems pa med pa/_sems pa dang bral ba/_mi tshor ba tshor ba med pa/_rnam par mi shes pa/_rnam par shes pa med pa/_mi gos 
[\[250b.2\]]pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa/_mi gnas pa shes par byed pa med pa'o/_/chos de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing brtul ba brtan par gyur to/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam 
[\[250b.3\]]gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[250b.4\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal po de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa snang bar gyur to/_/'od de 
[\[250b.5\]]la sgrib par byed nus pa'i chos gang yang med de sgrib pa thams cad las thal nas snang bar byed do/_/'od de yang bde bas bsil ba reg na bde ba/_dge ba'i rtsa bas bskyed pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sems can gang 'od des reg pa rnams sngon ma rnyed 
[\[250b.6\]]pa'i bde ba rnyed par gyur/_sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong des pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la lo bye ba khrag khrig sum cu rtsa drug gi 
[\[250b.7\]]bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/_yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/_/bshad pa'ang 'dzin cing bdag gi don yang mi gtong ngo /_/des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal po de la lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'di ltar brtson 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]'grus mnyam pa nyid brtsams kun 'dri ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bgyi/_ji tsam gyis brtson 'grus 
[\[251a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ba lags/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal pos lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid mtshan nyid gcig pa la brtsams te/_bstan pa'i tshig bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong gis lung bstan to/_/
[\[251a.3\]]de nas dge slong des pa des de bzhin gshegs pa de las brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid thos nas brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur/_des brtson 'grus kyi mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal po de la brtson 'grus 
[\[251a.4\]]mnyam pa nyid dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/lha dang bcas dang mi dang bdud/_/lha min bcas ris 'jig rten na/_/'dren pa khyod dang 'dra ma mchis/_/mi 'dra lhag pa ga la mchis/_/sdig ma mchis pa'i 'gror gshegs pa/_/
[\[251a.5\]]bde gshegs mtshungs mnyam thugs ldan pa/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi sgrub pa ni/_/ma smad mi g.yo zla ma mchis/_/khyod la le lo brtson 'grus mtshungs/_/rnam par 'dren pa chos 'di dag_/brag ca dang ni mtshungs 'dra zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'dud cing ston/_
[\[251a.6\]]chos rnams bye brag med mkhyen nas/_/khyod kyi brtson 'grus zhan ma mchis/_/brtson 'grus stobs ni pha rol phyin/_/bde gshegs rkang gnyis gtso phyag 'tshal/_/brtson 'grus dag gi mnyam nyid 'di/_/gang gis rab rtogs smra ba'i rtag_/khrag khrig bdud rnams btul 
[\[251a.7\]]nas su/_/byang chub dam pa de dag reg_/stobs bcu 'jig rten snang mdzad kun/_/brtson 'grus mnyam la brten nas su/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rab rnyed de/_/gzhan yang de bzhin rnyed par mdzad/_/'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis/_/brtson 'grus mnyam nyid 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]shin tu bsngags/_/srid pa mthar phyin srin 'gags pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang de bzhin bstod/_/gang zag gang dag mi skyo bar/_/zhi gnas brtson 'grus brtsams gyur pa/_/mi mkhas 'gro ba rtogs bgyi'i slad/_/de dag byang chub rnyed par 'gyur/_/zhi gnas stobs 
[\[251b.2\]]kyi pha rol phyin/_/brtson 'grus mnyam rnyed 'gro mchog gang /_/'jig rten mgon khyod de yi yab/_/de dag rnams ni khyod kyi sras/_/de dag rnyed pa legs rnyed de/_/mir ni yang dag legs par mchis/_/de dag brtson 'grus mnyam nyid 'di/_/sems la yang dag 'grub 
[\[251b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/gang rnams brtson 'grus mnyam nyid la/_/'jig rten sgron ma sems 'jug pa/_/de dag rang 'byung bde bar gshegs/_/stobs bcu'i stobs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas dge slong des pa des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal po de la 
[\[251b.4\]]brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas par ma gyur te/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[251b.5\]]thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du yid gnyis dang /_som nyi dang /_the tshom za na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad 
[\[251b.6\]]grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong des pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid la brtson par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni 
[\[251b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du 'gyur te/_bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rnyed par bya ba'i phyir sems rtse gcig par gyur te de'i phyir de zhi ba mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]na bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan 
[\[252a.2\]]pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas yang 
[\[252a.3\]]dag 'phags de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rgyu ba med par gyur te sems can de dag thams cad la 'dod pa'i kun nas dkris pa mi skye'o/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[252a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba de'i gsung rab de la de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong bsam gtan spyod yul zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_des de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas yang dag 'phags la bskal pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yid 
[\[252a.5\]]du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/_yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/_/dge slong bsam gtan spyod yul de la chos thams cad bsam gtan gyi dmigs par gyur to/_/de ltar dge slong bsam gtan spyod yul des bskal pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du zhi gnas la bsgoms par gyur to/_/
[\[252a.6\]]de zhi gnas kyi stobs de dang ldan pas rtsom pa thams cad la dbang thob par gyur to/_/de chos gang dang gang la dmigs par byed pa chos de dang de zhi bar kun bsgoms te/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa/_nam mkha' dang 
[\[252a.7\]]mnyam zhing mtshungs pa ste/_gang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa sems kyang de'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'o/_/gang sems kyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa de rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'o/_/gang rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de byang chub kyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa'o/_/gang byang 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]chub kyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa de byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa'o/_/gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa de byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de zhi ba'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ste/_de ni 
[\[252b.2\]]chos thams cad zhi ba la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par nam yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan par ma gyur te/_smon lam gyi stobs kyis ni lan mang du 'dod pa'i khams su skyes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa'i 
[\[252b.3\]]khams na sems can snod du 'gyur ba mang bas don gyi dbang 'di la brten nas 'dod pa'i khams su skyes te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su non cing snying brtse ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong bsam gtan spyod yul zhes bya bar gyur pa 
[\[252b.4\]]de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong bsam gtan spyod yul zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[252b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas zhi gnas dang 'thun pa'i lhag mthong bsgom par bya'o/_/zhi gnas dang 'thun pa'i lhag mthong sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rab tu zhi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[252b.6\]]pa yang dag par 'grub bo/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[252b.7\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcur gyur to/_/'jam dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po de'i gsung rab la dge slong ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba dang /_bsam gtan bla ma zhes bya ba gnyis nyan thos kyi zung mchog gi zung /_bzang 
[\[253a.2\]]po'i zung shig byung ste/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ye shes bla ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po de'i nyan thos rnams lta ba phun sum tshogs pa la rab 
[\[253a.3\]]tu 'dul/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni mchog gi don rnyed par rab tu 'dul te/_phyogs gang na dge slong ye shes bla ma dang /_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma de 'khod pa'i phyogs der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po mdzad pa chung bar gyur to/_/dge 
[\[253a.4\]]slong ye shes bla ma ni sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par 'dzud/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni spyod pa la yang dag par 'dzud/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni thabs 
[\[253a.5\]]mkhas pa la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni lhag mthong la 
[\[253a.6\]]'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni zhi gnas la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa la 'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni rab tu zhi ba'i ye shes la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni stobs kyi ye shes la 'doms/_dge slong 
[\[253a.7\]]bsam gtan bla ma ni mi 'jigs pa'i ye shes la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rab tu 'dul/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]nan tan la 'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni sems bcos pa dang bsdu ba'i phyir 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni don dam pa'i ye shes la 'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni kun rdzob shes pa la 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni thabs shes pa la 'doms/_
[\[253b.2\]]dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni thabs shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni sems can 'dul ba'i phyir 'doms/_dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni bsam gtan gyis 'dul bar 'doms/_dge slong ye shes bla ma ni thams cad mkhyen pa la 'doms/_
[\[253b.3\]]dge slong bsam gtan bla ma ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'doms te/_de ltar dge slong gnyis kyi yon tan gyi khyad par ni bskal pa brjod du med par bshad kyang yon tan gyi khyad par zad par mi nus te/_dge slong de gnyis de tsam du yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan 
[\[253b.4\]]no/_/de ltar dge slong de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po'i bstan pa yongs su bzung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dge slong nyan 
[\[253b.5\]]thos gnyis po des bzung nas gnas par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong ye shes bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad 
[\[253b.6\]]grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na shes rab can gyi mchog dge slong ye shes bla ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog dge slong bsam gtan bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi 
[\[253b.7\]]blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bzhud pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong bsam gtan bla ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]mkhas pa la brtson par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa zhi bar nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i sa zhi ba la bsnyen cing 
[\[254a.2\]]goms par byas/_mang du byas pas gang la dmigs par byed pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skur shes so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sman gser 'od kyis mig bskus pa'i mis gzugs ci mthong ba de thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ste/_kha dog gzhan du ma yin 
[\[254a.3\]]pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin zhi ba la bsnyen cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa gang la dmigs par byed pa dang /_thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta 
[\[254a.4\]]ste dper na yongs su dag pa'i nor bu rin po che snod gang du bzhag pa'i snod de thams cad de'i kha dog tu gnas pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba la bsnyen cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs 
[\[254a.5\]]pa gang dang sems phrad pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skur mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu gang dang gang la mang du rtogs pa rmi lam na yang de dag shes pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba la bsnyen cing bsgoms te 
[\[254a.6\]]mang du byas pas chos gang mngon du gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi skur mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu bzo ci dang ci la slob pa de dang de tshar phyin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba la slob pa'i byang chub 
[\[254a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas mthong bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de sbyin pa sbyin pa na sbyin gnas thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skur byin gyis rlob ste/_de'i sbyin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phul bar 'gyur ro/_/des sbyin pa de yang de bzhin 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gshegs pa la phul bar shes te/_de ltar de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro/_/de thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la dad pas tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs 
[\[254b.2\]]med pa nas brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na pad ma bla ma zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_yang 'jam dpal pad ma'i bla ma'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[254b.3\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_yang 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[254b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de'i rim gro byed pa dge slong legs par brtags spyod ces bya ba zhig byung ste/_des de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa la rab tu dga' ba dang gus pas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro 
[\[254b.5\]]ba 'dzin zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba mang ba/_sangs rgyas khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_dge slong legs par brtags spyod dang yun ring po nas lhan cig spyad cing lhan cig bsten pa/_lhan cig 'grogs shing gnas 
[\[254b.6\]]pa/_las lhan cig bsags pa zhig yod do/_/de nas dge slong legs par brtags spyod de rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod shes par 
[\[254b.7\]]gyis shig_/da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas de chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba rab tu ston gyis rgyal rigs tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs shing chos thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[255a.2\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin de dge slong legs par brtags spyod dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[255a.3\]]gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de mthong ma thag tu 'di ltar de'ang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang skal ba mnyam par spyad pa'i phyir/_yun ring 
[\[255a.4\]]por dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa las 'gal bar ma byas pa'i phyir de sems rab tu dad de/_bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med par tshul khrims yang dag par bsgrubs shing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mos te/_sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag tu gyur cing sbyin pa dang tshul khrims 
[\[255a.5\]]la rnam par rtse ba des bcom ldan 'das dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum du bdag gi rigs dang ming nas smos te gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'gro ba 'dzin ces bgyi'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni 'gro ba 
[\[255a.6\]]'dzin ces bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin ces bgyi ba lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa des rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[255a.7\]]'gro ba 'dzin de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'gro ba 'dzin khyod ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin la/_lha dang lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi dang /_sems can gzhan dag ni 'khor ba'i bde ba 'dod na 'gro ba 'dzin khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong bas de 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te ming nas 'byin/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin des de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs shing sA la 
[\[255b.2\]]chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thams cad mkhyen pa thob par 'tshal/_sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes skyed par 'tshal/_mun nag la snang ba bgyid par 'tshal/_lam gol bar 
[\[255b.3\]]zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam ston par 'tshal/_ded pa rnams drang bar 'tshal/_shes rab ma mchis pa rnams la shes rab rab tu bstan par 'tshal/_nor ma mchis pa'i sems can rnams nor dang ldan par bgyid par 'tshal/_sems can dbul po rnams 
[\[255b.4\]]la 'phags pa'i nor gyis phyug por bgyid par 'tshal/_bying ba rnams la gzings stsal bar 'tshal/_gzings bcing bar 'tshal/_gru sbyar bar 'tshal/_stegs gzugs par 'tshal/_zam pa gdags par 'tshal/_skrag pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur 
[\[255b.5\]]bar 'tshal/_skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'tshal/_mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'tshal/_rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur bar 'tshal/_gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'tshal/_mi ngoms pa 
[\[255b.6\]]rnams ngoms par bgyid par 'tshal/_cho ga ma 'tshal ba rnams tshim par bgyid par 'tshal/_tshig pa rnams zhi bar bgyid par 'tshal/_sngangs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar bgyid par 'tshal/_na ba rnams la gsos bgyid par 'tshal/_'gum pa dag gso bar 
[\[255b.7\]]'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la sbyin pa stsal bas thar pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba dang /_gang la bgyi ba bgyis pas mi 'chi ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra ba 'jig rten thams cad na gzhan gang yang ma mthong 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]lags so/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba bgyid do/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[256a.2\]]'di ltar khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa la sems 'jug pa legs so legs so/_/'gro ba 'dzin khyod kyi spobs pa legs so/_/dam bcas pa legs so/_/yid la byed pa bzang ngo /_/yang dag par zhugs pa mtshungs pa med do/_/
[\[256a.3\]]bsam pa mnyams so/_/khyod kyi sems kyi rgyud ni snum mo/_/de lta bas na 'gro ba 'dzin dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par bya'o/_/tshul khrims la rab tu gnas te sbyin pa sbyin no/_/'gro ba 'dzin chos 'di gnyis la brtson par bya ste/_gang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 
[\[256a.4\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/_tshul khrims la gnas te sbyin pa sbyin na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/_byang chub la yang nye bar gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gtong ba la mos shing tshul khrims la 
[\[256a.5\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub rnyed par mi dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de la sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i gtam thos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[256a.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam rgya cher btab bo/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de la des sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo 'dod pa rnams 
[\[256a.7\]]bor nas/_/lam mchog dam pa 'di ni rab tu ston/_/legs par bshad pa'i chos de thos nas su/_/byang chub mchog tu sems kyis smon lam 'debs/_/dpa' bo gang dag bla med byang chub zhugs/_/dang ba'i yid kyis spyad pa spyod bgyid cing /_/byang chub bla med zhi ba zhugs 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]nas su/_/'gro la sman pa'i slad du chos spyod pa/_/de dag rjes su bdag ni slob 'tshal bas/_/rgyal ba rnams la dad pas bslab par bgyi/_/'gro ba bcings pa rnams ni dgrol slad du/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi/_/mdongs par gyur pa rnams kyi mig dbye 
[\[256b.2\]]slad/_/log pa'i lam du mchis pa slar bzlog slad/_/bla na med pa'i lam du dgod 'tshal bas/_/ston la phyag 'tshal bgyi ba bdag gis bgyi/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas brgya la bdag gis spyad/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam du mchi bar sems/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[256b.3\]]dge 'dun bsnyen par 'tshal/_/ston pa la ni phyag 'tshal bgyi ba bgyi/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rjes su slob 'tshal te/_/zhi ba rtogs pa'i rjes su mchi bar 'tshal/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ma lus 'dor 'tshal te/_/de bas rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyi/_/lam stor sems 
[\[256b.4\]]can rab tu mdongs pa rnams/_/bdag gis mchog gi lam la dgod par 'tshal/_/bde ba dam par rab tu gzhag par 'tshal/_/de bas rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyi/_/'gro ba thams cad dga' bar bdag bgyid 'tshal/_/shul rnams chab kyis chag chag gdab 
[\[256b.5\]]par 'tshal/_/bsil ba'i sa de rab tu bstan par 'tshal/_/de bas rgyal ba la ni mchod pa bgyi/_/'gro ba rnams ni nyon mongs sred pas skom/_/nyon mongs me yis tshig pa'i sems can kun/_/zhi ba ma mthong mgon med dub pa rnams/_/dgrol bar 'tshal bas bdag 
[\[256b.6\]]ni bgyi ba bgyi/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis mi ngoms pas/_/chags pa'i stobs kyis 'khor bar 'khor gyur cing /_/yongs 'dzin tshol ba'i sems can byis pa rnams/_/dgrol bar 'tshal bas bdag ni bgyi ba bgyid/_/zhe sdang stobs kyis byis pa rnam par 
[\[256b.7\]]rmongs/_/legs par ma bsdams sems kyis zhe sdang skyed/_/de dag bdag gis yongs su dgrol slad du/_/rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba rgya chen bgyi/_/gti mug stobs kyis sems can byis pa bsgribs/_/bgyi dang mi bgyi ma 'tshal gyur pa rnams/_/de dag bdag gis yongs 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]su dgrol slad du/_/rgyal ba la ni bgyi ba rgya chen bgyi/_/phrag dog stobs kyis byis pa rnams byung ste/_/zhi ba ma 'tshal srid par bcings gyur pa/_/de dag bdag gis yongs su dgrol slad du/_/rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba rgya chen bgyi/_/ser sna'i stobs kyis byis pa 
[\[257a.2\]]rnams byung ste/_/gtong dang thar dang 'bras bu ma 'tshal bas/_/kun nas sogs shing sdug bsngal myong gyur pa/_/de dag slad du mchod pa shin tu bgyi/_/nyon mongs stobs kyis byis pa rnams gtses te/_/ma 'tshal bas ni sdig pa'i sug las bgyid/_/de slad 'gro ba rnams su 
[\[257a.3\]]sdug bsngal myong /_/de dag slad du bdag ni mchod pa bgyi/_/sems can gang dag khyod kyi bstan la dad/_/de dag rnams kyang nyes pa 'dis mi reg_/rgyal ba de dag rjes su slob 'tshal bas/_/de slad rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyid/_/su dag 'dod chags bral ba rab tshol 
[\[257a.4\]]zhing /_/rang 'byung 'gyur zhes spyod pa rnams spyod pa/_/de dag gi yang rjes su bdag slob ste/_/de bas rgyal ba bgyi ba bdag bgyid lags/_/su dag thams cad mkhyen nyid rab tshol zhing /_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyid/_/de dag gi yang rjes su bdag slob cing /_/rgyal 
[\[257a.5\]]ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/_/su dag stobs rnams yongs su tshol ba na/_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyid/_/de dag gi yang rjes su bdag slob ste/_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/_/su dag 'jigs pa ma mchis rab tshol zhing /_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyid/_/
[\[257a.6\]]de dag gi yang rjes su bdag slob cing /_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/_/su dag so so yang dag rig tshol zhing /_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyid/_/de dag gi yang rjes su bdag slob cing /_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/_/su dag dbang po lnga rnams rab tshol zhing /_/
[\[257a.7\]]rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyid/_/de dag gi yang rjes su bdag slob cing /_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad chos gang dag_/rgyal ba'i sku la ma 'dres mnga' ba rnams/_/su dag tshol zhing sangs rgyas rnams mchod pa/_/de dag rjes 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]su slob cing mchod par bgyi/_/spyod yul spyod dang dbang po drug dag pa/_/ye shes rnam dag ting 'dzin rnam dag dang /_/tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin rnams rab tshol zhing /_/der ni bdag gis sangs rgyas 'dren pa mchod/_/de nas dge slong legs par brtags spyod kyis rgyal rigs 
[\[257b.2\]]shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin las stobs bcu'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin spobs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag kyang 
[\[257b.3\]]de bzhin spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs par brtags spyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas dge slong legs par brtags spyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa de la stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i tshigs su 
[\[257b.4\]]bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bde bar gshegs pas bskal pa byer spyad pas/_/ma nyams 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas brnyes pa/_/de thob bgyid slad 'dren pa spyad par bgyi/_/mi mchog khyod 'dra'i sangs rgyas thob par shog_/spyad pa spyod tshe 'das pa'i rnam par 'dren/_/
[\[257b.5\]]sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyod kyis mchod/_/rgyal ba de dag rim gro mdzad nas su/_/mtshungs pa ma mchis bla med byang chub brnyes/_/'dren pa dung dang rnga chen khar rnga yis/_/rgyal ba bye ba stong dag rab mchod pas/_/de slad dbyangs kyis khams gsum go bar mdzad/_/'gro 
[\[257b.6\]]ba rnams kyi yid kyang shin tu chags/_/rgyud sgra 'jam po shin tu drangs spyod cing /_/stobs bcu'i mchod rten rnams la blangs pas na/_/de slad rgyal ba yid mchi dga' ba yi/_/dbyangs kyis sems can khrag khrig rnam par 'grel/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi spyan sngar 
[\[257b.7\]]bzhugs nas su/_/glu dang rol mo'i sgra snyan kun blangs pas/_/de slad 'dren pa khyod kyi gsung yang mnyen/_/skyes pa bud med rnams kyi sems kyang sdud/_/zas mchog mtshungs pa ma mchis yid mchi rnams/_/khyod kyis rgyal ba nyan thos bcas rnams gsol/_/zas skom shin tu 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rnam mang legs mdzad pas/_/de slad longs spyod mang po rnams kyang brnyes/_/la ba 'jam po du kul ka shi pa/_/gser gyi kha dog dri med yid mchi ba/_/na bza' rigs che mdzes la phul bas na/_/de slad bde gshegs sku mdog bsam mi khyab/_/dga' zhing gus 
[\[258a.2\]]pa bzang po bskyed nas su/_/sngan chad sbyin gnas bla ma bsnyen bkur cing /_/zas dang skom rnams rgya cher phul bas na/_/'jig rten 'dren pas mtho ba bdun kyang brnyes/_/lha zas ro 'dra yid du mchi ba rnams/_/rgyal ba nyan thos bcas la gsol bas na/_/de slad ro yi ro mchog 
[\[258a.3\]]mtshan rnams kyang /_/'jig rten mkhyen pas yid du mchi ba brnyes/_/rtag tu bde gshegs rnams kyi mchod rten la/_/me tog dri rab de bzhin 'bras bu'i mchog_/kha dog ldan pa 'jam zhing mdzes pa phul/_/de slad 'dren pas 'bras bu mchog brnyes so/_/dri dang byug pa bde 
[\[258a.4\]]gshegs mchod rten la/_/khyod kyis rtag tu yid du mchi ba phul/_/de slad bde gshegs sku la dri dag ni/_/ji ltar tsan dan snod bzhin rab tu gsung /_/spri ka gur kum dri rab bzang po dag_/bde gshegs mchod rten dag la phul bas na/_/de slad sku las gur kum spos rab 
[\[258a.5\]]rnams/_/phyogs bcu kun tu dri de ldang bar gyur/_/me tog phreng mchog mdzes shing sna tshogs pa/_/rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa'i sku la btags/_/de slad khyod kyis gsung 'jam bshad pa rnams/_/ud pa la yi phreng ba bzhin du len/_/'jig rten mgon po bde gshegs 
[\[258a.6\]]gsung ba la/_/gtam smra rnams kyi bar chad ma mdzad pas/_/de slad 'khor la tshig rnams ston pa na/_/gzhan gyis bar chad bgyi ba yongs ma mchis/_/sems kyang thams cad nye bar bzhag nas su/_/rang byung ba yi chos rnams bshad pa gsan/_/yid ni kun tu gar yang ma 
[\[258a.7\]]g.yengs pas/_/de slad ston pas bshad pa chab mi 'tshal/_/sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan la/_/sman bzhin du ni 'du shes nyer bzhag ste/_/bdag nyid la ni nad par 'du shes bskyed/_/de slad khyod kyi gsung bstan kun gyis bzung /_/bde bar gshegs pa la ni sman 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]par bsgoms/_/bdag nyid la yang nad par 'du shes bskyed/_/chos la sman yin snyam du nyer bzhag nas/_/ji snyed dus kyi rgyal ba khyod kyis mchod/_/bde bar gshegs pa dag las chos gsan nas/_/gang gis ser sna nam yang ma bsten na/_/de dag thams cad de bzhin 
[\[258b.2\]]gshegs pa yis/_/rab tu bstan cing rgyal ba mnyes par mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs pa dag las chos gsan pas/_/ser sna ma mchis gyur pas shin tu bstan/_/de slad 'dren pa 'khor la 'chad pa na/_/khyod kyi spobs pa dag ni shin tu brjod/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa 
[\[258b.3\]]'tshal slad du/_/sngon chad khyod kyis chos rnams gang bsnyen pa/_/'dren pa bdag kyang de dag yongs su tshol/_/'dren pa'i yon tan yang dag rab bsngags pas/_/des ni rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur bar shog_/sems can thams cad rnam par 'dren gyur cig_/de nas 
[\[258b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' sra rnam par gnon pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis mngon par bstod pa'i tshe ma thos par yang mi dgongs/_dmas par yang mi dgongs pa de ni rgya mtsho bzhin du brtan pa nyid dus las mi yol lo/_/de 
[\[258b.5\]]ma thos par yang mi dgongs dmas par yang mi dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtags spyod dang /_'gro ba 'dzin de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa dag de de bzhin no/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[258b.6\]]khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pas/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing bskyed de/_khams so sor song ba'i 
[\[258b.7\]]sems can rnams rig nas ji lta bur 'thun par sprul pas chos bstan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos so/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong legs par brtags spyod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mthor bzhud de de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' legs par brtags spyod ces bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po 
[\[259a.2\]]lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[259a.3\]]'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /_cho 'phrul rnam pa mang pos sems can yongs su smin par byed 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa la rnal 'byor 
[\[259a.4\]]du bya'o/_/mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas so//_//bam po lnga pa/_'jam dpal sngon byung 
[\[259a.5\]]ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar du de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol de'i tshe de'i dus na ud pa la 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_'jam dpal ud pa la 'byung ba zhes pa'i bskal pa de la de bzhin 
[\[259a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu phra sems 
[\[259a.7\]]zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu phra sems de'i gsung rab la dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchog tu 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu phra sems de ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu phra sems de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[259b.2\]]'dug nas dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu phra sems de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[259b.3\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu phra sems kyis dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di la dge slong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[259b.4\]]po phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo la bzod par mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/zab mo la bzod par mos pa de ni bzod pas chos de dag la 'dod par byed do/_/'dod 
[\[259b.5\]]par byed pas sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/sgrub pas nan tan byed do/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de bzhin du chos de dag khong du chud par bya ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig go/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[259b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa de la blo rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba de sems can rnams la snying rje chen po gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzod pa 'di la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bzod pa 'di 
[\[259b.7\]]las bskyod mi nus so/_/'di ltar yang zhi ba'i blo gros chos de dag gi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/_/'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la the tshom med par 'gyur te/_'di ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/bzod pa 'di thob pas sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_'dis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa yin/_'dis chos thams cad kyi tshul mthong bar bya ba yin/_'dis chos thams cad kyi yul rtogs pa yin te/_de bas na sangs rgyas 
[\[260a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin no zhes de la sus kyang bsgyur ba'am bzlog par mi nus so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes pa'am bud med kyang rung zas zos pa de la sus kyang khyod kyis zas ma zos so zhes bsgyur mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de mngon sum ste/_
[\[260a.3\]]gzhan gyi rkyen ma yin pa de bzhin du zhi ba'i blo gros chos nyid 'di la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin no zhes sus kyang 'dzin du gzhug par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhan gyi rkyen gyis ma yin gyi/_chos nyid de la mngon sum pa'i phyir 
[\[260a.4\]]ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes pa'am bud med kyang rung ste/_skom 'thungs pa de la khyod kyis skom ma 'thungs so zhes sus kyang bslu ba'am log par 'dzin du gzhug mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de la mngon sum ste/_gzhan gyi rkyen ma yin pa de bzhin du chos 
[\[260a.5\]]nyid 'di la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin no zhes sus kyang bsgyur ba'am bslu bar mi nus so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na bden pa mthong ba'i nyan thos la 'di lam ma yin no/_/'di ni lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin no zhes de la 
[\[260a.6\]]sus kyang bslu ba'am log par 'dzin du gzhug mi nus pa de bzhin du zhi ba'i blo gros chos nyid 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'di chos nyid ma yin no zhes sus kyang de la bslu ba'am log par 'dzin du gzhug mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni mngon 
[\[260a.7\]]sum ste/_gzhan gyi rkyen ma yin pas ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa de bzhin du chos rnams la bzod do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang gis so so'i skye bo yang ma dmigs/_so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang ma yin/_nyan thos kyang ma yin/_nyan thos kyi chos kyang ma yin/_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyang ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma dmigs na de chos gang la yang gnas pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[260b.2\]]ldan 'das ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te/_chos rnams mi dmigs pa ni mi gnas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros legs so legs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di 
[\[260b.3\]]lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni ci la yang mi gnas pa de bzhin du zhi ba'i blo gros chos thams cad kyang mi gnas pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste mi gnas pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_
[\[260b.4\]]chung ngu rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_'bring du rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_cher rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa'o/_/chung ngu rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni shugs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin du bshad par bya/_'bring du rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin du 
[\[260b.5\]]bshad par bya/_cher rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin du bshad par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chung ngu rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa las ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs skye'o/_/'bring du rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa las ni rab tu zhi ba dmigs par 
[\[260b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/cher rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa las ni rab tu snang ba la sems 'jug ste/_de'i dmigs pa thams cad yongs su rtogs par 'gyur/_chos nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur/_chos nyid la rab tu gnas pas na don rnams legs par yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/de ni de'i 
[\[260b.7\]]don so so yang dag par rig pa yin no/_/des chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur te/_de ni de'i don so so yang dag par rig pa yin no/_/chos de rnams kyang skye bo rnams kyi nges pa'i tshig bzhin du 'chad de/_nges pa'i tshig de la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]skye bo de dang de dag nges pa'i tshig de dag la mos par byas kyang de la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa de ni de'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa yin no/_/de'i nges pa'i tshig la dus ji lta ba bzhin du spobs/_ji ltar chos nyan pa rnams kyis go ba de lta bur spobs/_/
[\[261a.2\]]chos rnams kyi chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin spobs/_chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa ji lta ba bzhin spobs/_ji ltar chos rnams mi skye mi 'gag pa de bzhin spobs/_ji ltar chos rnams 'gro ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med pa de bzhin spobs/_ji ltar chos rnams 'chi 'pho ba'ang med/_
[\[261a.3\]]skye ba'ang med pa de bzhin spobs/_ji ltar chos rnams yod pa ma yin pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar chos rnams mi rig cing mi snang ba de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar 'chad pa'ang med nyan pa'ang mi dmigs pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar las kyang med las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa 
[\[261a.4\]]de ltar spobs/_ji ltar 'khor ba yang med mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar gang yang 'khor ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'ang mi dmigs pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar byang chub dang byang chub par bya ba mi dmigs pa de lta bur spobs/_
[\[261a.5\]]ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar chos gang la'ang thob pa mi dmigs pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams spong ba med cing nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang thob pa med pa de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar 
[\[261a.6\]]nyan thos kyi chos rnams las mi 'da' zhing rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang thob par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur spobs/_ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las mi 'da' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spobs so/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 
[\[261a.7\]]mi 'dor zhing mya ngan las kyang yongs su mi 'da' ba de ltar spobs te/_de ni de'i spobs pa so so yang dag pa rig pa yin no/_/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa de yang chos gang la yang spobs par 'gyur ba med de/_de ltar na cher rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa'i thob pas thams cad la dbang 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]byed pa sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/cher rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas de re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[261b.2\]]kyi bya ba rnams kyang byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga dang spyod yul ci 'dra ba byang chub sems dpa' de'i cho ga dang spyod yul yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pa dang ldog pa ci 'dra ba de'i 'gro ba dang ldog pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs 
[\[261b.3\]]pa'i gzigs pa dang /_rnam par gzigs pa dang /_smyang ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_chos gos snam sbyar dang /_chig rkyang dang /_lhung bzed bsnams pa dang /_zos pa dang 'thungs pa ci 'dra bar de'i lta ba dang /_kun tu lta ba nas nyal ba dang smra ba dang cang mi zer ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu spyod pa gang gis de bzhin 
[\[261b.4\]]gshegs pa kun du spyod pa de'i spyod pa'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/cher 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob pas lus de nyid kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'dod na bskal pa brjod du med pa'i bar du 'dug go/_/de ltar cher 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs 
[\[261b.5\]]rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed na ci dang po sems bskyed pa de nyid kyis 
[\[261b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de ni ma yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sems gang gis thog ma chos la nges par 'gyur ba'i sems des dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shin 
[\[261b.7\]]tu phra sems de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/chos gang skye ba ma mchis 'byung ma mchis/_/'chi 'pho ma mchis rga bar mi 'gyur ba/_/skyes bu rgyal ba seng ge de ston cing /_/drang srong chen pos sems can de la bkod/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gang la dngos po ci yang ma mchis shing /_/gzhan gyi dngos po'ang sus kyang ma rnyed pa/_/nang na ma lags slad rol dag na yang /_/dngos po mi rnyed de la mgon pos bkod/_/bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i blo gsungs kyang /_/'gro ba gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/de dag 'gro las 
[\[262a.2\]]grol bar rnam par gsungs/_/grol nas sems can mang po rab tu 'grol/_/chos kun bdag ma mchis par ston mdzad cing /_/sems can 'dzin las 'jig rten rnam par 'grol/_/bdag nyid 'gro las grol zhing 'gro grol bas/_/de slad pha rol gshegs kyang rgal ma mchis/_/drang srong chen po 
[\[262a.3\]]srid pa'i pha rol byon/_/pha rol gshegs pa'ang gang yang rnyed mi 'gyur/_/pha rol ma mchis tshu rol ma mchis na/_/pha rol song ngo zhes kyang gsung du brjod/_/gang gis tshig tu smra ba de ma mchis/_/gang smras de yi tshig kyang yong ma mchis/_/gang la smras pa de yang rnyed mi 'gyur/_/gang gis rig pa de yang mchis ma lags/_/log 
[\[262a.4\]]par rtog la chags pa'i dbang gis su/_/'dir ni 'gro ba 'di kun rab tu 'khyams/_/mi gang zhig gis zhi ba'i chos rig pa/_/des ni rang byung de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /_/chos mchog zhi ba'i rnams kyang rab tu rtogs/_/dga' ba rnyed nas sems can tshim par bgyid/_/nyon mongs brgal nas de ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[262a.5\]]bdag nyid rgyal bar gyur cing bdag mi gnas/_/des ni rgyal ba'i byang chub rab tu rtogs/_/sangs rgyas nas ni 'gro ba rtogs pa mdzad/_/gang nas bla med byang chub mchi ba yi/_/shul der sems can lam gol zhugs pa bgyi/_/rgyal ba zhi gnas 'gro ba zhi bar mdzad/_/'byung ba'i ngo bo rnam par grol bar 
[\[262a.6\]]bsgom/_/sems can gang dag shin tu log gyur pa/_/ye shes ldan pas mi shes shes par mdzad/_/'das pa'i drang srong chen po gang byung ste/_/rgyal ba de dag gi yang shul mchog 'di/_/drang srong mchog kyang de yi shul nas gshegs/_/ma byon gang de rnams kyang gshegs par 'gyur/_/de bzhin chos 'di rab tu 
[\[262a.7\]]sus rtogs pa/_/de la gal te sangs rgyas bye stong gis/_/'di ni tshul ma yin zhes gsungs na yang /_/khyed ni rgyal ba ma yin de zhes smra/_/gzhan gyi blo phyir gang dag mi mchi ba/_/de yi sems ni de las yongs mi 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i tshul la bdag ni mngon sum gyur/_/mi yi rgyal po khyod ni mi gsung 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]bzhugs/_/bde bar gshegs pas chos gang rab bshad pa/_/de la bdag ni gang la'ang dogs ma mchis/_/bdag gi chos nyid 'di 'tshal 'phrog mi nus/_/gang gis bzod pa gsum po de 'tshal ba/_/de ni ji ltar rgyal ba'i spyod bzhin te/_/mchi ba dang ni slar mchi nyal ba dang /_/smra zhing 'chag pa dag kyang 
[\[262b.2\]]ston pa bzhin/_/de yi spyod lam rnams kyang de dang 'dra/_/lung ston pa yang rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros la ni de yang gnas/_/'gro ba thams cad kyis ni bskyod mi nus/_/zla ba skar bcas sa la lhung yang gda'/_/de la rnam par 'gyur ba yong mi 'byung /_/nam mkhar 'bras chags lhun po rdib kyang 
[\[262b.3\]]gda'/_/de yi chos nyid gzhan du yod mi 'gyur/_/skyes bu des ni bzod pa 'di rnyed nas/_/sems can rig par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/gang gis sangs rgyas rang 'byung 'gyur ba yi/_/de 'dra ba yi chos nyid des rtogs so/_/rgyal las mngon sum bdag gis 'di thos te/_/bzod pa 'di rnyed nas ni 
[\[262b.4\]]phyir mi ldog_/sangs rgyas gyur nas rnam par rtogs bgyid 'gyur/_/'gro ba rnams la'ang chos 'di go bar mdzad/_/ji ltar bdag gi chos nyid mthong ba'i rnams/_/de ni gzhan la rab tu bshad par bgyi/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi blo gros bstan bgyi ste/_/sems can mi rtogs rnams kyang rtogs par bgyi/_/rgyal ba 
[\[262b.5\]]rnams kyis ji ltar chos gzigs pa/_/de 'dra'i chos nyid rnams ni rab tu bstan/_/gang la gnas pas rang 'byung 'gyur ba yi/_/de ring bla med bzod pa bdag gis thob/_/rang byung thub dbang de la skyabs su mchi/_/'jig rten sman slad spyod pa bdag gis spyad/_/rang byung rgyal ba'i zhing rnams yongs su 
[\[262b.6\]]spyad/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal dub pa rab tu dgrol/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i rjes su slob bgyid cing /_/sems can 'gro ba thob par rnam par grol/_/sangs rgyas tshul la bdag gis tshul yang 'tshal/_/sems can spyod pa 'di 'dra bdag gis spyad/_/zhi ba'i blo gros chos nyid 'di rig nas/_/zhing 
[\[262b.7\]]brgya dag tu sprul pa sprul pa bgyis/_/sems can kun gyi tshul la rab zhugs nas/_/so sor 'thun par sprul pa shin tu sprul/_/des ni bsam mi khyab pa'i zhing rnams sbyangs/_/sems can bsam mi khyab la gdams ngag stsal/_/chos tshul shin tu bzang ba 'dzin 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]du stsal/_ston pa'i blo gros la ni thams cad btsud/_/de nas dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros des cher rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob nas brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams sprul pas kun du gang bar byas so/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhi ba'i 
[\[263a.2\]]blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du yid gnyis dang the tshom za na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam 
[\[263a.3\]]dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsam mo/_/ji ltar na bdag gi sems spyod yul ma yin pa la mi spyod cing /_ji ltar na bdag gi sems chos nyid kyis lam gol ba la gnas par 
[\[263a.4\]]mi 'gyur snyam du de gal te sems mi g.yeng bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom zhing brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med grangs 
[\[263a.5\]]med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa rtag gi 'od ces bya ba byung ste/_bskal pa rtag gi 'od de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[263a.6\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[263a.7\]]sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal po de'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa des brtson 'grus rtsom pa bdag dang 'dra ba ma mthong ste/_de'i 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]tshe na bcom ldan 'das de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs par spyod pa ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa de mchog tu brjod do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal po 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor 
[\[263b.2\]]cing mdun gyis bltas pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa stan las langs te/_gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba 
[\[263b.3\]]lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[263b.4\]]gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de 
[\[263b.5\]]dang de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus brtsams pa brtson 'grus 
[\[263b.6\]]brtsams pa zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[263b.7\]]stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la de lta bu'i don 'dri ba ni rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pas bcom ldan 'das de'i ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[264a.2\]]de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi 'dor bar gyur te/_skad cig kyang mi 'dug cing /_'di ltar chos thams cad la rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir blo gros gzhan du mi 'gyur te yid gzhan 
[\[264a.3\]]du mi 'jug na/_de tsam gyis rigs kyi bu byang chub kun bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[264a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi brtson 'grus rjes su dran te/_de ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na lus dang sems gnyis yang dag par rab tu bzung nas sbyin pa sbyin pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sbyin pa sbyin no/_/de ltar sbyin pa na de bzhin du 
[\[264a.5\]]rab tu rtogs na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar na lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de ni sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa po dang /_len pa dang /_len pa po mi dmigs pa ste/_de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[264a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdag gis yongs su sbyang ngo snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par bzung ba yin te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yongs su dag par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar bdag gis brjod du med 
[\[264a.7\]]pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar bdag 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rnams yongs su gzung ngo snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di 
[\[264b.2\]]ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su gzung bar bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar thabs 
[\[264b.3\]]mkhas pa la bslab par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar dus shes pa la bslab po snyam pa ni lus dang 
[\[264b.4\]]sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar tshod shes pa dang /_don shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_bdag shes pa dang /_pha rol shes pa dang /_gang zag mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa shes pa la bslab par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par 
[\[264b.5\]]rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/de ltar yongs su spang ba'i rigs pa ni yongs su spang bar bya/_'di ltar bsnyen pa'i rigs pa ni bsnyen par bya'o snyam pa ni lus dang sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin no/_/'di ltar lus brtag par mkhas pa la bslab po snyam pa ni de lus dang sems 
[\[264b.6\]]yang dag par rab tu bzung ba yin te/_de la lus yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus zhes bya'o/_/gang mi g.yo ba dang mi lhod par 'jug pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_rgyun chags pa dang /_rjes su 'dzin pa de ni brtson 
[\[264b.7\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/gang brtson 'grus 'di dang /_gang rtsom pa 'di la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa des brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas chos thams cad la 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur to/_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di la yang gnas par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na sems can rnams dad pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sprul pa rnam pa du ma mngon par sprul te/_
[\[265a.2\]]thabs mkhas pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas sems can dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 
[\[265a.3\]]brtsams pa des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal po de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/stobs bcu ldan pa khyod ni brtson 'grus kyis/_/mtshungs 'dra'i sems can 
[\[265a.4\]]gang yang mi rnyed de/_/thub pa dam pa khyod ni brtson 'grus kyis/_/chos nyid mchog la yang dag reg par gyur/_/stobs bcu ldan pa khyod ni brtson 'grus kyis/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag yas yongs su dag_/sems can rnams ni yongs su smin par mdzad/_/shes rab 
[\[265a.5\]]tshad ni dpe zla ma mchis lags/_/stobs bcu ldan pa mi yi seng ge khyod/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni sems can 'du shes bshig_/khyod kyis stong pa nyid ni rab tu mkhyen/_/sems can 'du shes de yang khyod kyis spangs/_/khyod kyis stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs par/_/brtson 
[\[265a.6\]]'grus kyis ni chos kun rab tu mkhyen/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis pha rol phyin pas na/_/zhi ba'i sa rnams la yang rab tu bzhugs/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi sras rnams rjes slob pas/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub rab tu mchis/_/stobs bcu ldan pa khyod kyi brtson 'grus kyis/_/
[\[265a.7\]]yang dag che ba'i bdag nyid rab tu bstan/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis pha rol phyin pa la/_/bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi sras rnams slob/_/sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dag gis/_/sems can rnams ni yongs su smin par bgyid/_/'gro ba rnams ni rab tu dgrol slad du/_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]khyod kyi sras rnams byang chub gang zhugs pa/_/de dag bcom ldan khyod kyi go 'phang 'dir/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras rnams rjes su mchi/_/'gro ba rnams ni yongs smin bgyi slad du/_/khyod kyi sras rnams go bgos spyod pa ni/_/khyod kyi rjes su thams cad rab slob 
[\[265b.2\]]cing /_/sems can mang po byang chub la yang 'god/_/mi yi dbang po seng ge khyod kyi sras/_/khrag khrig brtson 'grus dag la gnas nas su/_/de dag 'gro ba yongs su dgrol slad du/_/rgyal ba'i zhing ni khrag khrig rnams su mchi/_/rgyal ba'i zhal ni dri med zla ba 
[\[265b.3\]]ltar/_/shin tu zil gyis mi gnon mtha' yas 'od/_/thub pa khyod sras mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/_/spyad pas dag par gyur pa'i spyad pa spyod/_/khyod kyi sras po mi blo rnam dag rnams/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su dag bgyid cing /_/mi mchog dbang pos 
[\[265b.4\]]sems can khrag khrig rnams/_/bdag ma mchis par rab tu 'tshal bar bgyis/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni brtson 'grus mtshungs ma mchis/_/ting 'dzin mi g.yo brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis pha rol phyin nas su/_/lha dang mi rnams brtson 'grus 
[\[265b.5\]]skyed du bcug_/lha mi dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag_/brtson 'grus kyis ni shin tu zil gyis gnon/_/byang chub 'tshal bas brtson 'grus rab tu brtan/_/srid pa dag las skye bo sgrol bar 'tshal/_/gang gis 'dus byas mtshan ma rnams bshig cing /_/de dag 
[\[265b.6\]]gis ni byang chub thob ma mchis/_/brtson 'grus dag kyang nam du'ang mi nyams pa/_/de dag la ni rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang rnams bsam pa rtag tu byang chub phyir/_/gang de rgyal ba'i rigs rnams 'dzin pa dag_/bde gshegs go 'phang gzhol zhing brtan pa rnams/_/
[\[265b.7\]]de dag la yang rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye bo dag gi don dang sman slad du/_/gang dag rab tu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang ni/_/rga shi ma mchis pa la dad pa rnams/_/de dag la yang rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/nad dang rga shi dag las 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]rab thar ba/_/dri ma gsum bcom khyod kyi skyabs mchis pas/_/dge ba de yis bde bar gshegs gyur te/_/mi rga mi 'chi byang chub reg par shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[266a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zla 'od gzi brjid rgyal po de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas de brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dang ldan par gyur to/_/de bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur 
[\[266a.3\]]to/_/'di ltar yang 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub 
[\[266a.4\]]sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod 
[\[266a.5\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa sgrib pa 
[\[266a.6\]]med pa'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa ni sems can gyi bsam pa rig par bya ba'i phyir sems gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su grub nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/des ting nge 'dzin de thob nas sems can 
[\[266a.7\]]phung po gsum du 'byed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po dang /_log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po dang /_ma nges pa'i phung po'o/_/de sems can gang dag log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pa la 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]slob cing sems can gang dag log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa de dag ci nas drang ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pa la slob ste/_de thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pas log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams rab tu drang ba'i phyir bskal pa brjod du med par 'khor ba na 'dug 
[\[266b.2\]]go/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na bdud rtsi'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_bdud rtsi'i snying po'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[266b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal po zhes 
[\[266b.4\]]bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin zhes bya ba sangs rgyas khrag khrig tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[266b.5\]]tshad med pa dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[266b.6\]]nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ji tsam gyis byang chub sems 
[\[266b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal pos bram ze'i 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dbang pos byin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba thob pa de na 
[\[267a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rjes su 
[\[267a.3\]]song ba de dang ldan pas smon lam gang dang gang btab pa de dang des nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des yid bzhin du rab tu rnyed cing sgrub bo/_/de 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi smon lam yongs 
[\[267a.4\]]su rdzogs par byed/_de 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa'i bar gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam kun rdzogs par byed pas 
[\[267a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/dbang pos byin shar gyi phyogs cha na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[267a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba'i zla ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/dbang pos byin de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam gang btab pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/_des smon 
[\[267a.7\]]lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin par shog shig ces byas nas de'i smon lam de yongs su rdzogs te/_da ltar de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad gzung sla ba ma yin no/_/gzhan yang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]pa tshad gzung sla bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rin po che 'di snyed yod do zhes rin po che'i mtha' bde bar rtogs sla bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshad gzung sla bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[267b.2\]]zhing na rin po che mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa 'di nyid do zhes tshad gzung nus par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'di snyed kyi gzugs dang /_sgra dang dri dang /_ro dang reg bya'i longs spyod dang ldan no zhes tshad gzung nus par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[267b.3\]]de na dge bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams tshad gzung nus par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams kyi dge ba la mos pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa tshad gzung nus par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams kyi 
[\[267b.4\]]dge ba kun du spyod pa dang ldan pa tshad gzung sla bar ma gyur cig ces byas nas/_de smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs te/_de ltar de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams kyi tshad gzung sla ba ma yin/_rin po che'i mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin/_byang 
[\[267b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad gzung sla ba ma yin/_rin po che mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa rnams kyi tshad gzung sla ba ma yin/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i longs spyod dang ldan pa'i tshad gzung sla ba ma yin/_sems can rnams kyi dge 
[\[267b.6\]]bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i tshad gzung sla ba ma yin no/_/de ltar de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams kyi dge ba la mos pa dang ldan pa'i tshad gzung sla ba ma yin no/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam 'di dag dang /_
[\[267b.7\]]gzhan yang tshad med pa dag btab par gyur te/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam pa'i rjes su song ba la brten nas yongs su rdzogs so/_/dbang pos byin de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]bsam pa'i rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu rnyed par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin des de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyal po des smon lam de dag bsgrags ma thag tu 
[\[268a.2\]]des smon lam de dag thams cad btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin 
[\[268a.3\]]zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dbang pos byin zhes bya bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[268a.4\]]don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan de snyed dang ldan no/_/de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar smon pa'i smon lam de dag la bslab par bya'o/_/ji ltar smon pa'i smon lam la slob na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs 
[\[268a.5\]]mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can khrag khrig dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed do/_/de'i tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par 'dzin te/_sems can khrag khrig dpag tu med pa yang tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa 'dzin du 'jug go/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa 
[\[268a.6\]]dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na dge ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_dge ba 'byung ba'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[268a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spos mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan dan gyi snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan dan gyi snying po de de 
[\[268b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan 
[\[268b.3\]]dan gyi snying po des de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa lags/_
[\[268b.4\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog rgyal pos bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan dan gyi snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tsan dan gyi snying po nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad 
[\[268b.5\]]kyi bsam pa la zhugs te/_bsam pa la zhugs nas so so ci rigs par chos ston pa de tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la 'thun
