[\[268b.6\]]par chos ston par byed do/_/de thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brjod du med par yang brtson pa mi 'dor ro/_/de thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[268b.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa na nam yang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yang yongs su sbyong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan dan gyi snying po de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog rgyal po des 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]thabs la mkhas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan ma thag tu ji ltar bstan pa bzhin rab tu bsgrubs so/_/ji ltar bstan pa bzhin rab tu bsgrubs pas na sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug pa shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de thabs la 
[\[269a.2\]]mkhas pa de dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brjod du med par yang brtson pa ma bor ro/_/des thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bskal pa brjod du med par nam 
[\[269a.3\]]yang thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i sems ma skyes so/_/sems bskyed pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brjod du med pa rnams yongs su sbyangs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sems can dkrigs phrag khrag khrig brjod du med pa 
[\[269a.4\]]yongs su smin par byas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sems can khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams zab mo'i chos kyi bzod pa la rab tu bkod do/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan dan gyi snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 
[\[269a.5\]]'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu tsan dan gyi snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[269a.6\]]chen pos sems kyi mtshan ma la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa la brtson par bya'o//_//bam po drug pa/_'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med 
[\[269a.7\]]pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab bla ma zhes bya ba byung ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[269b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab bla mas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas de la zhus nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yul rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de yul rgyu zhing song nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa yongs su sbyangs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[269b.3\]]re rer yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa rnams bla na med pa'i chos la nges par sems pa'i brjod par yongs su smin par byas nas des smon lam 'di skad btab bo/_/bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du skyes pa der sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung ba snyam du 
[\[269b.4\]]shes par shog shig_/bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du skyes par sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang /_mi khom pa thams cad chad par shog shig ces des smon lam btab pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[269b.5\]]par gyur te/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du skyes pa der sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung bar shes shing sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[269b.6\]]'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang /_mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad par gyur to/_/chad par gyur nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar ma byung ngo /_/des yang smon lam 'di skad du btab ste/_gang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sa'i phyogs su 
[\[269b.7\]]rkang pa'i mthil gyis reg par gyur pa de dag bskal pa brjes kyi bar du mchod rten du gyur par shog shig_/sems can gang gis mchod rten de'i gnas mthong yang rung /_thos kyang rung /_der song yang rung /_de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig_/mchod rten gyi gnas de ji srid du 'dug pa de'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur bar shog shig_/mchod rten gyi gnas ji srid du 'dug pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams 
[\[270a.2\]]dam pa'i chos nyan pa rgyun mi 'chad par shog shig_/sems can gang gis bdag gi ming thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces byas nas de'i smon lam de yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/_de spyod pa la zhugs pas 
[\[270a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'dra bar kun 'dzin cing yongs su sbyangs so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi smon lam ji lta bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang des bzung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi tshe'i tshad ji srid pa de dag thams cad kyang des yongs su bzung ngo /_/sangs 
[\[270a.4\]]rgyas bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi nyan thos 'dus pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa'ang des yongs su bzung ngo /_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang des yongs su bsdus so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 
[\[270a.5\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang des yongs su bzung ngo /_/des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa yongs su sbyangs nas/_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas de ga la ba der 
[\[270a.6\]]song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla mas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang 
[\[270a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi sras rnams yab las skyes pa de dag spun lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nu bo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag skye bo mang po la sman par 'jug pa de lta bu'i chos bshad du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas des byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shes rab bla ma khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang sangs 
[\[270b.2\]]rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa legs so/_/legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla mas ji lta bur las byas pa la ltos/_dge 
[\[270b.3\]]slong byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla mas sems can ji snyed smin par byas pa ni rtsis mkhan nam rtsis mkhan gyi slob mas bskal par yang rung /_bskal pa brgyar yang rung /_bskal pa khrag khrig tu yang rung ste/_de dag gis rtsi bar mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de na byang 
[\[270b.4\]]chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma des sems can tshad med pa nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so/_/de'i nyis 'gyur gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/byang 
[\[270b.5\]]chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas tshad med pa'i sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzlas te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[270b.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab bla ma des sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so/_/sems can shin tu mang po byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan 
[\[270b.7\]]zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas pas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 
[\[271a.2\]]thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/thabs mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la chos thams cad la dbang dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya'o/_/chos thams cad la dbang dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_de dag kun du spyad pa spyod pa ni 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na mtsho chus gang nas 'gags pa med cing chu 'bab pa ni 
[\[271a.4\]]sa gang logs su gzhol ba der 'bab bo/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad la dbang dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ga las gar bltas pa de dang der sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis rlan par byed de/_de ltar na byang chub 
[\[271a.5\]]sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dmigs pa yin no/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan chos rnams gnyis ma mchis/_/chos rnams bye brag mchis ma lags/_/
[\[271a.6\]]de ni chos kyi mtshan nyid de/_/chos kun mtshan nyid ma mchis lags/_/nam mkha' ji ltar nam mkha' yis/_/dper bgyir rung ba ma lags te/_/chos kyi dper yang de bzhin du/_/rnam pa thams cad bgyir mi rung /_/chos la chos kyis mthong ma mchis/_/chos 
[\[271a.7\]]kyis chos rnams mi rig ste/_/shes pa po dang chos rnams kyang /_/gnyis ka 'di ni yong ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas su/_/mi mkhas gang dag rnam par rig_/de dag sangs rgyas de bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rig lags/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]chos dang sangs rgyas zhes/_/de ni byis pa'i spyod yul te/_/sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas ni/_/sus kyang rtogs par rngo mi thogs/_/ji ltar tshig gis brjod pa ltar/_/chos 'di dag la gdags ma mchis/_/chos de gdags pa ma lags te/_/bdag dang 'dra bar 
[\[271b.2\]]rtogs par bgyi/_/bdag ni gdags su ma mchis te/_/'on kyang bdag ces smra ba bzhin/_/chos rnams la ni btags pa yang /_/bdag dang 'dra bar rtogs par bgyi/_/bdag ni btags par ma mchis te/_/'on kyang bdag ces smra ba bzhin/_/chos rnams btags pa 
[\[271b.3\]]ma mchis par/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu rtogs/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i ri mo ni/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin chos rnams gdags pa yang /_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags/_/rdzas ma lags pa'i 'dogs pa yis/_/mi gang 
[\[271b.4\]]'di la 'dogs pa ni/_/mdzangs pa rnams kyis mi bsngags te/_/de ni mkhas pas dpya ba lags/_/'dogs pa de bzhin chos rnams la/_/mi gang 'di la 'dogs pa ni/_/mdzangs pa rnams kyis mi bsngags te/_/mkhas pas de ni dpya ba lags/_/'gro ba 
[\[271b.5\]]ma mchis 'gro ba'i sgras/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa ni/_/nam mkha'i ri mo bris pa ltar/_/de bzhin chos rnams rtogs par bgyi/_/bar snang bya rjes ji bzhin du/_/'gro de nges par ma mchis lags/_/sbal pa'i spu yi la ba ltar/_/de bzhin zhi ba'i 
[\[271b.6\]]chos nyid blta/_/bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan me long la/_/rang bzhin ston par mkhas pas bshad/_/dkyil 'khor de na bzhin gzugs ltar/_/de bzhin chos rnams thams cad blta/_/ji ltar mi dag ri yi bar mchis te/_/skad phyung nas ni brag phug [(]dgra [,]sgra [)]yang grag_/
[\[271b.7\]]brag ca de la byed pa ma mchis ltar/_/de bzhin chos la byed pa su ma mchis/_/chos 'di dag ni rgyal bas de ltar bstan/_/mchis pa ma lags 'di la byed ma mchis/_/rang byung 'di dag rtogs nas rab bstan te/_/de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu ngo mtshar 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]mdzad/_/rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos rnams gang rtogs pa/_/mi yi 'dren pa de dag ngo mtshar te/_/mig dang ldan pas bstan nas long ba gang /_/gzugs rnams mthong ba bzhin du ngo mtshar lags/_/long ba gzhan gyis bstan pa'i gzugs rnams la/_/
[\[272a.2\]]mthong bar gyur na de ni ngo mtshar te/_/de bzhin 'dren pa khyod kyi gsung thos nas/_/gang dag dad par gyur pa ngo mtshar lags/_/chos rnams bstan pa dag kyang de bzhin du/_/thar par 'tshal bas rab tu rtogs par bgyi/_/gang dag chos rnams rig par mi 'gyur ba/_/de 
[\[272a.3\]]dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo gang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma 
[\[272a.4\]]mchis par ston pa dang /_chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis par smra ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ldem po ngag ma 'tshal lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos rnams ni thog ma nas dmigs su ma mchis na ngo bo nyid ma mchis par bstan du ga la mchis/_bcom 
[\[272a.5\]]ldan 'das chos gang dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni gang yang bgrang bar ma bgyis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs 
[\[272a.6\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa la bgrang bar bgyis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nam 
[\[272a.7\]]mkha' la gnyis su mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gzugs la yang gnyis su mi dmigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang gnyis su ma mchis te/_gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs gang lags pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang lags pa dang /_gnyis su ma mchis pa gang lags pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa gang lags 
[\[272b.2\]]pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang lags pa dang /_gnyis su ma mchis pa dang /_gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa gang lags pa dang /_bcom 
[\[272b.3\]]ldan 'das 'dus byas gang lags pa dang /_'dus ma byas gang lags pa de dag ni gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lags so/_/'di ni 'dus byas so/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas so zhes bgyi ba de yang bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis pa la bgrang bar bgyi lags 
[\[272b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis su med par spyod pa zhes bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[272b.5\]]byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams dang /_gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams dang /_mya ngan 
[\[272b.6\]]las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ldan pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshig bla 
[\[272b.7\]]dgas lags so/_/nyan thos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de yang gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/'khor ba gang lags pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags pa de dag kyang gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273a.2\]]de ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di la nem nur ma mchis shing the tshom mi 'tshal ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/gang dag 
[\[273a.3\]]rgyal ba'i mi gnyis tshul rtogs pa/_/de dag the tshom ma mchis bde bar gshegs/_/de dag rga shi ma mchis gnas mthong ste/_/de dag rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pa mchod/_/mi gnyis bye brag ma mchis chos nyid du/_/bde bar gshegs pas chos kun bstan pa mdzad/_/gzhan 
[\[273a.4\]]ma lags pa'i tshig 'di thos nas su/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi the tshom ma mchis gyur/_/gang dag skyon bral zhi bar rab zhugs pa/_/mtshungs pa med par byang chub rab tu bstan/_/de ni ston pa'i yul la rab zhugs te/_/de dag ston pa'i bka' la rab tu gnas/_/gang dag 
[\[273a.5\]]'di ni gzugs zhes bya zhes brjod/_/tshor ba dang ni 'du shes sems pa dag_/de ni 'dus byas rnam shes de skad ston/_/de dag ston pa'i bka' la gnas ma lags/_/gang dag dge ba rab tu bzang zhe'am/_/dge ba ma yin chos rnams ngan zhes mchi/_/de dag 
[\[273a.6\]]ston pa'i bka' la mi gnas te/_/de dag gnyis la spyod pa'i mi zhes bstan/_/khams gsum pa zhes gang dag brjod pa'i mi/_/de dag thub pa'i bstan pa brtson ma bgyis/_/dam pa'i don du khams gcig ma mchis na/_/de la gsum du mchis par ga la 'gyur/_/
[\[273a.7\]]gang dag de bzhin 'di dag 'dus byas te/_/cig shos 'dus ma byas zhes rnam gnyis smra/_/de dag bde gshegs bstan pa'i chos rnams la/_/nan tan bgyid pa spro ba'i mi ma lags/_/'di ni mi gnyis chos zhes gang smra ba/_/de dag ston pa'i bka' la 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]mi gnas te/_/bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa/_/de la gnyis dang mi gnyis chos ma mchis/_/gang dag bde gshegs bstan ces smra bgyid pa/_/ston dang de dag dmigs su ma mchis te/_/gang gis bstan pa de yang ston ma mchis/_/gang la bshad pa de yang 
[\[273b.2\]]mchis ma lags/_/gang bstan de yang dmigs su ma mchis lags/_/gang la rig bgyi de yang skye ma mchis/_/kun du thams cad ci yang dmigs ma mchis/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams de ltar rtogs par bgyid/_/chos gang bde bar gshegs pa ston pa yang /_/de la chos de 
[\[273b.3\]]dmigs par mi 'gyur te/_/stong pa stong nyid ci yang yong mi dmigs/_/mtshan med mtshan ma med nyid kyang de bzhin/_/gang du smon pa med par bshad pa yang /_/de la smon pa med pa mi dmigs lags/_/de bzhin grol dang grol bar bgyid mi dmigs/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[273b.4\]]pas de 'dra'i chos bstan te/_/bde bar gshegs pas de 'dra'i chos bstan pa/_/gang dag de ma rtogs nas gzhan rtogs pa/_/de dag skye bo rtag tu bcings nas su/_/srin bu ba rgya bgyid bzhin gnon pa bgyid/_/gang zag dam pa ston pa thugs rje can/_/'jig rten mgon po srog 
[\[273b.5\]]chags phan bzhed pas/_/sngon chad dka' ba spyad pa brgya spyad de/_/thugs rje rab tu bskyed nas kun du byung /_/gang gis 'gro ba rtog ldan mgu bgyid pa/_/lam mchog de ni de yis rab tu bstan/_/dga' sems bde gshegs 'thun pa'i brtul zhugs can/_/de dag bde 
[\[273b.6\]]gshegs bstan pa'i 'gro bas mchis/_/'ong dang 'gro bar sgra yis bshad pa yang /_/de la 'ong ba dmigs su yod ma mchis/_/bdag gis bstan pa de yang mi dmigs la/_/bde bar gshegs pas chos nyid rab tu bstan/_/zhi dang zhi ba gang na'ang yong ma mchis/_/
[\[273b.7\]]rab tu ma zhi de yang mchis ma lags/_/zhi ba'i ston pa'ang de bzhin ma mchis lags/_/zhi ba gang lags de yang yong mi dmigs/_/kun nas nyon mongs gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/kun nas nyon mongs gyur pa'ang mchis ma lags/_/shes ldan gang lags de yang ma mchis 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]te/_/gang gis bstan pa de yang mchis ma lags/_/de bzhin chos rgyal ba yis shin tu bstan/_/ston pa dang ni brjod pa'ang ma mchis te/_/ming du bstan pa'ang de bzhin mchis ma lags/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i chos nyid rtogs par bgyid/_/
[\[274a.2\]]ston dang bstan pa tshor dang tshor bgyid dang /_/'dren dang 'dren pa zhi dang zhi bgyid pa/_/nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes 'dra bar/_/thub pas yang dag chos nyid rab tu bstan/_/de bzhin chos nyid la yang gang rtogs pa/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong 
[\[274a.3\]]zhing /_/de yis mi yi gtso bor bkur sti bgyis/_/sangs rgyas sa la mkhas shing rnam par rtogs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal chos bshad pa 'di rnams sus shes par 'gyur/_
[\[274a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma skyes ma 'gags pas chos bshad pa 'di rnams 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gal te ma skyes ma 'gags pas shes par 'gyur na ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[274a.5\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos bshad par 'gyur/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag kyang gzhan la/_byang chub kyang gzhan na ni bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de skad du bshad 
[\[274a.6\]]na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_gal te skrag pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mchis na ni de la skrag par yang 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la skrag pa ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal skrag ces bya ba de 
[\[274a.7\]]chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skrag ces bgyi ba de ni phyin ci log gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal phyin ci log ces bya ba de ni chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'das phyin ci log ces bgyi ba de ni yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' ni skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/_yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' ni skrag 
[\[274b.2\]]par mi 'gyur te/_mi skrag pa zhes bshad pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes brjod lags mod kyi/_don dam par na yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mi dmigs te/_de bzhin du bcom ldan 
[\[274b.3\]]'das skrag pa yang mi dmigs/_mi skrag pa yang mi dmigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis te/_brjod du ma mchis pa yang mi dmigs lags so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[274b.4\]]gsol to/_/chos rnams thams cad mi skrag ste/_/mi skrag pa yang ma mchis lags/_/chos rnams brjod pa tsam du bas/_/yang dag mtshan nyid de ma lags/_/ma skyes pa yi bu la yang /_/bu zhes gdags par 'gyur mod kyi/_/de na bu ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/
[\[274b.5\]]kun rdzob chos rnams de 'dra lags/_/ji ltar mo sham bu rnams ni/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa/_/de bzhin kun rdzob chos rnams kyang /_/rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs lags/_/kun rdzob rnams kyang kun rdzob tu/_/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_/ji 
[\[274b.6\]]ltar bar snang nam mkha' la/_/ri mo bris pa ma mchis bzhin/_/kun rdzob la yang kun rdzob ces/_/mi gang rjes su 'brang ba ni/_/de la phyin ci log ces kyang /_/mig ldan rnam par mthong ba smra/_/kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/_/de dag gnyi ga mi rtogs te/_/gang 
[\[274b.7\]]gis de dag mi rtogs pa/_/de ni chos nyid mi rtogs so/_/gang dag chos nyid mi rtogs pa/_/de dag so so'i skye bor gsungs/_/de dag 'jig rten mgon kun kyis/_/mu stegs gzhan zhes rab tu gsungs/_/gang gis chos nyid rig pa ni/_/de dag sangs rgyas bstan la 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]skyes/_/bdud stong bye ba rnams kyis kyang /_/de la bskyod par rngo mi thogs/_/gang dag bla med sangs rgyas sa/_/zhi ba de ni rnam rtogs pa/_/mkhas pa de dag skrag pa dang /_/mi skrag par ni rmongs mi 'gyur/_/gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba las/_/zhi ba'i sa 
[\[275a.2\]]la spyad bgyis pa/_/mkhas pa de dag skrag pa dang /_/mi skrag par yang rtogs mi bgyid/_/gnyis su ma mchis sa thob nas/_/mkhas pa gang dag mi zhen pa/_/de ni mi dbang sras lags te/_/chos kyi sprul pa thugs kyi sras/_/rtogs shing mngon bgyis mthong ba dang /_/
[\[275a.3\]]chos mchog gang gis rnyed de dag_/gum na'ang mya ngan mi bgyid la/_/dga' bar 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis lags/_/'gum pa la yang dga' mi bgyid/_/'tsho ba'ang yongs su tshol mi bgyid/_/btang snyoms smra ba dpa' bo dag_/dge ba'i chos ni mang po bgyid/_/byang 
[\[275a.4\]]chub ched du lam sbyong zhing /_/sangs rgyas rigs 'dzin 'di dag ni/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa/_/yab kyi rjes su rab tu slob/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing 'jigs ma mchis/_/sems can kun la sman slad du/_/thams cad mkhyen pa yongs tshol te/_/zhi ba mya ngan 
[\[275a.5\]]'da' bar zhugs/_/'jig rten shin tu bsregs pa la/_/de dag mya ngan 'da' ston te/_/bdag nyid la ni mi lta zhing /_/bde dang sdug bsngal mi gnas lags/_/ji ltar mgo la me 'bar ba/_/zhi bar bgyid pa tshol ba bzhin/_/sems can kun gyi don slad du/_/de dag 
[\[275a.6\]]de bzhin chos rnams tshol/_/'gro la dga' bas nyin mtshan du/_/de gang rang byung shin tu tshol/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du yang /_/nams kyang brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro/_/bu dang chung ma nor dang 'bru/_/mgo dang de bzhin rgyal po'i srid/_/zhum pa ma mchis 
[\[275a.7\]]kun btang zhing /_/de dag gtong ba rab tu bsgoms/_/srog chags kun gyi don slad du/_/de dag byang chub mchog reg 'gyur/_/blo mchog ldan pa de dag ni/_/mthong zhing thos pa rnyed par dka'/_/de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya rten pa ma mchis shing nam mkha'i khams la mi chags par gang dang gang du 'tshal ba de dang der mchi ba de 
[\[275b.2\]]bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang chos kyi dbyings la gnas te mi chags par chos 'chad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di chos kyi dbyings la zhugs nas ji srid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[275b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa gang dag gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[275b.4\]]'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btsud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[275b.5\]]sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 
[\[275b.6\]]byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[275b.7\]]pa ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spyod yul zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mdzod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgrog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[276a.2\]]pa seng ge rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge blo gros zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/
[\[276a.3\]]de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs 'chang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[276a.4\]]dpal brtsegs rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi shugs 
[\[276a.5\]]rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar spyod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od zer tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/
[\[276a.6\]]de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo gros zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'dul ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa pad 
[\[276a.7\]]ma'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zhal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dogs pa thams cad legs par 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[276b.2\]]pa snang byed ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'chang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha 
[\[276b.3\]]de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog 
[\[276b.4\]]pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang 
[\[276b.5\]]ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros spos zhes bya ba 
[\[276b.6\]]'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas snang ba'i spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang 
[\[276b.7\]]ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ri rgyal ba rgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas skyabs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas drug khri 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[277a.2\]]de dag gi thog ma ni 'od ces bya/_tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dag gi thog mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig 
[\[277a.3\]]rten du byung ngo /_/de dag gi tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/_de dag gi thog mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa bde spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/
[\[277a.4\]]tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed pas rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na grags sbyin 
[\[277a.5\]]zhes bya ba dang /_dpa' mkhas zhes bya ba dang /_tshangs pa'i mig ces bya ba dang /_tsan dan zhes bya ba dang /_rab mdzes zhes bya ba dang /_seng ge 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_kun nas mdzes zhes bya ba dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /_blo gros mi zhan zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[277a.6\]]des pa zhes bya ba dang /_'grogs na bde zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shing 'grogs na bde ba yon tan 'bum phrag mang po dang ldan pa bcu gcig tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/de'i tshe na yang bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin zhes bya ba 
[\[277a.7\]]mkhas shing yid rno ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig yod de/_de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin grogs po bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rin chen ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer chen po nas phyi rol du 'khyam pa'i phyir byung nas 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dong ste/_de dag dga' ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshal ga la ba der phyin to/_/de'i tshe dga' ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshal de ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu gcig 'jig rten rnams kyi don la sems phan par sems/_bde bar sems shing 'khod pa bram ze'i rigs shing sA la 
[\[277b.2\]]chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de dga' ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshal de na 'khyam pas dga' ba sna tshogs kyi tshal de na 'khod pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag des shing 'grogs na bde la mi rgod ma khengs mi g.yeng /_mu cor mi smra/_smra ba mi mnga' zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag la/_shes rab 
[\[277b.3\]]can/_shes rab dang ldan pa/_shin tu grims par gnas par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas des dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yun ring por shes rab yongs su bsgoms pa dang 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten pas skyes bu dam pa de dag la sems rab tu dang bar gyur to/_/de sems rab 
[\[277b.4\]]tu dang bas skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag ga la ba der bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu g.yog rnams dang lhan cig tu dong ngo /_/skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas bram 
[\[277b.5\]]ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu de'i 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /_lta ba dang /_smyang ba dang /_bskum pa'i spyod pa kun kyang tshangs par spyad pa yun ring du spyad pa'i spyod lam bzhin te/_skyes bu dam pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snod du 'gyur 
[\[277b.6\]]ro snyam du sems so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa sangs rgyas kyi sras kyi tshul du 'gro ba/_bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur 
[\[277b.7\]]pa 'ong gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di la skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis snying rje bskyed la gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pas ci nas rigs kyi bu 'di skye bo phal po che'i don byed cing snang ba ston pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir legs par dgongs shig_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag gi gan du song nas 'di dag ni ston pa'o/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa'o zhes skyes bu dam pa de dag la ston par 'du shes bskyed de/_des skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[278a.2\]]phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo /_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de la kye bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin khyod 'dug cig ces smras nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin skyes bu 
[\[278a.3\]]dam pa de dag la shin tu ri mo bskyed de 'dug pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na rigs kyi mna' ma gyos sgyug gi mdun na 'dug pa bzhin du dam pa de dag la ri mo skyes par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nad pa nad kyis btab nas yun ring mo las sman pa mthong na dbugs byung ba de bzhin du 
[\[278a.4\]]bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de yang rigs kyi bu de dag mthong ma thag tu dbugs byung bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na gsad pa la thug pa'i mi gsad du bkri ba las don bya bar 'dod phan par 'dod bde bar 'dod pa'i mi la la zhig byung ste/_des de gsad 
[\[278a.5\]]pa las thar bar byas nas de mi de la 'di ni bdag gi skyabs/_bdag la snying brtse ba can zhes de byas pa gzo ba cher skyes pa bzhin du/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin yang skyes bu dam pa de dag la bdag gi skyabs/_bdag la snying brtse ba can no zhes byas pa gzo ba 
[\[278a.6\]]skyes so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags byin gyis bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin la smras pa/_nyi mas byin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na u dum 
[\[278a.7\]]wA ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_gang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/_'jig rten thams cad dang 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]'gal ba/_zab pa mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_brtag tu med pa/_mu stegs can gzhan thams cad kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_nyan thos rnams kyis ma chud pa/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[278b.2\]]spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la khyod kyis gus pa bskyed par bya'o/_/bsti stang dang bcas/_ri mo dang bcas pa la ni shes rab yang dag par gnas shing byams pa bskyed/_ye shes rab tu 'byung /_rig pa bskyed/_mngon par shes 
[\[278b.3\]]pa mngon du 'gyur/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos ji ltar ston ce na/_nyi mas byin chos thams cad ni nam mkha' la bris pa bzhin du dngos po med pa ste/_chos de 
[\[278b.4\]]dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma byung mi 'byung ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs ni nam mkha' lta bu ste ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[278b.5\]]par shes pa yang nam mkha' lta bu ste ngo bo nyid kyis 'gags pa'o/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes pa ste/_de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma 
[\[278b.6\]]skyes pa'o/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/_de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang ma 'gags pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang ma 'gags pa'o/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta 
[\[278b.7\]]ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni mi 'ong mi 'gro ba de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang mi 'ong mi 'gro ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang mi 'ong mi 'gro ba'o/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la ni bris pa 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes ma byung ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes ma byung ngo /_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma 'phos ma skyes pa de bzhin du gzugs 
[\[279a.2\]]kyang ma 'phos ma skyes te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang ma 'phos ma skyes so/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma byung kun nas ma byung ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma byung kun nas ma byung ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[279a.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung kun nas ma byung ngo /_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma skyes shing med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma skyes shing med pa ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'ang 
[\[279a.4\]]ma skyes shing med pa'o/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni ma grub mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ma grub mngon par ma grub ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma grub mngon par ma grub bo/_/nyi 
[\[279a.5\]]mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang brjod du med cing brjod pa ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di 
[\[279a.6\]]lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang btags pa med cing gdags pa ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 
[\[279a.7\]]'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni tha snyad tsam ste/_nam mkha' la bris pa tha snyad tsam las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang tha snyad tsam ste/_gzugs tha snyad tsam las gzhan ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]yang tha snyad tsam ste/_tha snyad tsam las rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/_kun rdzob las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du nyi mas byin gzugs kyang 'di ltar 
[\[279b.2\]]kun rdzob tsam ste/_kun rdzob las gzugs gzhan ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar kun rdzob tsam ste/_kun rdzob las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la 
[\[279b.3\]]bris pa ni 'di ltar ming tsam ste/_ming tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang ming tsam ste/_ming tsam las gzhan ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar ming tsam ste/_ming tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du 
[\[279b.4\]]gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/_brjod pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/_brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no/_/
[\[279b.5\]]de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/_brjod pa tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris 
[\[279b.6\]]pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa tsam las tshor ba 
[\[279b.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/_'du shes tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/_'du shes tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bris pa ni brda tsam ste/_brda tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa 
[\[280a.2\]]gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brda tsam ste/_brda tsam las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no/_/nyi mas byin 'di lta ste/_dper na tshig gang gis nam mkha' la bris par brjod pa'i tshig ni 
[\[280a.3\]]don dam par mi dmigs pa de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs/_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar gyi de bzhin 
[\[280a.4\]]gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmigs so/_/nyi mas byin ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sdug cing phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyur te/_gang ye shes 
[\[280a.5\]]'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten du rtogs par mi blta'o/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi grangs su mi 'gro'o/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni gdags par bya ba ma yin no/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni byang chub mngon par 
[\[280a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba las bskyod pa ma yin no/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma yin no/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa 
[\[280a.7\]]de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can ma yin/_rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no/_/gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni zhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin/_ma zhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin no/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]skyes bu dam pa grags byin gyis bshad pa la legs so zhes shin tu bstod de rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas yang skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag gis bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po 
[\[280b.2\]]lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos zab mo 'di thos kyang ma skrag skrag par ma gyur/_shin tu skrag par ma gyur/_ma myos myos par ma gyur pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa ni 'di yin 
[\[280b.3\]]no/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zab mo gos pa med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo mthar phyin par gyur to//_//bam 
[\[280b.4\]]po bdun pa ste tha ma/_de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin dang /_skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' mchog ces bya ba de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280b.5\]]de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/zhi ba'i dbyings la rab zhugs tshul rnams la/_/mkhas pa 
[\[280b.6\]]'dren pa rnams ni legs so zhes/_/gang gis mi mchog shin tu 'thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni mi rnams dam pa bstan du gsol/_/'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su/_/byang chub mchog la mi rnams rab tu 'jug_/gang thos drang srong chen por 'gyur ba dag_/tshul 
[\[280b.7\]]de srog chags rnams la sman slad gsungs/_/bde gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas su/_/thub pas sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par bstod/_/rgyal bas de yid rab tu dga' bar mdzad/_/de dag thos nas shin tu gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba bdag 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]gis ji tsam 'tshal ba rnams/_/'dren pa bdag gis chos rnams bshad lags te/_/ston pas ji ltar chos rnams kun mkhyen pa/_/'dren pas legs par ma lus bstan du gsol/_/de la dga' mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa yis/_/rgyal 
[\[281a.2\]]sras spyod pa gang la spyad pas na/_/mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba yi/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus nges par bstan/_/thams cad chos zhes bya ba mtshan nyid gcig_/mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan nyid med pa ste/_/zhi ba nga med mi g.yo yon tan med/_/
[\[281a.3\]]spobs pa med cing zhi ba 'tsho ba med/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang bas stong /_/dngos po nyid med cung zad med pa ste/_/'di ni bstan pa ma yin ston pa med/_/bshad pa med cing 'chad par byed pa'ang med/_/tshor ba ma yin tshor ba po yang med/_/shes 
[\[281a.4\]]pa ma yin shes par byed pa'ang med/_/su la'ang ma yin gang gis kyang min te/_/'di dag ma byas byed du bcug pa'ang med/_/sus kyang blangs pa med cing btang ba'ang med/_/sus kyang bsgrags pa med la thos pa'ang med/_/sus kyang mi shes rnam par shes pa'ang med/_/
[\[281a.5\]]'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ba med/_/'di ni zhi ba ma yin rgod pa'ang min/_/zhi bar mi byed zhi bar byas pa'ang med/_/byed pa ma yin byed pa med pa'ang min/_/sems pa med cing tshor bar byed pa'ang med/_/'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas pa'ang min/_/'pho 
[\[281a.6\]]ba ma yin mi 'pho ba yang min/_/'ongs pa med cing 'gro ba yod pa min/_/'di ni kun du mi 'chi skye ba med/_/skye ba med cing bskyed pa'ang ma yin te/_/'di ni 'gags pa med la 'gags pa'ang min/_/'di ni brtan pa med cing bshig pa'ang med/_/de ltar rgyal 
[\[281a.7\]]ba'i chos rnams bshig pa'ang med/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams shes par gyis/_/'dren pa bde bar gshegs pa gang 'das pa/_/de dag gis kyang tshul 'di rab tu bstan/_/'dren pa sangs rgyas ma byon 'byung ba rnams/_/de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]'gyur/_/rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung ba/_/rgyal ba de dag kun kyang tshul 'di ston/_/chos nyid 'di dag rab tu shes pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/zhi ba'i sa yang rab tu shes 'gyur te/_/mkhas pas shes par dka' ba rab tu bstan/_/
[\[281b.2\]]rgyal ba'i thugs sras ji tsam shes pa dag_/'gro ba gtses pa 'di la mya ngan med/_/de la snying rje bla na med pa ste/_/'gro ba kun la byams par shin tu gnas/_/stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur pas na/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa dag la the tshom med/_/mtshan ma med 
[\[281b.3\]]par gnas par gyur pas na/_/de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yong med de/_/rlung rnams nam mkha' dag la mi thogs bzhin/_/dpa' bo de dag 'gro bar mi chags so/_/bskal pa mang por bye bar kun 'khor zhing /_/sems can bye ba mang po ston par byed/_/kun du kun 
[\[281b.4\]]nas nyon mongs mi 'gyur te/_/de ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya nus/_/gal te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye bstan te/_/de dag nyan thos kyis shes smra na yang /_/ngas ni chos nyid yang dag rab rtogs te/_/khyod ni 'dren pa min zhes de smra'o/_/dri ma med pa'i ye shes mig sbyangs 
[\[281b.5\]]te/_/bdag ni the tshom ma lus rnam par byang /_/stong par bdag ni gzhan dring gi mi 'jog_/khyod ni gang zag mchog min phar deng shig_/de ltar rgyal bas chos nyid bstan pas na/_/gang la 'dren pa'i sras rnams gnas pa la/_/bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis thub dka' ste/_/
[\[281b.6\]]ji ltar ri bo bskyod par mi nus bzhin/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/_
[\[281b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu'i thob pas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/_des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag dpag tu med pa rnams thabs mkhas pa rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa' yang 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]dag par sgrub pa mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/_yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa yang mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams lha 'bum gyis mchod cing yum 
[\[282a.2\]]gyi rum du 'gro ba yang mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams btsas nas gom pa bdun 'dor ba yang mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba yang mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 
[\[282a.3\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang mthong /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams la brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol pa yang mthong /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag 
[\[282a.4\]]tu med pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams spyod lam dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sems can rnams 'dul ba yang mthong /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 
[\[282a.5\]]phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang mthong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin bar snang la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la 
[\[282a.6\]]tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/_legs so legs so rkang gnyis kun gyi mchog_/'dren pa khyod kyis 'di dag chos bstan pa/_/bar snang gnas kyi bya yi rjes bzhin du/_/dngos bral mtshungs med ci yang ma lags pa/_/mtshan ma ma mchis nam 
[\[282a.7\]]mkhar bris pa bzhin/_/de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te/_/sprul pa dag gis ji ltar gzhan sprul bzhin/_/yang dag tu na rgyal bas bstan ma mchis/_/sos ka'i dus kyi smig rgyu ji bzhin du/_/snang yang yang dag par ni mchis ma lags/_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan te/_/ston pa gang lags de yang de dang 'dra/_/sngon chad the tshom nem nur gang byung ba/_/de yang 'dren pa'i drung du bral gyur te/_/bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang rig_/'gro ba sgrol mdzad rnam par 'dren 
[\[282b.2\]]par shog_/stobs bcu dag gis bsgrubs pa ci 'dra bar/_/rgyal ba'i zhing mchog bzang po sbyang bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtsor gyur te/_/skye bo ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par bgyi/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams/_/gnas dang skyabs dang 
[\[282b.3\]]rten kyang ma mchis pa'i/_/skyabs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thar bgyi ste/_/rga shi bral ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bgyi/_/bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi spyod yul ni/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul du yang bgyi/_/sems can bdud kyi yul nas bton nas su/_/drang srong chen po'i 
[\[282b.4\]]yul du drang bar bgyi/_/bde bar gshegs pas zhi ba'i chos bstan pa/_/gang gis thos nas gang la'ang mi reg pa/_/de dag mchog gi tshul la gnas par 'gyur/_/'dren pa srog chags rnams kyi ston par 'gyur/_/chos nyid 'di ltar mi gang rab rtogs shing /_/ston pa rgyal 
[\[282b.5\]]ba'i dbang po'i spyan snga nas/_/bstan bcos kun la mkhas shing 'jigs bral ba/_/de dag bla na med pa'i bde gshegs 'gyur/_/stong pa 'di nyid gang gis rab rtogs shing /_/stong par dmigs pa'i 'du shes bral gyur na/_/de dag ma smas bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/_/
[\[282b.6\]]srog chags bye ba mang po 'grol bar bgyid/_/mkhas pa btsog pa la ni mi dga' ste/_/zas kyi ro rnams la yang chags ma mchis/_/rtogs pa dgon pa'i gnas la shin tu mos/_/de dag rkang gnyis dam pa mkhas par 'gyur/_/sbyangs pa gang dag stobs bcus bsngags pa dag_/de 
[\[282b.7\]]dag rtag tu rab tu gnas par 'gyur/_/'phags pa'i rigs la de dag rtag tu dga'/_/rab tu dga' bas byang chub mchog kyang thob/_/de dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas bsngags/_/de la mkhas pa gnas pas 'di mthong ste/_/zhi ba gang la bde gshegs gnas pa yi/_/
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]byang chub de ni 'jig rten 'dren pas bsngags/_/'dren pa khyod las stong pa deng thos te/_/ye shes bla na med pa'ang bdag gis bsgrubs/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur bar bgyi/_/mi mkhas 'gro ba dag kyang rnam par dgrol/_/thub 
[\[283a.2\]]pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/gang la log pa'i blo gros mi dmigs shing /_/chos rnams kun la khyod ni the tshom bral/_/de slad 'jig rten khyod dang 'dra ma mchis/_/'dren pa bde bar gshegs la gang bstod pa'i/_/bsod nams mi chung bdag gis bsags pas 
[\[283a.3\]]na/_/bdag ni de yi dge ba'i las 'di yis/_/mi yi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar shog_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod 
[\[283a.4\]]nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa brjod du med par nams kyang smyos pa dang glen par ma gyur to/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der 'dren pa skyes bu chen por gyur to/_/nams kyang log par ltung bar ma gyur to/_/nams kyang gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par ma gyur to/_/nams kyang gzhan gyi 
[\[283a.5\]]ngor lta bar ma gyur to/_/nams kyang bskal pa brjod du med par tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par ma gyur to/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar 
[\[283a.6\]]gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu bzang skyong zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu grags byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du 
[\[283a.7\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mkhas pa'i snying por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu mkhas pa'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tsan dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' skyob byin zhes bya ba de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi 
[\[283b.2\]]bu tsan dan snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ded 
[\[283b.3\]]dpon bzang po de de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i mig ces bya bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang rigs kyi bu des pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mes byin yin no/_/gang de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs kyi bu blo gros 'chang zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni byang chub sems 
[\[283b.4\]]dpa' bzang skyong yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu kun du 'dzin par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na gang rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lha yin no/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 
[\[283b.5\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na bram 
[\[283b.6\]]ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/thams cad zil gyis gnon pa de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri bar 'dod pa dang /_gzhan gyi ngor mi blta bar 'dod 
[\[283b.7\]]na chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/_'grogs par bya/_bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/chos zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir yongs su 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags/_
[\[284a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la yongs su zhu ba zhus lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa dang /_
[\[284a.3\]]rtswa dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma rnams rdul phra rab tu byas kyang bgrang bar nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 
[\[284a.4\]]chos kyi dbyings su yongs su zhugs pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dris pa ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med/_dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_
[\[284a.5\]]mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang 
[\[284a.6\]]ldan par de bzhin gshegs pa/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 
[\[284a.7\]]'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang dge slong dpa' sra zhes bya ba mkhas pa/_yid gzhungs pa/_bye brag phyed pa/_rtogs pa/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la rim gro byed par gyur to/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du shin tu gus par byas te bshad pa rnams kyang gzungs su 
[\[284b.2\]]'dzin cing rang gi don kyang mi gtong ste/_des de bzhin gshegs pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas te/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[284b.3\]]pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis thog ma dang /_bar dang /_tha mar dus gsum du bstan pa rnams 
[\[284b.4\]]yongs su bzung bar gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi rim gro byed par gyur 
[\[284b.5\]]te/_de dag thams cad la yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang /_bar dang /_tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa rnams yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/_de la de 
[\[284b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur gyur te/_de la yang byang chub 
[\[284b.7\]]sems dpa' dpa' sra des bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/_yid du mi 'ong bas ma yin no/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur te/_
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan to/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu'i bar du chos thams cad nam mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan te/_dpa' sra 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i chos thams 
[\[285a.2\]]cad ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob ste/_ji lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/_des phyogs 
[\[285a.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong /_kha cig ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 
[\[285a.4\]]du mas sems can rnams 'dul/_kha cig ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor/_kha cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de la zab mo'i 
[\[285a.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/zhi ba byang chub mtshungs med btsal slad du/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye stong la/_/shin tu gus pa chen po bskyed nas su/_/sngon gyi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/sems ni nams kyang gzhan 
[\[285a.6\]]du ma bsams te/_/rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag_/chos rnams stong par bde bar gshegs pas bstan/_/de dag chos kyang yid kyis rnam par bsams/_/bdag tu smra ba mi gang mi mkhas pa/_/mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis mnan/_/chos rnams 
[\[285a.7\]]thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/_/de la bdag ni the tshom cang ma mchis/_/mig 'di dam pa'i don du stong par ni/_/bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa thos nas rtogs/_/mig 'di mig tu mchis pa ma lags te/_/mdzangs pa ma lags mi rnams 'di la slad/_/nges par 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]sna lce rna ba de bzhin te/_/lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags/_/de bzhin sems dang sems pa'ang stong pa nyid/_/sems ni dben zhing rab tu stong pa lags/_/gzugs kyang gzugs kyis rnam par dben zhing stong /_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg kyang stong /_/
[\[285b.2\]]chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste/_/skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/de bzhin khams kyang khams rnams nyid kyis stong /_/bden pa'ang bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste/_/'di la mdzangs pa ma lags 'gro ba rnams kyang bslad/_/gang na'ang 
[\[285b.3\]]stong par rig pa ma mchis par/_/nam mkha' bar snang bya yi rjes dang mtshungs/_/gang na'ang ngo bo nyid ni ma mchis pa/_/de ni nams kyang gzhan gyi rgyur mi 'gyur/_/gang gis ngo bo nyid ni mi rnyed par/_/rang bzhin de med ji ltar gzhan gyi rkyen/_/rang bzhin 
[\[285b.4\]]med pa gzhan gyis ci zhig skyed/_/rgyu de bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o/_/thams cad chos kyang mi g.yo brtan par gnas/_/mi 'gyur 'tshe ba ma mchis zhi ba ste/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rig pa ma mchis ltar/_/de la mi mdzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur/_/
[\[285b.5\]]ji ltar ri bo dag ni mi sgul ba/_/de bzhin chos rnams rtag tu bskyod mi nus/_/'chi 'pho ma mchis skye ba ma mchis pa'i/_/chos rnams de ltar rgyal bas rab tu bstan/_/gang gis yang dag chos rnams nges rtogs pa/_/des ni rgyal ba rnam 'dren bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/
[\[285b.6\]]gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mchod ma bgyis/_/gang gis tshul bzhin rab tu chos rtogs pa/_/des ni rgyal ba bde gshegs bkur stir bgyis/_/de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod bgyis te/_/byang chub mchog tu de dag 
[\[285b.7\]]'tshang yang rgya/_/gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa/_/mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa des bzung ste/_/byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya/_/rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de/_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig rnams kyis bzung /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i shul 'dir byang chub phyir/_/de la mkhas pa the tshom gzhar mi 'byung /_/bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa/_/chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis 
[\[286a.2\]]'tshal/_/'dren pa mi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur/_/shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo rnam par dgrol/_/'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rig pas na/_/bdag gis de ring chos kyi yab la mchod/_/gang slad mi yi gtso bo khyod 'phags pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs 
[\[286a.3\]]su mchi/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzungs dang /_
[\[286a.4\]]zhi gnas dang /_shes rab kyis sems can thams cad zil gyis mnan to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' srar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[286a.5\]]dpa' thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sra zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas stong pa nyid rnam par 
[\[286a.6\]]thar pa'i sgo la bslab par bya'o/_/de la slob pa'i tshe yang sems gang la yang mi chags mi thogs te/_de'i sems ma chags shing thogs pa med pas bya ba gang dang gang la dmigs pa de dang de yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal nga stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa na/_ye 
[\[286a.7\]]shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der 'gyur ba'i ye shes de lta bu rab tu thob bo/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu 'das pa na rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'das pa na rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na 
[\[286b.2\]]nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu 'das pa na/_dge ba bsags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin 
[\[286b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad sems pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de 
[\[286b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi phung po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag gnyis 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[286b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong brgyad brgya 'das pa na zhi ba spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de 
[\[286b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na sprin gyi kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis 
[\[286b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum brgya 'das pa na yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri brgyad stong 'das pa na me long dkyil 'khor snang 
[\[287a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[287a.3\]]bye ba phrag brgyad cu 'das pa na zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'joms pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 
[\[287a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na dus las 'das zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[287a.5\]]shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/_tshe mnyam zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog 
[\[287a.6\]]ces bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[287a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros dag pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na rin po che 
[\[287b.2\]]kun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 
[\[287b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[287b.4\]]rgyas brtul zhugs spyad ces bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams 
[\[287b.5\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na nges par 
[\[287b.6\]]song ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa 
[\[287b.7\]]nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na bde ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can 
[\[288a.2\]]rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas med par spyod ces bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[288a.3\]]khams 'das pa na me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar 
[\[288a.4\]]gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na tsam pa'i kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[288a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa'i lha zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na lhas sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod 
[\[288a.6\]]de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[288a.7\]]khams 'das pa na rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 
[\[288b.2\]]shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bdun cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de 
[\[288b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char gser gyis rab tu brgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsol ba byed pa zhes 
[\[288b.4\]]bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char gser gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 
[\[288b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 
[\[288b.6\]]shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char snang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[288b.7\]]brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na grags can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na gzi brjid can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros 'dzin 
[\[289a.2\]]ces bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tshangs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin 
[\[289a.3\]]gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_
[\[289a.4\]]de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen 
[\[289a.5\]]sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
