[\[289a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[289a.7\]]brjod du med pa sum cu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na shin tu mdzes zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs 
[\[289b.2\]]pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[289b.3\]]pa mtha' yas snang ba zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na 
[\[289b.4\]]nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/'jam dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe nga la sems can rnams kyis 
[\[289b.5\]]ming tha dad par shes pa ni brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang shar gyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du nga la sems can rnams kyis ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa 
[\[289b.6\]]yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par smras kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde bar mi rig go/_/'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na mos par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa 
[\[289b.7\]]'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu mgu bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thos na the tshom skye bar 'gyur na nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]can dang /_de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/_'jam dpal ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na yon tan rab tu bskyed pa zhes bya 
[\[290a.2\]]ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 
[\[290a.3\]]'grus mtha' yas de yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa dpag tu med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa nas theg pa brjod du med pa'i bar la 
[\[290a.4\]]yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/_de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa 'chad de/_nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 
[\[290a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas ngas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su dag pa thos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab 
[\[290a.6\]]nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsngos te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad 
[\[290a.7\]]med pa yongs su dag par lung bstan mod kyi 'on kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma btang bar gyur nas de ltar ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]bsnyen bkur byas te/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/
[\[290b.2\]]brjod kyis mi lang 'khor ba na/_/bsam gyis mi khyab 'das pa'i dus/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya bskyed phyir/_/de na nga yis brtson 'grus brtsams/_/brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba/_/gang zag mtshungs pa med pa byung /_/sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul/_/lhar 
[\[290b.3\]]bcas 'jig rten rnams la ston/_/sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing /_/stobs rnams kyi yang pha rol phyin/_/mi 'jigs pa la shin tu gnas/_/so so yang dag rig la mkhas/_/gnas dang gnas min dbang yang thob/_/las dang ye shes rtogs par rig_/
[\[290b.4\]]las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang /_/rnam par smin la the tshom med/_/khams rnams du mar shes pa dang /_/rnam par 'dren pa shin tu ldan/_/sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams/_/ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen/_/sems can rnams kyi dbang po 
[\[290b.5\]]yi/_/rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen/_/dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams/_/ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyen/_/bsam gtan ye shes rnam thar dang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin/_/snyoms par 'jug dang tshad med la/_/rkang gnyis dam pa shin 
[\[290b.6\]]tu bslabs/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/_/des ni mi mkhyen gang yang med/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya dris te/_/sangs 
[\[290b.7\]]rgyas zhing gi rgya che ba/_/bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang /_/ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen/_/gang rnams khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa/_/de 'dra'i chos ni yong ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi skyon rnams dang /_/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]yon tan thams cad rab tu mkhyen/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba/_/rkang gnyis gtso bos bshad du gsol/_/sems can rnams kyi smin pa dang /_/ji ltar mi rnams 'tshang rgya ba/_/nyon mongs gang gis nyon mongs pas/_/mi mkhas 
[\[291a.2\]]'khor bar rab tu 'khor/_/mi rnams gang gis nyon mongs pa/_/nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis mkhyen/_/de yi lam dang bsam pa rnams/_/'dren pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen/_/ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang /_/byung nas ji ltar gnas pa dang /_/ji 
[\[291a.3\]]ltar de las ldang ba rnams/_/ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa/_/ji snyed ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_/zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong rnams/_/rnam pa thams cad shin tu mkhyen/_/ji ltar chos la 'dogs pa dang /_gang 
[\[291a.4\]]gi rkyen gyis bshad pa yang /_/de yang ston pas rab mkhyen te/_/de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod/_/khyod kyis bskal pa byer spyad pas/_/ye shes 'di las nges par 'byung /_/ston pas stobs kyi mthu yang brnyes/_/drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan/_/bskal pa stong 
[\[291a.5\]]phrag bye ba yi/_/bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang /_/spyod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing /_/bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad mkhyen/_/gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba/_/skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug_/de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis/_/ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen/_/gang du 
[\[291a.6\]]ji 'dra skye ba dang /_/gang du rigs kyang ci 'dra ba/_/ji ltar kun du spyad pa rnams/_/de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/_/tha ma'i chos rnams ci 'dra ba/_/'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang /_/'gro ba gang du skye ba ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/_/ci 'dra ba yi 
[\[291a.7\]]ye shes kyis/_/sngon chad rnam par lung bstan pa/_/mkhas pa khyod kyis de mkhyen pas/_/de la the tshom mi mnga' khyod/_/tshul khrims gang dang chos gang dang /_/ci 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang /_/ye shes gang la zhugs pa yang /_/de dag 'dren pas rab 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]tu mkhyen/_/gang dang gang gi las kyis su/_/skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rnam smin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang /_/de dag mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/_/gang du gnas pa de dag gi/_/rgyun du mchi bar nges pa yang /_/de yang khyod kyis ma lus mkhyen/_/de 
[\[291b.2\]]slad yid gnyis mi mnga' khyod/_/gang gi lus kyis sems gang skyes/_/de yang khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen/_/sems de'i rgyu ni gang lags pa/_/de yang 'dren pas shin tu mkhyen/_/sngon chad gnas pa mkhyen pa ni/_/khyod dang 'dra ba yong ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[291b.3\]]bye ba stong rnams dang /_/'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra/_/srog chags so so'i dge ba rnams/_/rjes su dran pas rab tu mkhyen/_/de slad sangs rgyas chos rnams la/_/'dren pa'i ye shes thogs mi mnga'/_/gang dang gang gis lus kyis su/_/ji lta bu yi rgyud du 
[\[291b.4\]]mchi/_/de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen/_/de slad rgyal bas lhag ma mchis/_/'dren pa chos rnams thams cad la/_/khyod ni the tshom yong mi mnga'/_/sems can kun gyi spyod yul yang /_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis rab tu gzigs/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi 
[\[291b.5\]]'pho mkhyen/_/khyod 'dra ba ni yong mi gda'/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na/_/thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis/_/zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen/_/ma lus pa yang rtogs par gyur/_/nyon mongs thams cad yongs su spangs/_/khyod kyis bag chags 
[\[291b.6\]]kun kyang bcom/_/sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang /_/spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen/_/gang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang /_/nyon mongs 'di dag gar 'byung mkhyen/_/nyon mongs dag la spyad pas na/_/bag chags rjes su 'jug pa rnams/_/de 
[\[291b.7\]]dag kun kyang khyed mkhyen te/_/de las khyod ni pha rol phyin/_/bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang /_/nyon mongs gang gis spong ba yi/_/lam de rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/_/de slad khyod ni lam la mkhas/_/'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa/_/mtha' yas 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]brtson 'grus de bstod nas/_/bskal bye khrag khrig mtha' yas par/_/'gro ba gnyis su de skyes so/_/'di nas lha ris nga skyes te/_/rtag par lha yi dbang por gyur/_/bye ba mtha' yas lha rnams la/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par 
[\[292a.2\]]bstan/_/lha yi gnas nas shi 'phos te/_/mi yi dbang po rgyal por gyur/_/sems can khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan/_/de dag nga yi chos thos nas/_/bsti stang mtshungs med bskyed nas su/_/sems ni thams cad 
[\[292a.3\]]nyer gzhag ste/_/dri med sems kyis de dag nyan/_/sems can bye ba mtha' yas pa/_/byang chub mchog la nges par gyur/_/nga yi tshig thos rtogs pa ni/_/sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rgya 
[\[292a.4\]]bshad kyang /_/bskal pa khrag khrig mtha' yas su/_/rgya chen bshad pa mi zad do/_/sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod dang /_/drang srong chen pos zhing bsngags pa/_/thams cad rang bzhin stong par bshad/_/de dag ma skyes mi 'gag bstan/_/gang 'dir 
[\[292a.5\]]sangs rgyas bsngags pa dang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang /_/bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa/_/gang gis bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad/_/zhi ba'i rang bzhin de mi rnyed/_/gang la bshad pa de 
[\[292a.6\]]yang stong /_/'di la mgon med 'gro ba myos/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bud med 
[\[292a.7\]]kyi dbang po las gyur te/_de phyin chad bud med kyi lus su mi skye bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgrub pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa med pa la bslab par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te/_'gul rab tu 
[\[292b.2\]]'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun 
[\[292b.3\]]du rab tu chem chem/_shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/_nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/_lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/_mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/_/srog chags 
[\[292b.4\]]bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/byang chub sems 
[\[292b.5\]]dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags stong phrag dpag tu med pa rnams dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu sngon sems ma bskyed pa rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[292b.6\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon 
[\[292b.7\]]mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas slad kyis gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]{D125}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su bar+N+Na sU tra ma hA yA na nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gser gyi mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[293a.2\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems ci ltar blta bar bgyi/_
[\[293a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub kyi sems ni gser dang rang bzhin 'dra bar gnas par blta bar bgyi'o/_/gser rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ltar byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par gnas so/_/mgar 
[\[293a.4\]]bas gser la bzo'i bye brag tha dad par byas kyang gser rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba ltar/_byang chub kyi sems la yon tan khyad par sna tshogs par snang yang don dam par byang chub kyi sems las ma g.yos pas rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[293a.5\]]'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems nyid rnam par dag_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don la brtson/_/dngos med ngo bo nyid du sgom/_/shes rab skye ba'i rgyu la mos/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[293a.6\]]pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa gser gyi mdo 
[\[293a.7\]]zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D126}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su bar+N+Na bA lu ko pa ma nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 
[\[293b.2\]]'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[293b.3\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das ci de 
[\[293b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun 
[\[293b.5\]]dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med do/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[293b.6\]]dga' bos lan gnyis su bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[293b.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lan gnyis lan gsum du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med do/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang ldan no/_/kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin 
[\[294a.2\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul shes pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[294a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/_dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[294a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu 'gro ba shes sam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul 
[\[294a.5\]]ji lta bus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu mchi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod la don 'di dpes bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[294a.6\]]zhe na/_kun dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpes don rtogs par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo dper na rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong pa chus gang ba/_bya khwas btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du 'dug pa/_pad ma'i lo mas khebs pa zhig yod 
[\[294a.7\]]la de nas mi la la zhig gis rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan pa'i lcags kyi shing rta la zhon te/_de yang mu khyud kyi shing yang chu la mi reg_/rta rnams kyi rmig pa yang chu la mi reg_/pad ma'i lo ma rnams kyang rta'i rmig pa dag gis mi brtol ba 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]tsam gyi stobs dang shugs dang mgyogs pa de lta bus rgyug la/_kun dga' bo de nas rdzing de'i nang nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas shing rta de mtsho'i nang nas phyir ma log pa de'i bar skabs su shing rta de lan brgyad bskor na/_kun dga' bo sbrul gdug pas shing rta lan cig 
[\[294b.2\]]bskor ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo khyod chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo khyod tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su maud gal gyi bu chen po chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar 
[\[294b.3\]]byed do/_/kun dga' bo maud gal gyi bu chen po tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/_/gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs 
[\[294b.4\]]su rang sangs rgyas chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med pa ston to/_/rang sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa ston cing don kyang go bar byed do/_/kun 
[\[294b.5\]]dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su kun dga' bo gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o/_/kun dga' bo rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar 
[\[294b.6\]]du ngal mi bso bar shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi mtshams dang /_nub byang gi mtshams dang /_byang shar 
[\[294b.7\]]gyi mtshams dang /_de bzhin du steng dang 'og gi phyogs su nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal mi bso bar song la/_de nas mi la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad ra bas bskor te ra bas bskor nas rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dang /_gyo 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]dum med par byas te mthon dman med par byas nas grong khyer gcig tu byas la grong khyer gcig tu byas nas kyang yungs 'brus bkang ste byur bur byas na/_kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i nang gi yungs 'bru ji snyed yod pa de dag bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[295a.2\]]dag na sems can byang chub la zhugs pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub 
[\[295a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu skye ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag na 'khod pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[295a.4\]]dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[295a.5\]]khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag 
[\[295a.6\]]na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ston pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 
[\[295a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la lta ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la gces par byed pa'i mchog dang gus pa chen pos lan gsum bskor ba byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag 
[\[295b.2\]]ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang 
[\[295b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo /_/
[\[295b.4\]]de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag ngas mthong ngo /_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[295b.5\]]chen po ston pa dag ngas mthong ste/_de dag thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa dang gdung 'thun pa sha stag yin na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying 
[\[295b.6\]]po la lta ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la bskor ba byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 
[\[295b.7\]]ston pa mtshan tha dad pa dang gdung tha dad pa dag lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams ngas bstan pa gang dag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[296a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni kun dga' bo dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/_kun dga' 
[\[296a.3\]]bo de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni dkon te/_kun dga' bo ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[296a.4\]]bye ma dang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa de bzhin du gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni 
[\[296a.5\]]nyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[296a.6\]]rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA 
[\[296a.7\]]barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
